h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0311^ea^ ^a^M2.0247^ea^ ^a^P3.0279^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo ^a^V2.0002^ea^ a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi chahi {dii0 ni0 3.328; pa.ti0 ma0 3.17}? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajaano. sotena sadda.m sutvaa neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajaano. ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajaano. jivhaaya ra.m saayitvaa neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajaano. kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajaano. manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naa neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajaano. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``chahi ^a^T3.0312^ea^ ^a^M2.0248^ea^ ^a^P3.0280^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi chahi {dii0 ni0 3.356}? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti; aavibhaava.m tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaano gacchati, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karoti, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane gacchati, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kamati, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimasati {paraamasati (ka0)} parimajjati; yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti.
[03] ``dibbaaya, sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.naati -- dibbe ca maanuse ca, ye duure santike ca.

[03] ``parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati. saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti pajaanaati, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m...pe0... sadosa.m vaa citta.m... viitadosa.m vaa citta.m... samoha.m ^a^V2.0003^ea^ vaa citta.m... viitamoha.m vaa citta.m... sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m... vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m... mahaggata.m vaa citta.m... amahaggata.m vaa citta.m... sauttara.m vaa citta.m... anuttara.m vaa citta.m... samaahita.m vaa citta.m... asamaahita.m vaa citta.m... vimutta.m vaa citta.m... avimutta.m vaa citta.m avimutta.m cittanti pajaanaati.
[03] ``anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... ^a^T3.0313^ea^ ^a^P3.0281^ea^. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.

[03] ``dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m ^a^M2.0249^ea^ vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa. ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.
[03] ``aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^T3.0314^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati.
[03] ``imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m ^a^V2.0004^ea^ lokassa. katamehi chahi? saddhindriyena ^a^P3.0282^ea^, viiriyindriyena, satindriyena, samaadhindriyena, pa~n~nindriyena, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi chahi? saddhaabalena, viiriyabalena, satibalena, samaadhibalena, pa~n~naabalena, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. catuttha.m.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``chahi ^a^M2.0250^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"ngantveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``katamehi chahi ^a^T3.0315^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo khamo hoti ruupaana.m, khamo saddaana.m, khamo gandhaana.m, khamo rasaana.m, khamo pho.t.thabbaana.m, va.n.nasampanno ca hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"ngantveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi chahi? idha ^a^P3.0283^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti ruupaana.m, khamo saddaana.m, khamo gandhaana.m, khamo rasaana.m, khamo pho.t.thabbaana.m, khamo dhammaana.m. imehi kho ^a^V2.0005^ea^, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"ngantveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo khamo hoti ruupaana.m, khamo saddaana.m, khamo gandhaana.m, khamo rasaana.m, khamo pho.t.thabbaana.m, balasampanno ca hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"ngantveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti ruupaana.m ^a^T3.0316^ea^ ...pe0... khamo dhammaana.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``chahi ^a^M2.0251^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"ngantveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo khamo hoti ruupaana.m, khamo saddaana.m, khamo gandhaana.m, khamo rasaana.m, khamo pho.t.thabbaana.m, javasampanno ca hoti. imehi ^a^P3.0284^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, chahi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"ngantveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti ruupaana.m...pe0... khamo dhammaana.m. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ {dii0 ni0 3.327} ``chayimaani ^a^V2.0006^ea^, bhikkhave, anuttariyaani. katamaani cha? dassanaanuttariya.m, savanaanuttariya.m, laabhaanuttariya.m, sikkhaanuttariya.m, paaricariyaanuttariya.m, anussataanuttariya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cha anuttariyaanii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ {dii0 ni0 3.327} ``chayimaani ^a^T3.0317^ea^, bhikkhave, anussati.t.thaanaani. katamaani cha? buddhaanussati, dhammaanussati, sa"nghaanussati, siilaanussati, caagaanussati, devataanussati -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cha anussati.t.thaanaanii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho mahaanaamo sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno, kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yo so, bhante, ariyasaavako aagataphalo vi~n~naatasaasano, so katamena vihaarena bahula.m viharatii''ti?

[03] ``yo ^a^M2.0252^ea^ so, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako aagataphalo ^a^P3.0285^ea^ vi~n~naatasaasano, so iminaa vihaarena bahula.m viharati. {a0 ni0 11.11} idha, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako tathaagata.m anussarati -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. yasmi.m, mahaanaama, samaye ariyasaavako tathaagata.m anussarati nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti tathaagata.m aarabbha. ujugatacitto kho pana, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako labhati atthaveda.m, labhati dhammaveda.m, labhati dhammuupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m. pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vediyati, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. aya.m vuccati, mahaanaama -- `ariyasaavako ^a^V2.0007^ea^ visamagataaya pajaaya samappatto viharati, sabyaapajjaaya pajaaya ^a^T3.0318^ea^ abyaapajjo viharati, dhammasota.m samaapanno buddhaanussati.m bhaaveti'''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako dhamma.m anussarati -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti. yasmi.m, mahaanaama, samaye ariyasaavako dhamma.m anussarati nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti ^a^T3.0319^ea^; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti dhamma.m aarabbha. ujugatacitto kho pana, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako labhati atthaveda.m, labhati dhammaveda.m, labhati dhammuupasa.mhita paamojja.m. pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vediyati, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. aya.m vuccati, mahaanaama -- `ariyasaavako visamagataaya pajaaya samappatto viharati, sabyaapajjaaya pajaaya abyaapajjo viharati ^a^P3.0286^ea^, dhammasota.m samaapanno dhammaanussati.m bhaaveti'''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako sa"ngha.m anussarati -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ujuppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ~naayappa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, saamiicippa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, yadida.m cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa esa bhagavato ^a^M2.0253^ea^ saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'ti. yasmi.m, mahaanaama, samaye ariyasaavako sa"ngha.m anussarati nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti sa"ngha.m aarabbha. ujugatacitto kho pana, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako labhati atthaveda.m, labhati dhammaveda.m, labhati dhammuupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m. pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vediyati, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. aya.m vuccati, mahaanaama -- `ariyasaavako visamagataaya pajaaya samappatto viharati, sabyaapajjaaya pajaaya abyaapajjo viharati, dhammasota.m samaapanno sa"nghaanussati.m bhaaveti'''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako attano siilaani anussarati akha.n.daani acchiddaani asabalaani akammaasaani bhujissaani vi~n~nuppasatthaani aparaama.t.thaani samaadhisa.mvattanikaani ^a^V2.0008^ea^. yasmi.m, mahaanaama, samaye ariyasaavako siila.m anussarati nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti siila.m aarabbha. ujugatacitto kho pana, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako labhati atthaveda.m, labhati dhammaveda.m, labhati dhammuupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m. pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vediyati, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. aya.m ^a^P3.0287^ea^ vuccati, mahaanaama -- `ariyasaavako visamagataaya pajaaya samappatto viharati, sabyaapajjaaya pajaaya abyaapajjo viharati, dhammasota.m samaapanno siilaanussati.m bhaaveti'''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako attano caaga.m anussarati -- `laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me! yoha.m maccheramalapariyu.t.thitaaya pajaaya ^a^T3.0320^ea^ vigatamalamaccherena cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasaami muttacaago payatapaa.ni vossaggarato yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato'ti. yasmi.m, mahaanaama, samaye ariyasaavako caaga.m anussarati nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti ^a^M2.0254^ea^, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti caaga.m aarabbha. ujugatacitto kho pana, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako labhati atthaveda.m, labhati dhammaveda.m, labhati dhammuupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m. pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vediyati, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. aya.m vuccati, mahaanaama -- `ariyasaavako visamagataaya pajaaya samappatto viharati, sabyaapajjaaya pajaaya abyaapajjo viharati, dhammasota.m samaapanno caagaanussati.m bhaaveti'''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako devataanussati.m bhaaveti -- `santi devaa caatumahaaraajikaa {caatummahaaraajikaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, santi devaa taavati.msaa, santi devaa yaamaa, santi devaa tusitaa, santi devaa nimmaanaratino, santi devaa paranimmitavasavattino, santi devaa brahmakaayikaa, santi devaa tatuttari {tatuttari.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), taduttari (ka0) a0 ni0 6.25; visuddhi0 1.162 passitabba.m}. yathaaruupaaya saddhaaya samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tattha upapannaa {tattha uppannaa (sii0), tatthuupapannaa (syaa0 ka.m0), tatthupapannaa (a0 ni0 3.71)}, mayhampi tathaaruupaa saddhaa sa.mvijjati. yathaaruupena siilena samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tattha upapannaa, mayhampi tathaaruupa.m siila.m sa.mvijjati. yathaaruupena sutena samannaagataa ^a^V2.0009^ea^ taa devataa ito cutaa tattha upapannaa, mayhampi tathaaruupa.m suta.m sa.mvijjati. yathaaruupena caagena samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tattha upapannaa, mayhampi tathaaruupo ^a^T3.0321^ea^ caago sa.mvijjati. yathaaruupaaya pa~n~naaya samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tattha upapannaa, mayhampi tathaaruupaa pa~n~naa sa.mvijjatii'ti. yasmi.m ^a^P3.0288^ea^, mahaanaama, samaye ariyasaavako attano ca taasa~nca devataana.m saddha~nca siila~nca suta~nca caaga~nca pa~n~na~nca anussarati nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti taa devataa aarabbha. ujugatacitto kho pana, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako labhati atthaveda.m, labhati dhammaveda.m, labhati dhammuupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m. pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vediyati, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. aya.m vuccati, mahaanaama -- `ariyasaavako visamagataaya pajaaya samappatto viharati ^a^M2.0255^ea^, sabyaapajjaaya {sabyaapajjhaaya... abyaapajjho (ka0)} pajaaya abyaapajjo {sabyaapajjhaaya... abyaapajjho (ka0)} viharati, dhammasota.m samaapanno devataanussati.m bhaaveti'''.
[03] ``yo so, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako aagataphalo vi~n~naatasaasano, so iminaa vihaarena bahula.m viharatii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] aahuneyyavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] dve aahuneyyaa indriya, balaani tayo aajaaniiyaa.
[22] anuttariya anussatii, mahaanaamena te dasaati..

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``chayime ^a^T3.0322^ea^ ^a^V2.0010^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa saara.niiyaa {saaraa.niiyaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. katame cha? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno metta.m vaciikamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo.

[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0289^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te laabhaa dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa antamaso pattapariyaapannamattampi tathaaruupehi laabhehi appa.tivibhattabhogii hoti siilavantehi sabrahmacaariihi saadhaara.nabhogii, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaani taani siilaani akha.n.daani acchiddaani asabalaani akammaasaani bhujissaani vi~n~nuppasatthaani aparaama.t.thaani samaadhisa.mvattanikaani ^a^M2.0256^ea^ tathaaruupehi siilehi siilasaama~n~nagato viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo.

[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaaya.m di.t.thi ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya tathaaruupaaya di.t.thiyaa di.t.thisaama~n~nagato viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva ^a^V2.0011^ea^ raho ca, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhammaa saara.niiyaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``chayime ^a^T3.0323^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa saara.niiyaa piyakara.naa garukara.naa sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cha? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno metta.m vaciikamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti...pe0... metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te laabhaa dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa antamaso pattapariyaapannamattampi tathaaruupehi laabhehi appa.tivibhattabhogii hoti siilavantehi ^a^P3.0290^ea^ sabrahmacaariihi saadhaara.nabhogii, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaani taani siilaani akha.n.daani acchiddaani asabalaani akammaasaani bhujissaani vi~n~nuppasatthaani aparaama.t.thaani samaadhisa.mvattanikaani tathaaruupehi siilehi siilasaama~n~nagato viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0257^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaaya.m di.t.thi ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya tathaaruupaaya di.t.thiyaa di.t.thisaama~n~nagato viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ^a^T3.0324^ea^ ca, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ^a^V2.0012^ea^ ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhammaa saara.niiyaa piyakara.naa garukara.naa sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``chayimaa, bhikkhave, nissaara.niiyaa dhaatuyo. katamaa cha? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `mettaa hi kho me cetovimutti bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa; atha ca pana me byaapaado citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thatii'ti. so `maa heva'ntissa vacaniiyo -- `maayasmaa, eva.m avaca; maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. a.t.thaanameta.m, aavuso, anavakaaso ya.m mettaaya cetovimuttiyaa bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya; atha ca ^a^P3.0291^ea^ panassa byaapaado citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassati {.thassatiiti (sabbattha) dii0 ni0 3.326 passitabba.m}, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. nissara.na~nheta.m, aavuso, byaapaadassa yadida.m mettaacetovimuttii'''ti {mettaacetovimutti (sabbattha)}.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `karu.naa hi kho me cetovimutti bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa; atha ca pana me vihesaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thatii'ti. so `maa heva'ntissa vacaniiyo -- `maayasmaa, eva.m avaca; maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. a.t.thaanameta.m, aavuso ^a^T3.0325^ea^, anavakaaso ya.m karu.naaya cetovimuttiyaa bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya; atha ca panassa vihesaa citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. nissara.na~nheta.m, aavuso, vihesaaya yadida.m karu.naacetovimuttii'''ti.

[03] ``idha ^a^M2.0258^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `muditaa hi kho me cetovimutti bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa; atha ca pana me arati citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thatii'ti. so `maa heva'ntissa vacaniiyo -- `maayasmaa, eva.m avaca; maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya ^a^V2.0013^ea^. a.t.thaanameta.m, aavuso, anavakaaso ya.m muditaaya cetovimuttiyaa bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya; atha ca panassa arati citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. nissara.na~nheta.m, aavuso, aratiyaa yadida.m muditaacetovimuttii'''ti.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `upekkhaa hi kho me cetovimutti bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa; atha ca pana me raago citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thatii'ti. so `maa heva'ntissa vacaniiyo -- `maayasmaa, eva.m avaca; maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. a.t.thaanameta.m, aavuso, anavakaaso ya.m upekkhaaya cetovimuttiyaa bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya anu.t.thitaaya ^a^T3.0326^ea^ paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya ^a^P3.0292^ea^; atha ca panassa raago citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. nissara.na~nheta.m, aavuso, raagassa yadida.m upekkhaacetovimuttii'''ti.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `animittaa hi kho me cetovimutti bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa; atha ca pana me nimittaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m hotii'ti. so `maa heva'ntissa vacaniiyo -- `maayasmaa, eva.m avaca; maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. a.t.thaanameta.m, aavuso, anavakaaso ya.m animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya; atha ca panassa nimittaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. nissara.na~nheta.m, aavuso, sabbanimittaana.m yadida.m animittaacetovimuttii'''ti.

[03] ``idha ^a^M2.0259^ea^ pana bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `asmiiti kho me vigata.m {vigate (syaa0)}, ayamahamasmiiti ca {aya.m cakaaro dii0 ni0 3.326 natthi} na samanupassaami; atha ca pana me vicikicchaakatha.mkathaasalla.m citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thatii'ti. so `maa heva'ntissa vacaniiyo -- `maayasmaa, eva.m avaca; maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. a.t.thaanameta.m, aavuso, anavakaaso ya.m asmiiti vigate ayamahamasmiiti ca na samanupassato; atha ^a^V2.0014^ea^ ca panassa vicikicchaakatha.mkathaasalla.m citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. nissara.na~nheta.m, aavuso, vicikicchaakatha.mkathaasallassa yadida.m asmiiti maanasamugghaato'ti. imaa ^a^T3.0327^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, cha nissaara.niiyaa dhaatuyo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso, bhikkhavo''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato ^a^P3.0293^ea^ saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ``tathaa tathaa, aavuso, bhikkhu vihaara.m kappeti yathaa yathaassa vihaara.m kappayato na bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, na bhaddikaa kaalakiriyaa {kaala.mkiriyaa (ka0) a0 ni0 3.110}. katha~ncaavuso, bhikkhu tathaa tathaa vihaara.m kappeti yathaa yathaassa vihaara.m kappayato na bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, na bhaddikaa kaalakiriyaa?

[03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu kammaaraamo hoti kammarato kammaaraamata.m anuyutto, bhassaaraamo hoti bhassarato bhassaaraamata.m anuyutto, niddaaraamo hoti niddaarato niddaaraamata.m anuyutto, sa"nga.nikaaraamo hoti sa"nga.nikarato sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m anuyutto, sa.msaggaaraamo hoti sa.msaggarato sa.msaggaaraamata.m anuyutto, papa~ncaaraamo hoti papa~ncarato papa~ncaaraamata.m anuyutto. eva.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu tathaa tathaa vihaara.m kappeti yathaa yathaassa vihaara.m kappayato na bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, na bhaddikaa kaalakiriyaa. aya.m vuccataavuso -- `bhikkhu sakkaayaabhirato nappajahaasi {na pahaasi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sakkaaya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaaya'''.

[03] ``tathaa ^a^M2.0260^ea^ tathaavuso, bhikkhu vihaara.m kappeti yathaa yathaassa vihaara.m kappayato bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, bhaddikaa kaalakiriyaa. katha~ncaavuso, bhikkhu tathaa tathaa vihaara.m kappeti yathaa yathaassa vihaara.m kappayato bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, bhaddikaa kaalakiriyaa?

[03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu ^a^T3.0328^ea^ na kammaaraamo hoti na kammarato na kammaaraamata.m anuyutto, na bhassaaraamo hoti na bhassarato na bhassaaraamata.m anuyutto, na niddaaraamo hoti na niddaarato ^a^V2.0015^ea^ niddaaraamata.m anuyutto, na sa"nga.nikaaraamo hoti na sa"nga.nikarato na sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m anuyutto, na sa.msaggaaraamo hoti na sa.msaggarato na sa.msaggaaraamata.m anuyutto, na papa~ncaaraamo hoti na papa~ncarato na papa~ncaaraamata.m anuyutto. eva.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu tathaa ^a^P3.0294^ea^ tathaa vihaara.m kappeti yathaa yathaassa vihaara.m kappayato bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, bhaddikaa kaalakiriyaa. aya.m vuccataavuso -- `bhikkhu nibbaanaabhirato pajahaasi sakkaaya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa'''ti.
[21] ``yo papa~ncamanuyutto, papa~ncaabhirato mago.
[22] viraadhayii so nibbaana.m, yogakkhema.m anuttara.m..
[21] ``yo ca papa~nca.m hitvaana, nippapa~ncapade rato.
[22] aaraadhayii so nibbaana.m, yogakkhema.m anuttara''nti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tathaa tathaavuso, bhikkhu vihaara.m kappeti yathaa yathaassa vihaara.m kappayato kaalakiriyaa anutappaa hoti. katha~ncaavuso, bhikkhu tathaa tathaa vihaara.m kappeti yathaa yathaassa vihaara.m kappayato kaalakiriyaa anutappaa hoti?

[03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu kammaaraamo hoti kammarato kammaaraamata.m anuyutto, bhassaaraamo hoti...pe0... niddaaraamo hoti... sa"nga.nikaaraamo hoti... sa.msaggaaraamo hoti... papa~ncaaraamo hoti papa~ncarato papa~ncaaraamata.m ^a^T3.0329^ea^ anuyutto. eva.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu tathaa tathaa vihaara.m kappeti yathaa yathaassa vihaara.m kappayato kaalakiriyaa anutappaa hoti ^a^M2.0261^ea^. aya.m vuccataavuso -- `bhikkhu sakkaayaabhirato nappajahaasi sakkaaya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaaya'''.

[03] ``tathaa tathaavuso, bhikkhu vihaara.m kappeti yathaa yathaassa vihaara.m kappayato kaalakiriyaa ananutappaa ^a^V2.0016^ea^ hoti. katha~ncaavuso, bhikkhu tathaa tathaa vihaara.m kappeti yathaa yathaassa vihaara.m kappayato kaalakiriyaa ananutappaa hoti?

[03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu na kammaaraamo hoti na kammarato na kammaaraamata.m anuyutto, na bhassaaraamo hoti...pe0... na ^a^P3.0295^ea^ niddaaraamo hoti... na sa"nga.nikaaraamo hoti... na sa.msaggaaraamo hoti... na papa~ncaaraamo hoti na papa~ncarato na papa~ncaaraamata.m anuyutto. eva.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu tathaa tathaa vihaara.m kappeti yathaa yathaassa vihaara.m kappayato kaalakiriyaa ananutappaa hoti. aya.m vuccataavuso -- `bhikkhu nibbaanaabhirato pajahaasi sakkaaya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa'''ti.
[21] ``yo papa~ncamanuyutto, papa~ncaabhirato mago.
[22] viraadhayii so nibbaana.m, yogakkhema.m anuttara.m..
[21] ``yo ca papa~nca.m hitvaana, nippapa~ncapade rato.
[22] aaraadhayii so nibbaana.m, yogakkhema.m anuttara''nti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa bhaggesu viharati susumaaragire {su.msumaaragire (sii0 pii0), sa.msumaaragire (katthaci)} bhesaka.laavane ^a^T3.0330^ea^ migadaaye. tena kho pana samayena nakulapitaa gahapati aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho nakulamaataa gahapataanii nakulapitara.m gahapati.m etadavoca --

[03] ``maa kho tva.m, gahapati, saapekkho {saapekho (pii0 ka0)} kaalamakaasi. dukkhaa, gahapati, saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa; garahitaa ca bhagavataa saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa. siyaa kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa -- `na nakulamaataa gahapataanii mamaccayena sakkhissati {na sakkhissati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), sakkoti (pii0 ka0)} daarake posetu.m, gharaavaasa.m sandharitu'nti {sandharitunti (ka0), sa.n.tharitu.m (syaa0)}. na kho paneta.m, gahapati, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. kusalaaha.m, gahapati, kappaasa.m ^a^M2.0262^ea^ kantitu.m ve.ni.m olikhitu.m. sakkomaha.m, gahapati, tavaccayena daarake posetu.m, gharaavaasa.m ^a^P3.0296^ea^ sandharitu.m. tasmaatiha ^a^V2.0017^ea^ tva.m, gahapati, maa saapekkho kaalamakaasi. dukkhaa, gahapati, saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa; garahitaa ca bhagavataa saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa.

[03] ``siyaa kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa -- `nakulamaataa gahapataanii mamaccayena a~n~na.m ghara.m {bhattaara.m (syaa0 ka.m0), viira.m (sii0)} gamissatii'ti. na kho paneta.m, gahapati, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. tva~nceva kho, gahapati, jaanaasi aha~nca, ya.m no {yadaa te (sii0), yathaa (syaa0), yathaa no (pii0)} so.lasavassaani gaha.t.thaka.m brahmacariya.m samaaci.n.na.m {samaadinna.m (sii0)}. tasmaatiha tva.m, gahapati, maa saapekkho kaalamakaasi. dukkhaa, gahapati, saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa; garahitaa ca bhagavataa saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa.

[03] ``siyaa kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa -- `nakulamaataa gahapataanii mamaccayena na dassanakaamaa bhavissati bhagavato na dassanakaamaa bhikkhusa"nghassaa'ti. na kho paneta.m, gahapati, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. aha~nhi, gahapati, tavaccayena dassanakaamataraa ceva bhavissaami bhagavato, dassanakaamataraa ^a^T3.0331^ea^ ca bhikkhusa"nghassa. tasmaatiha tva.m, gahapati, maa saapekkho kaalamakaasi. dukkhaa, gahapati, saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa; garahitaa ca bhagavataa saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa.

[03] ``siyaa kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa -- `na nakulamaataa gahapataanii mamaccayena siilesu {nakulamaataa... na siilesu (sii0 pii0)} paripuurakaarinii'ti. na kho paneta.m, gahapati, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. yaavataa kho, gahapati, tassa bhagavato saavikaa gihii odaatavasanaa siilesu paripuurakaariniyo, aha.m taasa.m a~n~nataraa. yassa kho panassa ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa -- aya.m so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumaaragire bhesaka.laavane migadaaye -- ta.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchatu. tasmaatiha tva.m, gahapati, maa saapekkho kaalamakaasi ^a^P3.0297^ea^. dukkhaa, gahapati, saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa; garahitaa ca bhagavataa saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa.

[03] ``siyaa ^a^M2.0263^ea^ kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa -- `na nakulamaataa gahapataanii laabhinii {nakulamaataa gahapataanii na laabhinii (pii0)} ajjhatta.m cetosamathassaa'ti. na kho paneta.m, gahapati, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. yaavataa kho, gahapati, tassa bhagavato saavikaa gihii odaatavasanaa laabhiniyo ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, aha.m taasa.m a~n~nataraa. yassa kho panassa ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa -- aya.m so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho ^a^V2.0018^ea^ bhaggesu viharati susumaaragire bhesaka.laavane migadaaye -- ta.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchatu. tasmaatiha tva.m, gahapati, maa saapekkho kaalamakaasi. dukkhaa, gahapati, saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa; garahitaa ca bhagavataa saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa.

[03] ``siyaa kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa -- `na nakulamaataa ^a^T3.0332^ea^ gahapataanii imasmi.m dhammavinaye ogaadhappattaa patigaadhappattaa assaasappattaa ti.n.navicikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane viharatii'ti. na kho paneta.m, gahapati, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. yaavataa kho, gahapati, tassa bhagavato saavikaa gihii odaatavasanaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye ogaadhappattaa patigaadhappattaa assaasappattaa ti.n.navicikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane viharanti, aha.m taasa.m a~n~nataraa. yassa kho panassa ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa -- aya.m so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumaaragire bhesaka.laavane migadaaye -- ta.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchatu. tasmaatiha tva.m, gahapati, maa saapekkho kaalamakaasi. dukkhaa gahapati saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa; garahitaa ca bhagavataa saapekkhassa kaalakiriyaa''ti.

[03] atha kho nakulapituno gahapatissa nakulamaataraa ^a^P3.0298^ea^ {nakulamaataaya (sii0 syaa0), nakulamaatuyaa (ka0)} gahapataaniyaa iminaa ovaadena ovadiyamaanassa so aabaadho .thaanaso pa.tippassambhi. vu.t.thahi {vu.t.thaati (ka0)} ca nakulapitaa gahapati tamhaa aabaadhaa; tathaa pahiino ca pana nakulapituno gahapatissa so aabaadho ahosi. atha kho nakulapitaa gahapati gilaanaa vu.t.thito {``gilaanabhaavato vu.t.thaaya .thito, bhaavappadhaano hi aya.m niddeso''ti .tiikaasa.mva.n.nanaa} aciravu.t.thito gela~n~naa da.n.damolubbha ^a^M2.0264^ea^ yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho nakulapitara.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``laabhaa te, gahapati, suladdha.m te, gahapati! yassa te nakulamaataa ^a^T3.0333^ea^ gahapataanii anukampikaa atthakaamaa ovaadikaa anusaasikaa. yaavataa kho, gahapati, mama saavikaa gihii odaatavasanaa siilesu paripuurakaariniyo, nakulamaataa gahapataanii taasa.m a~n~nataraa. yaavataa kho, gahapati, mama saavikaa gihii odaatavasanaa laabhiniyo ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, nakulamaataa gahapataanii taasa.m a~n~nataraa. yaavataa kho, gahapati, mama saavikaa gihii odaatavasanaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye ogaadhappattaa patigaadhappattaa assaasappattaa ti.n.navicikicchaa vigatakatha.mkathaa ^a^V2.0019^ea^ vesaarajjappattaa aparappaccayaa satthusaasane viharanti, nakulamaataa gahapataanii taasa.m a~n~nataraa. laabhaa te, gahapati, suladdha.m te, gahapati! yassa te nakulamaataa gahapataanii anukampikaa atthakaamaa ovaadikaa anusaasikaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenupa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. aayasmaapi kho saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenupa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^P3.0299^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. aayasmaapi kho mahaamoggallaano...pe0... aayasmaapi kho mahaakassapo... aayasmaapi kho mahaakaccaayano... aayasmaapi kho mahaako.t.thiko {mahaako.t.thito (sii0 pii0)} ... aayasmaapi kho mahaacundo... aayasmaapi kho mahaakappino... aayasmaapi kho anuruddho... aayasmaapi kho revato... aayasmaapi kho ^a^T3.0334^ea^ aanando saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenupa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. atha kho bhagavaa bahudeva ratti.m nisajjaaya viitinaametvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi. tepi kho aayasmanto ^a^M2.0265^ea^ acirapakkantassa bhagavato u.t.thaayaasanaa yathaavihaara.m agama.msu. ye pana tattha bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m te yaava suuriyuggamanaa kaakacchamaanaa supi.msu. addasaa kho bhagavaa dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena te bhikkhuu yaava suuriyuggamanaa kaakacchamaane supante. disvaa yenupa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] ``kaha.m nu kho, bhikkhave, saariputto? kaha.m mahaamoggallaano? kaha.m mahaakassapo? kaha.m mahaakaccaayano? kaha.m mahaako.t.thiko? kaha.m mahaacundo? kaha.m mahaakappino? kaha.m anuruddho? kaha.m revato? kaha.m aanando? kaha.m nu kho te, bhikkhave, theraa saavakaa gataa''ti? ``tepi kho, bhante, aayasmanto acirapakkantassa bhagavato u.t.thaayaasanaa yathaavihaara.m agama.msuu''ti. ``kena no {kena no (ka0), ke nu (katthaci)} tumhe, bhikkhave, theraa bhikkhuu naagataati {bhikkhuu navaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), bhikkhuu gataati (?)} yaava suuriyuggamanaa kaakacchamaanaa supatha? ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m ^a^V2.0020^ea^ vaa -- `raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto {muddhaabhisitto (ka0)} yaavadattha.m seyyasukha.m ^a^P3.0300^ea^ passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharanto yaavajiiva.m rajja.m kaarento janapadassa vaa piyo manaapo'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva ^a^T3.0335^ea^ di.t.tha.m na suta.m -- `raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto yaavadattha.m seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharanto yaavajiiva.m rajja.m kaarento janapadassa vaa piyo manaapo'''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa -- `ra.t.thiko...pe0... petta.niko... senaapatiko... gaamagaama.niko {gaamagaamiko (sii0 pii0)} ... puugagaama.niko yaavadattha.m seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharanto yaavajiiva.m puugagaama.nikatta.m kaarento puugassa vaa piyo manaapo'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m -- `puugagaama.niko yaavadattha.m seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharanto yaavajiiva.m puugagaama.nikatta.m vaa kaarento puugassa vaa piyo manaapo'''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^M2.0266^ea^ ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa -- `sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa yaavadattha.m seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto indriyesu aguttadvaaro bhojane amatta~n~nuu jaagariya.m ananuyutto avipassako kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pubbarattaapararatta.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m {bodhapakkhiyaana.m (sii0), bodhapakkhikaana.m (pii0)} dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyoga.m ananuyutto aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanto'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m ^a^P3.0301^ea^ -- `sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa yaavadattha.m seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto indriyesu aguttadvaaro bhojane amatta~n~nuu jaagariya.m ananuyutto avipassako kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pubbarattaapararatta.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyoga.m ananuyutto ^a^T3.0336^ea^ aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanto'''ti.

[01] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `indriyesu guttadvaaraa bhavissaama, bhojane matta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m anuyuttaa, vipassakaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m ^a^V2.0021^ea^, pubbarattaapararatta.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m, bhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m. addasaa kho bhagavaa addhaanamaggappa.tipanno a~n~natarasmi.m padese macchika.m macchabandha.m macche vadhitvaa vadhitvaa vikki.namaana.m. disvaa maggaa okkamma a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, amu.m macchika.m macchabandha.m macche vadhitvaa vadhitvaa vikki.namaana''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa -- `macchiko macchabandho macche vadhitvaa vadhitvaa ^a^P3.0302^ea^ vikki.namaano tena kammena tena aajiivena hatthiyaayii vaa assayaayii vaa rathayaayii vaa yaanayaayii vaa bhogabhogii vaa mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m ajjhaavasanto'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante'' ^a^M2.0267^ea^. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m -- `macchiko macchabandho macche vadhitvaa vadhitvaa vikki.namaano tena kammena tena aajiivena hatthiyaayii vaa assayaayii vaa rathayaayii vaa yaanayaayii vaa bhogabhogii ^a^T3.0337^ea^ vaa mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m ajjhaavasanto'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? te hi so, bhikkhave, macche vajjhe vadhaayupaniite {vadhaayaaniite (syaa0 ka.m0), vadhaaya niite (ka0)} paapakena manasaanupekkhati, tasmaa so neva hatthiyaayii hoti na assayaayii na rathayaayii na yaanayaayii na bhogabhogii, na mahanta.m bhogakkhandha.m ajjhaavasati.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa -- `goghaatako gaavo vadhitvaa vadhitvaa vikki.namaano tena kammena tena aajiivena hatthiyaayii vaa assayaayii vaa rathayaayii vaa yaanayaayii vaa bhogabhogii vaa mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m ajjhaavasanto'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m -- `goghaatako gaavo vadhitvaa vadhitvaa vikki.namaano tena kammena tena aajiivena hatthiyaayii vaa assayaayii vaa rathayaayii vaa yaanayaayii vaa bhogabhogii vaa mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m ajjhaavasanto'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? te hi so, bhikkhave, gaavo vajjhe vadhaayupaniite paapakena ^a^V2.0022^ea^ manasaanupekkhati, tasmaa so neva hatthiyaayii hoti na assayaayii na rathayaayii na yaanayaayii na bhogabhogii, na mahanta.m bhogakkhandha.m ajjhaavasati''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu tumhehi di.t.tha.m vaa ^a^P3.0303^ea^ suta.m vaa -- `orabbhiko...pe0... suukariko {sokariko (syaa0)} ...pe0... saaku.niko...pe0... maagaviko mage {mige (syaa0 ka.m0)} vadhitvaa vadhitvaa vikki.namaano tena kammena tena aajiivena hatthiyaayii vaa assayaayii vaa rathayaayii vaa yaanayaayii ^a^T3.0338^ea^ vaa bhogabhogii vaa mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m ajjhaavasanto'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaapi kho eta.m, bhikkhave, neva di.t.tha.m na suta.m -- `maagaviko mage vadhitvaa vadhitvaa vikki.namaano tena kammena tena aajiivena hatthiyaayii vaa assayaayii vaa rathayaayii vaa yaanayaayii vaa bhogabhogii vaa mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m ajjhaavasanto'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? te hi so, bhikkhave, mage vajjhe vadhaayupaniite paapakena manasaanupekkhati, tasmaa so neva hatthiyaayii hoti na assayaayii na rathayaayii na yaanayaayii ^a^M2.0268^ea^ na bhogabhogii, na mahanta.m bhogakkhandha.m ajjhaavasati. te hi (naama) {( ) bahuusu natthi} so, bhikkhave, tiracchaanagate paa.ne vajjhe vadhaayupaniite paapakena manasaanupekkhamaano {manasaanupekkhati, tasmaa so (syaa0 ka0)} neva hatthiyaayii bhavissati {hoti (syaa0 ka0)} na assayaayii na rathayaayii na yaanayaayii na bhogabhogii, na mahanta.m bhogakkhandha.m ajjhaavasissati {ajjhaavasati (syaa0 ka0)}. ko pana vaado ya.m manussabhuuta.m vajjha.m vadhaayupaniita.m paapakena manasaanupekkhati! ta~nhi tassa {ta.m hissa (pii0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, hoti diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naatike {naadike (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) a0 ni0 8.73} viharati gi~njakaavasathe. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti ^a^P3.0304^ea^. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``mara.nassati, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa. bhaavetha no tumhe, bhikkhave, mara.nassati''nti?

[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu ^a^T3.0339^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha.m kho, bhante, bhaavemi mara.nassati''nti. ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaavesi mara.nassati''nti? ``idha mayha.m, bhante ^a^V2.0023^ea^, eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m rattindiva.m jiiveyya.m, bhagavato saasana.m manasi kareyya.m, bahu vata me kata.m assaa'ti. eva.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhaavemi mara.nassati''nti.

[03] a~n~nataropi kho bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ahampi kho, bhante, bhaavemi mara.nassati''nti. ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, bhikkhu, bhaavesi mara.nassati''nti ^a^M2.0269^ea^? ``idha mayha.m, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `aho vataaha.m tadantara.m jiiveyya.m yadantara.m ekapi.n.dapaata.m bhu~njaami, bhagavato saasana.m manasi kareyya.m, bahu vata me kata.m assaa'ti. eva.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhaavemi mara.nassati''nti.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naatike viharati gi~njakaavasathe. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``mara.nassati, bhikkhave, bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa. katha.m bhaavitaa ca, bhikkhave, mara.nassati katha.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa?

[03] ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu divase nikkhante rattiyaa patihitaaya {pa.tigataaya (ka0) a0 ni0 8.74} iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `bahukaa kho me paccayaa mara.nassa -- ahi vaa ma.m .da.mseyya, vicchiko vaa ma.m .da.mseyya, satapadii vaa ma.m .da.mseyya; tena me assa kaalakiriyaa ^a^M2.0271^ea^, so mamassa antaraayo. upakkhalitvaa ^a^T3.0342^ea^ vaa papateyya.m, bhatta.m vaa me bhutta.m byaapajjeyya, pitta.m vaa me kuppeyya ^a^P3.0307^ea^, semha.m vaa me kuppeyya, satthakaa vaa me vaataa kuppeyyu.m; tena me assa kaalakiriyaa, so mamassa antaraayo'ti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhitabba.m -- `atthi nu kho me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiinaa, ye me assu ratti.m kaala.m karontassa antaraayaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `atthi me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiinaa, ye me assu ratti.m kaala.m karontassa antaraayaayaa'ti, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aadittacelo vaa aadittasiiso vaa tasseva celassa vaa siisassa vaa nibbaapanaaya adhimatta.m chanda~nca vaayaama~nca ussaaha~nca usso.lhi~nca appa.tivaani~nca sati~nca sampaja~n~na~nca kareyya; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tena bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``sace ^a^V2.0026^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `natthi me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiinaa, ye me assu ratti.m kaala.m karontassa antaraayaayaa'ti, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``idha ^a^T3.0343^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rattiyaa nikkhantaaya divase patihite iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `bahukaa kho me paccayaa mara.nassa -- ahi vaa ma.m .da.mseyya, vicchiko vaa ma.m .da.mseyya, satapadii vaa ma.m .da.mseyya; tena me assa kaalakiriyaa so mamassa antaraayo. upakkhalitvaa vaa papateyya.m, bhatta.m vaa me bhutta.m byaapajjeyya, pitta.m vaa me kuppeyya, semha.m vaa me kuppeyya, satthakaa vaa me vaataa kuppeyyu.m; tena me assa kaalakiriyaa so mamassa antaraayo'ti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhitabba.m ^a^P3.0308^ea^ -- `atthi nu kho me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiinaa, ye me assu divaa kaala.m karontassa antaraayaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``sace ^a^M2.0272^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `atthi me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiinaa, ye me assu divaa kaala.m karontassa antaraayaayaa'ti, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aadittacelo vaa aadittasiiso vaa tasseva celassa vaa siisassa vaa nibbaapanaaya adhimatta.m chanda~nca vaayaama~nca ussaaha~nca usso.lhi~nca appa.tivaani~nca sati~nca sampaja~n~na~nca kareyya; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tena bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ^a^T3.0344^ea^ ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `natthi me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiinaa, ye me assu divaa kaala.m karontassa antaraayaayaa'ti, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, mara.nassati eva.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa''ti. dasama.m.
[06] saara.niiyavaggo dutiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m ^a^V2.0027^ea^ --
[21] dve saara.nii nisaara.niiya.m, bhaddaka.m anutappiya.m.
[22] nakula.m soppamacchaa ca, dve honti mara.nassatiiti..

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0028^ea^ ^a^P3.0309^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati saamagaamake pokkhara.niyaaya.m. atha kho a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m pokkhara.niya.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^M2.0273^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``tayome, bhante, dhammaa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame tayo? kammaaraamataa, bhassaaraamataa ^a^T3.0345^ea^, niddaaraamataa -- ime kho, bhante, tayo dhammaa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. idamavoca saa devataa. samanu~n~no satthaa ahosi. atha kho saa devataa ``samanu~n~no me satthaa''ti bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ima.m, bhikkhave, ratti.m a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m pokkhara.niya.m obhaasetvaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho, bhikkhave, saa devataa ma.m etadavoca -- `tayome, bhante, dhammaa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame tayo? kammaaraamataa, bhassaaraamataa, niddaaraamataa -- ime kho, bhante, tayo dhammaa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattantii'ti. idamavoca, bhikkhave, saa devataa. ida.m vatvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi. tesa.m vo {kho (ka0)}, bhikkhave, alaabhaa tesa.m dulladdha.m, ye vo devataapi jaananti kusalehi dhammehi parihaayamaane''.

[03] ``aparepi, bhikkhave, tayo parihaaniye dhamme desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca ^a^V2.0029^ea^ -- ``katame ^a^P3.0310^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, tayo parihaaniyaa dhammaa? sa"nga.nikaaraamataa, dovacassataa, paapamittataa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo parihaaniyaa dhammaa''.

[03] ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m parihaayi.msu kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva ^a^T3.0346^ea^ chahi dhammehi parihaayi.msu kusalehi dhammehi. yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m parihaayissanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihaayissanti kusalehi ^a^M2.0274^ea^ dhammehi. yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi parihaayanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi parihaayanti kusalehi dhammehii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ ``chayime, bhikkhave, aparihaaniye dhamme desessaami, ta.m su.naatha...pe0... katame ca, bhikkhave, cha aparihaaniyaa dhammaa? na kammaaraamataa, na bhassaaraamataa, na niddaaraamataa, na sa"nga.nikaaraamataa, sovacassataa, kalyaa.namittataa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cha aparihaaniyaa dhammaa.

[01] ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m na parihaayi.msu kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihaayi.msu kusalehi dhammehi. yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m na parihaayissanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihaayissanti kusalehi dhammehi. yepi hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi na parihaayanti kusalehi dhammehi, sabbete imeheva chahi dhammehi na parihaayanti kusalehi dhammehii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ```bhaya'nti, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m; `dukkha'nti, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m; `rogo'ti, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m; `ga.n.do'ti, bhikkhave ^a^P3.0311^ea^, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m; `sa"ngo'ti, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m; `pa"nko'ti, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m.

[03] ``kasmaa ^a^V2.0030^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, `bhaya'nti kaamaanameta.m ^a^T3.0347^ea^ adhivacana.m? kaamaraagarattaaya.m, bhikkhave, chandaraagavinibaddho di.t.thadhammikaapi bhayaa na parimuccati, samparaayikaapi bhayaa na parimuccati, tasmaa `bhaya'nti kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m. kasmaa ca, bhikkhave, dukkhanti...pe0... rogoti... ga.n.doti... sa"ngoti... pa"nkoti kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m? kaamaraagarattaaya.m, bhikkhave, chandaraagavinibaddho di.t.thadhammikaapi pa"nkaa na parimuccati, samparaayikaapi pa"nkaa na parimuccati, tasmaa `pa"nko'ti kaamaanameta.m adhivacana''nti.
[21] ``bhaya.m dukkha.m rogo ga.n.do, sa"ngo pa"nko ca ubhaya.m.
[22] ete kaamaa pavuccanti, yattha satto puthujjano..
[21] ``upaadaane ^a^M2.0275^ea^ bhaya.m disvaa, jaatimara.nasambhave.
[22] anupaadaa vimuccanti, jaatimara.nasa"nkhaye..
[21] ``te khemappattaa sukhino, di.t.thadhammaabhinibbutaa.
[22] sabbaverabhayaatiitaa {sabbe verabhayaatiitaa (syaa0)}, sabbadukkha.m upaccagu''nti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu himavanta.m pabbataraaja.m padaaleyya, ko pana vaado chavaaya avijjaaya! katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samaadhissa samaapattikusalo hoti, samaadhissa .thitikusalo hoti, samaadhissa vu.t.thaanakusalo hoti, samaadhissa kallitakusalo {kallataakusalo (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) sa.m0 ni0 3.665 passitabba.m} hoti, samaadhissa gocarakusalo hoti, samaadhissa abhiniihaarakusalo hoti. imehi ^a^P3.0312^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu himavanta.m pabbataraaja.m padaaleyya, ko pana vaado chavaaya avijjaayaa''ti! catuttha.m.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ ``chayimaani ^a^T3.0348^ea^, bhikkhave, anussati.t.thaanaani. katamaani cha? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako ^a^V2.0031^ea^ tathaagata.m anussarati -- `itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako tathaagata.m anussarati, nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti, nikkhanta.m mutta.m vu.t.thita.m gedhamhaa. `gedho'ti kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m. idampi kho, bhikkhave, aaramma.na.m karitvaa evamidhekacce sattaa visujjhanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako dhamma.m anussarati -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo...pe0... paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti. yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako dhamma.m anussarati, nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti ^a^M2.0276^ea^; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti, nikkhanta.m mutta.m vu.t.thita.m gedhamhaa. `gedho'ti kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m. idampi kho, bhikkhave, aaramma.na.m karitvaa evamidhekacce sattaa visujjhanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako sa"ngha.m anussarati -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'ti. yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye ^a^P3.0313^ea^ ariyasaavako sa"ngha.m anussarati, nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m ^a^T3.0349^ea^ citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti, nikkhanta.m mutta.m vu.t.thita.m gedhamhaa. `gedho'ti kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m. idampi kho, bhikkhave, aaramma.na.m karitvaa evamidhekacce sattaa visujjhanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako attano siilaani anussarati akha.n.daani...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikaani. yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako siila.m anussarati, nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti, nikkhanta.m mutta.m vu.t.thita.m gedhamhaa. `gedho'ti kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m. idampi kho, bhikkhave, aaramma.na.m karitvaa evamidhekacce sattaa visujjhanti.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0032^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako attano caaga.m anussarati -- `laabhaa vata me! suladdha.m vata me...pe0... yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato'ti. yasmi.m...pe0... evamidhekacce sattaa visujjhanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako devataa anussarati -- `santi devaa caatumahaaraajikaa ^a^T3.0350^ea^, santi devaa taavati.msaa, santi devaa yaamaa, santi devaa tusitaa, santi devaa nimmaanaratino, santi devaa paranimmitavasavattino, santi devaa brahmakaayikaa ^a^P3.0314^ea^, santi devaa tatuttari. yathaaruupaaya saddhaaya samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tattha upapannaa; mayhampi tathaaruupaa saddhaa sa.mvijjati. yathaaruupena siilena... sutena... caagena... pa~n~naaya samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tattha upapannaa; mayhampi tathaaruupaa pa~n~naa sa.mvijjatii''' ti.

[03] ``yasmi.m ^a^M2.0277^ea^, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako attano ca taasa~nca devataana.m saddha~nca siila~nca suta~nca caaga~nca pa~n~na~nca anussarati nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti, nikkhanta.m mutta.m vu.t.thita.m gedhamhaa. `gedho'ti kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m. idampi kho, bhikkhave, aaramma.na.m karitvaa evamidhekacce sattaa visujjhanti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cha anussati.t.thaanaanii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaakaccaanassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa mahaakaccaano etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, aavuso; abbhuta.m, aavuso! yaava~ncida.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sambaadhe okaasaadhigamo anubuddho sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m ^a^T3.0351^ea^ samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m cha anussati.t.thaanaani.

[03] ``katamaani cha? idhaavuso, ariyasaavako tathaagata.m anussarati -- `itipi so bhagavaa ^a^V2.0033^ea^ ...pe0... satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. yasmi.m, aavuso, samaye ariyasaavako tathaagata.m anussarati nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m ^a^P3.0315^ea^ citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti, nikkhanta.m mutta.m vu.t.thita.m gedhamhaa. `gedho'ti kho, aavuso, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m. sa kho so, aavuso, ariyasaavako sabbaso aakaasasamena cetasaa viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena. idampi kho, aavuso, aaramma.na.m karitvaa evamidhekacce sattaa visuddhidhammaa bhavanti.
