[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, ariyasaavako sa"ngha.m anussarati -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'ti. yasmi.m, aavuso, samaye ariyasaavako sa"ngha.m anussarati nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti, nikkhanta.m mutta.m vu.t.thita.m gedhamhaa. `gedho'ti kho, aavuso, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m. sa kho so, aavuso, ariyasaavako sabbaso aakaasasamena cetasaa viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena. idampi kho, aavuso, aaramma.na.m ^a^P3.0316^ea^ karitvaa evamidhekacce sattaa visuddhidhammaa bhavanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, ariyasaavako attano siilaani anussarati akha.n.daani...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikaani. yasmi.m, aavuso, samaye ariyasaavako attano siila.m ^a^V2.0034^ea^ anussarati nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti, nikkhanta.m mutta.m vu.t.thita.m gedhamhaa. `gedho'ti kho, aavuso, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m. sa kho so, aavuso, ariyasaavako sabbaso aakaasasamena cetasaa viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena. idampi kho, aavuso, aaramma.na.m karitvaa ^a^T3.0353^ea^ evamidhekacce sattaa visuddhidhammaa bhavanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, ariyasaavako attano caaga.m anussarati -- `laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me...pe0... yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato'ti. yasmi.m, aavuso, samaye ariyasaavako attano caaga.m anussarati nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na ^a^M2.0279^ea^ dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti, nikkhanta.m mutta.m vu.t.thita.m gedhamhaa. `gedho'ti kho, aavuso, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m. sa kho so, aavuso, ariyasaavako sabbaso aakaasasamena cetasaa viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena. idampi kho, aavuso, aaramma.na.m karitvaa evamidhekacce sattaa visuddhidhammaa bhavanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, ariyasaavako devataa anussarati -- `santi devaa caatumahaaraajikaa, santi devaa...pe0... tatuttari. yathaaruupaaya saddhaaya samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tattha upapannaa; mayhampi tathaaruupaa saddhaa sa.mvijjati ^a^P3.0317^ea^. yathaaruupena siilena...pe0... sutena... caagena... pa~n~naaya samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tattha upapannaa; mayhampi tathaaruupaa pa~n~naa sa.mvijjatii'ti. yasmi.m, aavuso, samaye ariyasaavako attano ca taasa~nca devataana.m saddha~nca siila~nca suta~nca caaga~nca pa~n~na~nca anussarati nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti ^a^T3.0354^ea^, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti, nikkhanta.m mutta.m vu.t.thita.m gedhamhaa. `gedho'ti kho, aavuso, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m. sa kho so, aavuso, ariyasaavako sabbaso aakaasasamena cetasaa viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena. idampi kho, aavuso, aaramma.na.m karitvaa evamidhekacce sattaa visuddhidhammaa bhavanti.

[03] ``acchariya.m ^a^V2.0035^ea^, aavuso; abbhuta.m, aavuso! yaava~ncida.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sambaadhe okaasaadhigamo anubuddho sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m cha anussati.t.thaanaanii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ^a^M2.0280^ea^ so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kati nu kho, bhante, samayaa manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti? ``chayime, bhikkhu, samayaa manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m''.

[03] ``katame cha? idha, bhikkhu, yasmi.m samaye bhikkhu kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati tasmi.m samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m kho, aavuso, kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa ^a^T3.0355^ea^ viharaami kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca ^a^P3.0318^ea^ kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaami. saadhu vata me, aayasmaa, kaamaraagassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desetuu'ti. tassa manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu kaamaraagassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m deseti. aya.m, bhikkhu, pa.thamo samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhu, yasmi.m samaye bhikkhu byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati byaapaadaparetena, uppannassa ca byaapaadassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati tasmi.m samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m kho, aavuso, byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharaami byaapaadaparetena, uppannassa ca byaapaadassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaami. saadhu vata me, aayasmaa, byaapaadassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desetuu'ti. tassa manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu byaapaadassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m deseti. aya.m, bhikkhu, dutiyo samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0036^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhu, yasmi.m samaye bhikkhu thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati thinamiddhaparetena, uppannassa ca thinamiddhassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati tasmi.m samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m kho, aavuso, thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharaami thinamiddhaparetena, uppannassa ca thinamiddhassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaami. saadhu vata me, aayasmaa, thinamiddhassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desetuu'ti. tassa manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu thinamiddhassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m ^a^M2.0281^ea^ deseti ^a^T3.0356^ea^. aya.m, bhikkhu, tatiyo samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhu, yasmi.m samaye bhikkhu uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati uddhaccakukkuccaparetena, uppannassa ca uddhaccakukkuccassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati tasmi.m samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m kho, aavuso, uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharaami uddhaccakukkuccaparetena, uppannassa ca uddhaccakukkuccassa ^a^P3.0319^ea^ nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaami. saadhu vata me, aayasmaa, uddhaccakukkuccassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desetuu'ti. tassa manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu uddhaccakukkuccassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m deseti. aya.m, bhikkhu, catuttho samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhu, yasmi.m samaye bhikkhu vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati tasmi.m samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m, aavuso, vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharaami vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaami. saadhu vata me, aayasmaa, vicikicchaaya pahaanaaya dhamma.m desetuu'ti. tassa manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu vicikicchaaya pahaanaaya dhamma.m deseti. aya.m, bhikkhu, pa~ncamo samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhu, yasmi.m samaye bhikkhu ya.m nimitta.m aagamma ya.m nimitta.m manasikaroto anantaraa aasavaana.m khayo hoti ta.m nimitta.m nappajaanaati tasmi.m samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m kho, aavuso, ya.m nimitta.m aagamma ^a^V2.0037^ea^ ya.m nimitta.m ^a^T3.0357^ea^ manasikaroto anantaraa aasavaana.m khayo hoti, ta.m nimitta.m nappajaanaami. saadhu vata me, aayasmaa, aasavaana.m khayaaya dhamma.m desetuu'ti. tassa manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaaya dhamma.m deseti. aya.m, bhikkhu, cha.t.tho samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. ime kho, bhikkhu, cha samayaa manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M2.0282^ea^ ^a^P3.0320^ea^ samaya.m sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu baaraa.nasiya.m viharanti isipatane migadaaye. atha kho tesa.m theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaana.m ma.n.dalamaa.le sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- ``ko nu kho, aavuso, samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti?

[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``yasmi.m, aavuso, samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto paade pakkhaaletvaa nisinno hoti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa, so samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti.

[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``na kho, aavuso ^a^T3.0358^ea^, so samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. yasmi.m, aavuso, samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto paade pakkhaaletvaa nisinno hoti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa, caarittakilamathopissa tasmi.m samaye appa.tippassaddho hoti, bhattakilamathopissa tasmi.m samaye appa.tippassaddho hoti. tasmaa so asamayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. yasmi.m, aavuso, samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito vihaarapacchaayaaya.m nisinno hoti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa, so samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti.

[03] eva.m ^a^V2.0038^ea^ vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``na kho, aavuso, so samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. yasmi.m, aavuso, samaye manobhaavaniiyo ^a^P3.0321^ea^ bhikkhu saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito vihaarapacchaayaaya.m nisinno hoti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa, yadevassa divaa samaadhinimitta.m manasikata.m hoti tadevassa tasmi.m samaye samudaacarati. tasmaa so asamayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya ^a^M2.0283^ea^ upasa"nkamitu.m. yasmi.m, aavuso, samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya nisinno hoti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa, so samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti.

[03] eva.m ^a^T3.0359^ea^ vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``na kho, aavuso, so samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. yasmi.m, aavuso, samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya nisinno hoti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa, oja.t.thaayissa tasmi.m samaye kaayo hoti phaasussa hoti buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi kaatu.m. tasmaa so asamayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa mahaakaccaano there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``sammukhaa meta.m, aavuso, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `chayime, bhikkhu, samayaa manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m'''.

[03] ``katame cha? idha, bhikkhu, yasmi.m samaye bhikkhu kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, tasmi.m samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m kho, aavuso, kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharaami kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaami. saadhu vata ^a^P3.0322^ea^ me aayasmaa kaamaraagassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desetuu'ti. tassa manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu kaamaraagassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m deseti. aya.m, bhikkhu, pa.thamo samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0039^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhu, yasmi.m samaye bhikkhu byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati...pe0... thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa ^a^T3.0360^ea^ viharati... uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati... vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati... ya.m nimitta.m aagamma ^a^M2.0284^ea^ ya.m nimitta.m manasikaroto anantaraa aasavaana.m khayo hoti, ta.m nimitta.m na jaanaati na passati, tasmi.m samaye manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `aha.m kho, aavuso, ya.m nimitta.m aagamma ya.m nimitta.m manasikaroto anantaraa aasavaana.m khayo hoti ta.m nimitta.m na jaanaami na passaami. saadhu vata me aayasmaa aasavaana.m khayaaya dhamma.m desetuu'ti. tassa manobhaavaniiyo bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaaya dhamma.m deseti. aya.m, bhikkhu, cha.t.tho samayo manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m.
[03] ``sammukhaa meta.m, aavuso, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- `ime kho, bhikkhu, cha samayaa manobhaavaniiyassa bhikkhuno dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu'''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aamantesi -- ``kati nu kho, udaayi, anussati.t.thaanaanii''ti? eva.m vutte aayasmaa udaayii tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aamantesi -- ``kati nu kho, udaayi, anussati.t.thaanaanii''ti? dutiyampi kho aayasmaa udaayii tu.nhii ahosi. tatiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m aamantesi -- ``kati nu kho, udaayi, anussati.t.thaanaanii''ti? tatiyampi kho aayasmaa udaayii tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ta.m, aavuso udaayi, aamantesii''ti. ``su.nomaha.m ^a^T3.0361^ea^, aavuso aananda, bhagavato. idha ^a^P3.0323^ea^, bhante, bhikkhu anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati -- seyyathida.m ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0.... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. ida.m, bhante, anussati.t.thaana''nti.

[03] atha ^a^V2.0040^ea^ kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``a~n~naasi.m kho aha.m, aananda -- `nevaaya.m udaayii moghapuriso adhicitta.m anuyutto viharatii'ti. kati nu kho, aananda, anussati.t.thaanaanii''ti?

[03] ``pa~nca, bhante, anussati.t.thaanaani. katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhante, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m, bhante, anussati.t.thaana.m eva.m bhaavita.m eva.m bahuliikata.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, bhikkhu aalokasa~n~na.m manasi karoti, divaa sa~n~na.m adhi.t.thaati, yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa; iti viva.tena cetasaa ^a^M2.0285^ea^ apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti. ida.m, bhante, anussati.t.thaana.m eva.m bhaavita.m eva.m bahuliikata.m ~naa.nadassanappa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m uddha.m paadatalaa adho kesamatthakaa tacapariyanta.m puura.m naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru {nahaaru (sii0 pii0) dii0 ni0 2.377; ma0 ni0 1.110} a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta'nti. ida.m, bhante ^a^T3.0362^ea^, anussati.t.thaana.m eva.m bhaavita.m eva.m bahuliikata.m kaamaraagappahaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, bhikkhu seyyathaapi passeyya sariira.m siivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m {cha.d.dita.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ekaahamata.m vaa dviihamata.m vaa ^a^P3.0324^ea^ tiihamata.m vaa uddhumaataka.m viniilaka.m vipubbakajaata.m. so imameva kaaya.m eva.m {evanti ida.m satipa.t.thaanasuttaadiisu natthi} upasa.mharati -- `ayampi kho kaayo eva.mdhammo eva.mbhaavii eva.manatiito'''ti {eta.m anatiitoti (sii0)}.

[03] ``seyyathaapi vaa pana {seyyathaa vaa pana (syaa0)} passeyya sariira.m siivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m kaakehi vaa khajjamaana.m kulalehi vaa khajjamaana.m gijjhehi vaa khajjamaana.m sunakhehi vaa khajjamaana.m si"ngaalehi {sigaalehi (sii0)} vaa khajjamaana.m ^a^V2.0041^ea^ vividhehi vaa paa.nakajaatehi khajjamaana.m. so imameva kaaya.m eva.m upasa.mharati -- `ayampi kho kaayo eva.mdhammo eva.mbhaavii eva.manatiito'''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi vaa pana passeyya sariira.m siivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m sama.msalohita.m nhaarusambandha.m...pe0... a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m nimma.msalohitamakkhita.m nhaarusambandha.m... a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m apagatama.msalohita.m nhaarusambandha.m. a.t.thikaani apagatasambandhaani disaavidisaavikkhittaani {disaavidisaasu vikkhittaani (sii0)}, a~n~nena hattha.t.thika.m a~n~nena paada.t.thika.m a~n~nena ja"ngha.t.thika.m a~n~nena uuru.t.thika.m a~n~nena ka.ti.t.thika.m {ka.ta.t.thika.m (sii0)} a~n~nena {pi.t.thika.n.daka.m a~n~nena siisaka.taaha.m (sii0 pii0), pi.t.thika.n.daka.t.thika.m a~n~nena siisaka.taaha.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} phaasuka.t.thika.m ^a^M2.0286^ea^ a~n~nena pi.t.thika.n.taka.t.thika.m a~n~nena khandha.t.thika.m a~n~nena giiva.t.thika.m a~n~nena hanuka.t.thika.m a~n~nena dantaka.t.thika.m a~n~nena siisaka.taaha.m {pi.t.thika.n.daka.m a~n~nena siisaka.taaha.m (sii0 pii0), pi.t.thika.n.daka.t.thika.m a~n~nena siisaka.taaha.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}, a.t.thikaani setaani sa"nkhava.n.nappa.tibhaagaani {sa"nkhava.n.nuupanibhaani (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} a.t.thikaani pu~njakitaani {pu~njakataani (pii0)} terovassikaani a.t.thikaani puutiini cu.n.nakajaataani. so imameva ^a^T3.0363^ea^ kaaya.m eva.m upasa.mharati -- `ayampi ^a^P3.0325^ea^ kho kaayo eva.mdhammo eva.mbhaavii eva.manatiito'ti. ida.m, bhante, anussati.t.thaana.m eva.m bhaavita.m eva.m bahuliikata.m asmimaanasamugghaataaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m, bhante, anussati.t.thaana.m eva.m bhaavita.m eva.m bahuliikata.m anekadhaatupa.tivedhaaya sa.mvattati. imaani kho, bhante, pa~nca anussati.t.thaanaanii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, saadhu, aananda! tena hi tva.m, aananda, idampi cha.t.tha.m anussati.t.thaana.m dhaarehi. idhaananda, bhikkhu satova abhikkamati satova pa.tikkamati satova ti.t.thati satova nisiidati satova seyya.m kappeti satova kamma.m adhi.t.thaati. ida.m, aananda, anussati.t.thaana.m eva.m bhaavita.m eva.m bahuliikata.m satisampaja~n~naaya sa.mvattatii''ti. navama.m.
[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ``chayimaani, bhikkhave, anuttariyaani. katamaani cha? dassanaanuttariya.m, savanaanuttariya.m, laabhaanuttariya.m, sikkhaanuttariya.m, paaricariyaanuttariya.m, anussataanuttariyanti.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^V2.0042^ea^, bhikkhave, dassanaanuttariya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco hatthiratanampi dassanaaya gacchati, assaratanampi dassanaaya gacchati, ma.niratanampi dassanaaya gacchati, uccaavaca.m vaa pana dassanaaya gacchati, sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa micchaadi.t.thika.m micchaapa.tipanna.m dassanaaya gacchati. attheta.m, bhikkhave, dassana.m; neta.m natthiiti vadaami. ta~nca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, dassana.m hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na ^a^T3.0364^ea^ upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya ^a^P3.0326^ea^ sa.mvattati. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, tathaagata.m vaa tathaagatasaavaka.m vaa dassanaaya gacchati ^a^M2.0287^ea^ nivi.t.thasaddho nivi.t.thapemo ekantagato abhippasanno, etadaanuttariya.m, bhikkhave, dassanaana.m sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m {sokapariddavaana.m (sii0)} samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya {atthagamaaya (sii0)} ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m tathaagata.m vaa tathaagatasaavaka.m vaa dassanaaya gacchati nivi.t.thasaddho nivi.t.thapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dassanaanuttariya.m. iti dassanaanuttariya.m.

[03] ``savanaanuttariya~nca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco bherisaddampi {bherisaddassapi (ka0) eva.m vii.naasaddampiiccaadiisupi} savanaaya gacchati, vii.naasaddampi savanaaya gacchati, giitasaddampi savanaaya gacchati, uccaavaca.m vaa pana savanaaya gacchati, sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa micchaadi.t.thikassa micchaapa.tipannassa dhammassavanaaya gacchati. attheta.m, bhikkhave, savana.m; neta.m natthiiti vadaami. ta~nca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, savana.m hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa vaa tathaagatasaavakassa vaa dhammassavanaaya gacchati nivi.t.thasaddho nivi.t.thapemo ekantagato abhippasanno, etadaanuttariya.m, bhikkhave, savanaana.m sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m tathaagatassa vaa tathaagatasaavakassa vaa dhammassavanaaya gacchati ^a^T3.0365^ea^ nivi.t.thasaddho nivi.t.thapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, savanaanuttariya.m. iti dassanaanuttariya.m, savanaanuttariya.m.

[03] ``laabhaanuttariya~nca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puttalaabhampi labhati, daaralaabhampi labhati, dhanalaabhampi labhati, uccaavaca.m vaa pana ^a^P3.0327^ea^ laabha.m labhati, sama.ne vaa braahma.ne ^a^V2.0043^ea^ vaa micchaadi.t.thike micchaapa.tipanne saddha.m pa.tilabhati. attheso, bhikkhave, laabho; neso natthiiti vadaami. so ca kho eso, bhikkhave, laabho hiino gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasa.mhito, na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaavake vaa ^a^M2.0288^ea^ saddha.m pa.tilabhati nivi.t.thasaddho nivi.t.thapemo ekantagato abhippasanno, etadaanuttariya.m, bhikkhave, laabhaana.m sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m tathaagate vaa tathaagatasaavake vaa saddha.m pa.tilabhati nivi.t.thasaddho nivi.t.thapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, laabhaanuttariya.m. iti dassanaanuttariya.m, savanaanuttariya.m, laabhaanuttariya.m.

[03] ``sikkhaanuttariya~nca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco hatthismimpi sikkhati, assasmimpi sikkhati, rathasmimpi sikkhati, dhanusmimpi sikkhati, tharusmimpi sikkhati, uccaavaca.m vaa pana sikkhati, sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa micchaadi.t.thikassa micchaapa.tipannassa {micchaapa.tipatti.m (ka0)} sikkhati. atthesaa, bhikkhave, sikkhaa; nesaa natthiiti ^a^T3.0366^ea^ vadaami. saa ca kho esaa, bhikkhave, sikkhaa hiinaa gammaa pothujjanikaa anariyaa anatthasa.mhitaa, na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye adhisiilampi sikkhati, adhicittampi sikkhati, adhipa~n~nampi sikkhati nivi.t.thasaddho nivi.t.thapemo ekantagato abhippasanno, etadaanuttariya.m, bhikkhave, sikkhaana.m sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya ^a^P3.0328^ea^, yadida.m tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye adhisiilampi sikkhati, adhicittampi sikkhati, adhipa~n~nampi sikkhati, nivi.t.thasaddho nivi.t.thapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sikkhaanuttariya.m. iti dassanaanuttariya.m, savanaanuttariya.m, laabhaanuttariya.m, sikkhaanuttariya.m.

[03] ``paaricariyaanuttariya~nca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco khattiyampi paricarati, braahma.nampi paricarati, gahapatimpi paricarati, uccaavaca.m vaa pana paricarati, sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa micchaadi.t.thika.m micchaapa.tipanna.m paricarati. atthesaa, bhikkhave, paaricariyaa; nesaa natthiiti ^a^V2.0044^ea^ vadaami. saa ca kho esaa, bhikkhave, paaricariyaa hiinaa gammaa pothujjanikaa anariyaa anatthasa.mhitaa, na nibbidaaya...pe0... na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, tathaagata.m vaa tathaagatasaavaka.m vaa paricarati nivi.t.thasaddho nivi.t.thapemo ekantagato abhippasanno ^a^M2.0289^ea^, etadaanuttariya.m, bhikkhave, paaricariyaana.m sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m ^a^T3.0367^ea^ attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m tathaagata.m vaa tathaagatasaavaka.m vaa paricarati nivi.t.thasaddho nivi.t.thapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, paaricariyaanuttariya.m. iti dassanaanuttariya.m, savanaanuttariya.m, laabhaanuttariya.m, sikkhaanuttariya.m, paaricariyaanuttariya.m.

[03] ``anussataanuttariya~nca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puttalaabhampi anussarati, daaralaabhampi anussarati, dhanalaabhampi anussarati, uccaavaca.m vaa pana laabha.m anussarati, sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa micchaadi.t.thika.m micchaapa.tipanna.m anussarati. atthesaa, bhikkhave, anussati; nesaa natthiiti vadaami. saa ca kho esaa, bhikkhave, anussati hiinaa gammaa pothujjanikaa anariyaa anatthasa.mhitaa, na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, tathaagata.m vaa ^a^P3.0329^ea^ tathaagatasaavaka.m vaa anussarati nivi.t.thasaddho nivi.t.thapemo ekantagato abhippasanno, etadaanuttariya.m, bhikkhave, anussatiina.m sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, yadida.m tathaagata.m vaa tathaagatasaavaka.m vaa anussarati nivi.t.thasaddho nivi.t.thapemo ekantagato abhippasanno. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, anussataanuttariya.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cha anuttariyaanii''ti.
[21] ``ye dassanaanuttara.m ^a^T3.0368^ea^ laddhaa {ye dassanavara.m laddhaa (sii0 pii0), dassanaanuttariya.m laddhaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, savana~nca anuttara.m.
[22] laabhaanuttariya.m laddhaa, sikkhaanuttariye rataa {anuttariya.m tathaa (ka0)}..
[21] ``upa.t.thitaa paaricariyaa, bhaavayanti anussati.m.
[22] vivekappa.tisa.myutta.m, khema.m amatagaamini.m..
[21] ``appamaade ^a^V2.0045^ea^ pamuditaa, nipakaa siilasa.mvutaa.
[22] te ve kaalena paccenti {paccanti (syaa0 ka0)}, yattha dukkha.m nirujjhatii''ti.. dasama.m.
[06] anuttariyavaggo {saamakavaggo (ka0)} tatiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] saamako ^a^M2.0290^ea^ aparihaaniyo, bhaya.m himavaanussati.
[22] kaccaano dve ca samayaa, udaayii anuttariyenaati..

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ ``chayime ^a^V2.0046^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cha? kammaaraamataa ^a^P3.0330^ea^, bhassaaraamataa, niddaaraamataa, sa"nga.nikaaraamataa, indriyesu aguttadvaarataa, bhojane amatta~n~nutaa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``chayime, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cha? na kammaaraamataa, na bhassaaraamataa, na niddaaraamataa, na sa"nga.nikaaraamataa, indriyesu guttadvaarataa, bhojane matta~n~nutaa -- ime kho ^a^T3.0369^ea^, bhikkhave, cha dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``chayime, bhante, dhammaa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cha? satthugaaravataa, dhammagaaravataa, sa"nghagaaravataa, sikkhaagaaravataa, appamaadagaaravataa, pa.tisanthaaragaaravataa {pa.tisandhaaragaaravataa (ka0)} -- ime kho, bhante, cha dhammaa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. idamavoca saa devataa. samanu~n~no satthaa ahosi. atha kho saa devataa ``samanu~n~no me satthaa''ti bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.

[03] atha ^a^M2.0291^ea^ ^a^V2.0047^ea^ kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ima.m, bhikkhave, ratti.m a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho, bhikkhave, saa devataa ma.m etadavoca -- `chayime, bhante, dhammaa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cha? satthugaaravataa, dhammagaaravataa, sa"nghagaaravataa, sikkhaagaaravataa, appamaadagaaravataa, pa.tisanthaaragaaravataa -- ime ^a^P3.0331^ea^ kho, bhante, cha dhammaa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii'ti. idamavoca, bhikkhave, saa devataa. ida.m vatvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayii''ti.
[21] ``satthugaru ^a^T3.0370^ea^ dhammagaru, sa"nghe ca tibbagaaravo.
[27] appamaadagaru bhikkhu, pa.tisanthaaragaaravo.
[22] abhabbo parihaanaaya, nibbaanasseva santike''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ``ima.m, bhikkhave, ratti.m a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho, bhikkhave, saa devataa ma.m etadavoca -- `chayime, bhante, dhammaa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cha? satthugaaravataa, dhammagaaravataa, sa"nghagaaravataa, sikkhaagaaravataa, hirigaaravataa, ottappagaaravataa -- ime kho, bhante, cha dhammaa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii'ti. idamavoca, bhikkhave, saa devataa. ida.m vatvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayii''ti.
[21] ``satthugaru dhammagaru, sa"nghe ca tibbagaaravo.
[27] hiriottappasampanno, sappatisso sagaaravo.
[22] abhabbo parihaanaaya, nibbaanasseva santike''ti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0048^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa rahogatassa ^a^M2.0292^ea^ pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``katamesaana.m devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama {sotaapannaamhaa (sii0), sotaapannaamha (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'''ti ^a^P3.0332^ea^? tena kho pana samayena tisso naama bhikkhu adhunaakaala"nkato ^a^T3.0371^ea^ a~n~natara.m brahmaloka.m upapanno hoti. tatrapi na.m eva.m jaananti -- ``tisso brahmaa mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m {sammi~njita.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa baaha.m pasaareyya pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva.m -- jetavane antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi. addasaa kho tisso brahmaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``ehi kho, maarisa moggallaana; svaagata.m {saagata.m (sii0)}, maarisa moggallaana; cirassa.m kho, maarisa moggallaana; ima.m pariyaayamakaasi, yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. nisiida, maarisa moggallaana, idamaasana.m pa~n~natta''nti. nisiidi kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano pa~n~natte aasane. tissopi kho brahmaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho tissa.m brahmaana.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano etadavoca --

[03] ``katamesaana.m kho, tissa, devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'''ti? ``caatumahaaraajikaana.m kho, maarisa moggallaana, devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'''ti.

[03] ``sabbesa~n~neva nu kho, tissa, caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'''ti? ``na kho, maarisa moggallaana, sabbesa.m caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'ti. ye ^a^T3.0372^ea^ kho te, maarisa moggallaana, caatumahaaraajikaa ^a^V2.0049^ea^ devaa buddhe aveccappasaadena asamannaagataa dhamme aveccappasaadena asamannaagataa sa"nghe aveccappasaadena asamannaagataa ariyakantehi siilehi ^a^M2.0293^ea^ asamannaagataa na tesa.m devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m ^a^P3.0333^ea^ hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'ti. ye ca kho te, maarisa moggallaana, caatumahaaraajikaa devaa buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagataa, dhamme aveccappasaadena samannaagataa, sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagataa ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagataa, tesa.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'''ti.

[03] ``caatumahaaraajikaana~n~neva nu kho, tissa, devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'ti udaahu taavati.msaanampi devaana.m...pe0... yaamaanampi devaana.m... tusitaanampi devaana.m... nimmaanaratiinampi devaana.m... paranimmitavasavattiinampi devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'''ti? ``paranimmitavasavattiinampi kho, maarisa moggallaana, devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'''ti.

[03] ``sabbesa~n~neva nu kho, tissa, paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'''ti? ``na kho, maarisa moggallaana, sabbesa.m paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa ^a^T3.0373^ea^ sambodhiparaaya.naa'ti. ye kho te, maarisa moggallaana, paranimmitavasavattii devaa buddhe aveccappasaadena asamannaagataa, dhamme aveccappasaadena asamannaagataa, sa"nghe aveccappasaadena asamannaagataa, ariyakantehi siilehi asamannaagataa, na tesa.m devaana.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'ti. ye ca kho te, maarisa moggallaana, paranimmitavasavattii devaa buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagataa, dhamme aveccappasaadena samannaagataa, sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagataa, ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagataa tesa.m eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `sotaapannaa naama avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaaya.naa'''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tissassa brahmuno bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa ^a^V2.0050^ea^ -- ``seyyathaapi naama balavaa ^a^P3.0334^ea^ puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva.m -- `brahmaloke antarahito jetavane paaturahosii'''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ ``chayime ^a^M2.0294^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa vijjaabhaagiyaa. katame cha? aniccasa~n~naa, anicce dukkhasa~n~naa, dukkhe anattasa~n~naa, pahaanasa~n~naa, viraagasa~n~naa, nirodhasa~n~naa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhammaa vijjaabhaagiyaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ {dii0 ni0 3.325; ma0 ni0 3.44; cuu.lava0 216} ``chayimaani, bhikkhave, vivaadamuulaani. katamaani cha? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanaahii. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanaahii so sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaaravo ^a^T3.0374^ea^ viharati appatisso, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii hoti. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhamme agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghe agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaaya na paripuurakaarii so sa"nghe vivaada.m janeti, yo hoti vivaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. evaruupa.m ce tumhe, bhikkhave, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa samanupasseyyaatha. tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaanaaya vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa.m ce tumhe, bhikkhave, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa na samanupasseyyaatha, tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavaaya ^a^P3.0335^ea^ pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavo hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu makkhii hoti pa.laasii...pe0... issukii hoti maccharii... sa.tho hoti maayaavii... paapiccho hoti micchaadi.t.thi... sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii ^a^V2.0051^ea^ duppa.tinissaggii. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii, so sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii hoti. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo ^a^T3.0375^ea^ viharati appatisso, dhamme...pe0... sa"nghe agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaaya na paripuurakaarii, so sa"nghe vivaada.m janeti, yo hoti vivaado bahujanaahitaaya ^a^M2.0295^ea^ bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. evaruupa.m ce tumhe, bhikkhave, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa samanupasseyyaatha. tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaanaaya vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa.m ce tumhe, bhikkhave, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa na samanupasseyyaatha. tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavaaya pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavo hoti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cha vivaadamuulaanii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P3.0336^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena ve.luka.n.dakii {ve.luka.n.dakiyaa (a0 ni0 7.53; 2.134; sa.m0 ni0 2.173)} nandamaataa upaasikaa saariputtamoggallaanappamukhe bhikkhusa"nghe cha.la"ngasamannaagata.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapeti. addasaa kho bhagavaa dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena ve.luka.n.daki.m nandamaatara.m upaasika.m saariputtamoggallaanappamukhe bhikkhusa"nghe cha.la"ngasamannaagata.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapenti.m. disvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``esaa, bhikkhave, ve.luka.n.dakii nandamaataa upaasikaa saariputtamoggallaanappamukhe bhikkhusa"nghe cha.la"ngasamannaagata.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapeti''.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, cha.la"ngasamannaagataa dakkhi.naa hoti? idha, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0376^ea^, daayakassa tii.na"ngaani honti, pa.tiggaahakaana.m tii.na"ngaani. katamaani daayakassa tii.na"ngaani? idha, bhikkhave, daayako pubbeva daanaa sumano hoti, dada.m citta.m pasaadeti, datvaa attamano hoti. imaani daayakassa tii.na"ngaani.

[03] ``katamaani ^a^V2.0052^ea^ pa.tiggaahakaana.m tii.na"ngaani? idha, bhikkhave, pa.tiggaahakaa viitaraagaa vaa honti raagavinayaaya vaa pa.tipannaa, viitadosaa vaa honti dosavinayaaya vaa pa.tipannaa, viitamohaa vaa honti mohavinayaaya vaa pa.tipannaa. imaani pa.tiggaahakaana.m tii.na"ngaani. iti daayakassa tii.na"ngaani, pa.tiggaahakaana.m tii.na"ngaani. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, cha.la"ngasamannaagataa dakkhi.naa hoti.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^M2.0296^ea^ cha.la"ngasamannaagataaya, bhikkhave, dakkhi.naaya na sukara.m pu~n~nassa pamaa.na.m gahetu.m -- `ettako pu~n~naabhisando kusalaabhisando sukhassaahaaro sovaggiko sukhavipaako saggasa.mvattaniko i.t.thaaya kantaaya manaapaaya hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattatii'ti. atha kho asa"nkhyeyyo {asa"nkheyyo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} appameyyo mahaapu~n~nakkhandhotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde na sukara.m udakassa pamaa.na.m ^a^P3.0337^ea^ gahetu.m -- `ettakaani udakaa.lhakaaniiti vaa ettakaani udakaa.lhakasataaniiti vaa ettakaani udakaa.lhakasahassaaniiti vaa ettakaani udakaa.lhakasatasahassaanii'ti vaa. atha kho asa"nkhyeyyo appameyyo mahaaudakakkhandhotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, eva.m cha.la"ngasamannaagataaya dakkhi.naaya na sukara.m pu~n~nassa pamaa.na.m gahetu.m -- `ettako pu~n~naabhisando kusalaabhisando sukhassaahaaro sovaggiko sukhavipaako saggasa.mvattaniko i.t.thaaya kantaaya manaapaaya hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattatii'ti. atha ^a^T3.0377^ea^ kho asa"nkhyeyyo appameyyo mahaapu~n~nakkhandhotveva sa"nkha.m gacchatii''ti.
[21] {pe0 va0 305 petavatthumhipi} ``pubbeva daanaa sumano, dada.m citta.m pasaadaye.
[22] datvaa attamano hoti, esaa ya~n~nassa {pu~n~nassa (ka0)} sampadaa..
[21] ``viitaraagaa {viitaraago (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) eva.m anantarapadattayepi} viitadosaa, viitamohaa anaasavaa.
[22] khetta.m ya~n~nassa sampanna.m, sa~n~nataa brahmacaarayo {brahmacaarino (syaa0 ka.m0)}..
[21] ``saya.m aacamayitvaana, datvaa sakehi paa.nibhi.
[22] attano parato ceso, ya~n~no hoti mahapphalo..
[21] {a0 ni0 4.40} ``eva.m ^a^V2.0053^ea^ yajitvaa medhaavii, saddho muttena cetasaa.
[22] abyaapajja.m sukha.m loka.m, pa.n.dito upapajjatii''ti.. sattama.m.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so braahma.no bhagavanta.m ^a^M2.0297^ea^ etadavoca -- ``aha~nhi, bho gotama, eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- `natthi attakaaro, natthi parakaaro'''ti. ``maaha.m, braahma.na, eva.mvaadi.m eva.mdi.t.thi.m addasa.m vaa assosi.m vaa. katha~nhi naama ^a^P3.0338^ea^ saya.m abhikkamanto, saya.m pa.tikkamanto eva.m vakkhati -- `natthi attakaaro, natthi parakaaro'''ti!

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, atthi aarabbhadhaatuu''ti? ``eva.m, bho''. ``aarabbhadhaatuyaa sati aarabbhavanto sattaa pa~n~naayantii''ti? ``eva.m, bho''. ``ya.m kho, braahma.na, aarabbhadhaatuyaa sati aarabbhavanto sattaa pa~n~naayanti, aya.m sattaana.m attakaaro aya.m parakaaro''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, atthi nikkamadhaatu...pe0... atthi parakkamadhaatu... atthi thaamadhaatu... atthi .thitidhaatu... atthi upakkamadhaatuu''ti? ``eva.m, bho''. ``upakkamadhaatuyaa sati upakkamavanto sattaa pa~n~naayantii''ti? ``eva.m, bho''. ``ya.m kho, braahma.na, upakkamadhaatuyaa sati upakkamavanto sattaa pa~n~naayanti, aya.m sattaana.m ^a^T3.0378^ea^ attakaaro aya.m parakaaro''.

[03] ``maaha.m, braahma.na {ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi braahma.na maaha.m (ka0)}, eva.mvaadi.m eva.mdi.t.thi.m addasa.m vaa assosi.m vaa. katha~nhi naama saya.m abhikkamanto saya.m pa.tikkamanto eva.m vakkhati -- `natthi attakaaro natthi parakaaro'''ti.
[03] ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti! a.t.thama.m.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani ^a^V2.0054^ea^, bhikkhave, nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaaya. katamaani tii.ni? lobho nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya, doso nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya, moho nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya. na, bhikkhave, lobhaa alobho samudeti; atha kho, bhikkhave, lobhaa lobhova samudeti. na, bhikkhave, dosaa adoso samudeti; atha kho, bhikkhave, dosaa dosova samudeti. na, bhikkhave, mohaa amoho samudeti; atha kho, bhikkhave, mohaa mohova samudeti. na, bhikkhave, lobhajena ^a^P3.0339^ea^ kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena devaa pa~n~naayanti, manussaa pa~n~naayanti, yaa vaa pana~n~naapi kaaci sugatiyo. atha kho, bhikkhave, lobhajena kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena ^a^M2.0298^ea^ nirayo pa~n~naayati tiracchaanayoni pa~n~naayati pettivisayo pa~n~naayati, yaa vaa pana~n~naapi kaaci duggatiyo. imaani ^a^T3.0379^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaaya.

[03] ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaaya. katamaani tii.ni? alobho nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya, adoso nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya, amoho nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya. na, bhikkhave, alobhaa lobho samudeti; atha kho, bhikkhave, alobhaa alobhova samudeti. na, bhikkhave, adosaa doso samudeti; atha kho, bhikkhave, adosaa adosova samudeti. na, bhikkhave, amohaa moho samudeti; atha kho, bhikkhave, amohaa amohova samudeti. na, bhikkhave, alobhajena kammena adosajena kammena amohajena kammena nirayo pa~n~naayati tiracchaanayoni pa~n~naayati pettivisayo pa~n~naayati, yaa vaa pana~n~naapi kaaci duggatiyo. atha kho, bhikkhave, alobhajena kammena adosajena kammena amohajena kammena devaa pa~n~naayanti, manussaa pa~n~naayanti, yaa vaa pana~n~naapi kaaci sugatiyo. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaayaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kimilaaya.m viharati niculavane. atha kho aayasmaa kimilo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi ^a^V2.0055^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa kimilo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko ^a^P3.0340^ea^ nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti? ``idha, kimila, tathaagate parinibbute bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo satthari agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, dhamme agaaravaa viharanti ^a^T3.0380^ea^ appatissaa, sa"nghe agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, sikkhaaya agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, appamaade agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa, pa.tisanthaare {pa.tisandhaare (ka0) a0 ni0 5.201; 7.59} agaaravaa viharanti appatissaa. aya.m kho, kimila, hetu aya.m paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo na cira.t.thitiko hoti''.

[03] ``ko ^a^M2.0299^ea^ pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti? ``idha, kimila, tathaagate parinibbute bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo satthari sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, dhamme sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, sa"nghe sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, sikkhaaya sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, appamaade sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa, pa.tisanthaare sagaaravaa viharanti sappatissaa. aya.m kho, kimila, hetu aya.m paccayo yena tathaagate parinibbute saddhammo cira.t.thitiko hotii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa saariputto raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohanto addasa a~n~natarasmi.m padese mahanta.m daarukkhandha.m. disvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``passatha no, aavuso, tumhe amu.m mahanta.m daarukkhandha''nti? ``evamaavuso''ti.

[03] ``aaka"nkhamaano, aavuso, bhikkhu iddhimaa cetovasippatto amu.m daarukkhandha.m pathaviitveva adhimucceyya. ta.m kissa ^a^P3.0341^ea^ hetu? atthi, aavuso ^a^T3.0381^ea^, amumhi daarukkhandhe pathaviidhaatu, ya.m nissaaya bhikkhu iddhimaa cetovasippatto amu.m daarukkhandha.m pathaviitveva adhimucceyya. aaka"nkhamaano, aavuso, bhikkhu iddhimaa cetovasippatto amu.m daarukkhandha.m aapotveva adhimucceyya ^a^V2.0056^ea^...pe0... tejotveva adhimucceyya... vaayotveva adhimucceyya... subhantveva adhimucceyya... asubhantveva adhimucceyya. ta.m kissa hetu? atthi, aavuso, amumhi daarukkhandhe asubhadhaatu, ya.m nissaaya bhikkhu iddhimaa cetovasippatto amu.m daarukkhandha.m asubhantveva adhimucceyyaa''ti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena icchaana"ngala.m naama kosalaana.m braahma.nagaamo tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa icchaana"ngale viharati ^a^M2.0300^ea^ icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. assosu.m kho icchaana"ngalakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito icchaana"ngala.m anuppatto icchaana"ngale viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno...pe0... buddho bhagavaa'ti. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m...pe0... arahata.m dassana.m hotii''ti. atha kho icchaana"ngalakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya yena icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bahidvaarako.t.thake a.t.tha.msu uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa.

[03] tena ^a^T3.0382^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa naagito bhagavato upa.t.thaako hoti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m naagita.m aamantesi ^a^P3.0342^ea^ -- ``ke pana te, naagita, uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa keva.t.taa ma~n~ne macchavilope''ti? ``ete, bhante, icchaana"ngalakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya bahidvaarako.t.thake .thitaa bhagavanta.myeva uddissa bhikkhusa"ngha~ncaa''ti. ``maaha.m, naagita, yasena samaagama.m, maa ca mayaa yaso. yo kho, naagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii assa akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, yassaaha.m nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, so ta.m mii.lhasukha.m middhasukha.m laabhasakkaarasilokasukha.m saadiyeyyaa''ti.

[03] ``adhivaasetu ^a^V2.0057^ea^ daani, bhante, bhagavaa; adhivaasetu, sugato; adhivaasanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato. yena yeneva daani, bhante, bhagavaa gamissati, tanninnaava bhavissanti braahma.nagahapatikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca. seyyathaapi, bhante, thullaphusitake deve vassante yathaaninna.m udakaani pavattanti; evameva.m kho, bhante, yena yeneva daani bhagavaa gamissati, tanninnaava bhavissanti braahma.nagahapatikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi, bhante, bhagavato siilapa~n~naa.na''nti.

[03] ``maaha.m, naagita, yasena samaagama.m, maa ca mayaa yaso. yo kho, naagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa ^a^M2.0301^ea^ nikaamalaabhii assa akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, yassaaha.m ^a^T3.0383^ea^ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, so ta.m mii.lhasukha.m middhasukha.m laabhasakkaarasilokasukha.m saadiyeyya.

[03] ``idhaaha.m, naagita, bhikkhu.m passaami gaamantavihaari.m samaahita.m ^a^P3.0343^ea^ nisinna.m. tassa mayha.m, naagita, eva.m hoti -- `idaanima.m aayasmanta.m {aaraamiko vaa gha.t.tessati sama.nuddeso vaa, ta.m tamhaa (ka0 sii0 pii0) aaraamiko vaa gha.t.tessati sama.nuddeso vaa, so ta.m tamhaa (ka0 sii0) a0 ni0 8.86 passitabba.m} aaraamiko vaa upa.t.thahissati sama.nuddeso vaa ta.m tamhaa {aaraamiko vaa gha.t.tessati sama.nuddeso vaa, ta.m tamhaa (ka0 sii0 pii0) aaraamiko vaa gha.t.tessati sama.nuddeso vaa, so ta.m tamhaa (ka0 sii0) a0 ni0 8.86 passitabba.m} samaadhimhaa caavessatii'ti. tenaaha.m, naagita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gaamantavihaarena. idha panaaha.m, naagita, bhikkhu.m passaami aara~n~nika.m ara~n~ne pacalaayamaana.m nisinna.m. tassa mayha.m, naagita, eva.m hoti -- `idaani ayamaayasmaa ima.m niddaakilamatha.m pa.tivinodetvaa ara~n~nasa~n~na.myeva manasi karissati ekatta'nti. tenaaha.m, naagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi ara~n~navihaarena.

[03] ``idha panaaha.m, naagita, bhikkhu.m passaami aara~n~nika.m ara~n~ne asamaahita.m nisinna.m. tassa mayha.m, naagita, eva.m hoti -- `idaani ayamaayasmaa asamaahita.m vaa citta.m samaadahissati, samaahita.m vaa citta.m anurakkhissatii'ti. tenaaha.m, naagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi ara~n~navihaarena.

[03] ``idha panaaha.m, naagita, bhikkhu.m passaami aara~n~nika.m ara~n~ne samaahita.m nisinna.m. tassa mayha.m, naagita, eva.m hoti -- `idaani ayamaayasmaa avimutta.m vaa citta.m vimocessati, vimutta.m vaa ^a^V2.0058^ea^ citta.m anurakkhissatii'ti. tenaaha.m, naagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi ara~n~navihaarena.

[03] ``idha panaaha.m, naagita, bhikkhu.m passaami gaamantavihaari.m laabhi.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. so ta.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m ^a^T3.0384^ea^ nikaamayamaano ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m ri~ncati ara~n~navanapatthaani ^a^P3.0344^ea^ pantaani senaasanaani; gaamanigamaraajadhaani.m osaritvaa vaasa.m kappeti. tenaaha.m, naagita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gaamantavihaarena.

[03] ``idha ^a^M2.0302^ea^ panaaha.m, naagita, bhikkhu.m passaami aara~n~nika.m laabhi.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. so ta.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m pa.tipa.naametvaa na ri~ncati pa.tisallaana.m na ri~ncati ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani. tenaaha.m, naagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi ara~n~navihaarena. yasmaaha.m, naagita, samaye addhaanamaggappa.tipanno na ka~nci {na ki~nci (sii0 pii0 ka0)} passaami purato vaa pacchato vaa, phaasu me, naagita, tasmi.m samaye hoti antamaso uccaarapassaavakammaayaa''ti. dvaadasama.m.
[06] devataavaggo {sekkhaparihaaniyavaggo (syaa0)} catuttho.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] sekhaa dve aparihaani, moggallaana vijjaabhaagiyaa.
[22] vivaadadaanattakaarii nidaana.m, kimiladaarukkhandhena naagitoti..

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0059^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aayaamaananda ^a^T3.0385^ea^, yena pubbaaraamo migaaramaatupaasaado ^a^P3.0345^ea^ tenupasa"nkamissaama divaavihaaraayaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m yena pubbaaraamo migaaramaatupaasaado tenupasa"nkami. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aayaamaananda, yena pubbako.t.thako tenupasa"nkamissaama gattaani parisi~ncitu''nti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti ^a^M2.0303^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m yena pubbako.t.thako tenupasa"nkami gattaani parisi~ncitu.m. pubbako.t.thake gattaani parisi~ncitvaa paccuttaritvaa ekaciivaro a.t.thaasi gattaani pubbaapayamaano.

[03] tena kho pana samayena ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa seto naama naago mahaatuuriya {mahaaturiya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} taa.litavaaditena pubbako.t.thakaa paccuttarati. apissu ta.m jano disvaa evamaaha -- ``abhiruupo vata, bho, ra~n~no naago; dassaniiyo vata, bho, ra~n~no naago; paasaadiko vata, bho, ra~n~no naago; kaayupapanno vata, bho, ra~n~no naago''ti! eva.m vutte aayasmaa udaayii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``hatthimeva nu kho, bhante, mahanta.m brahanta.m {mahanta.m bruhanta.m (sii0), mahatta.m brahmatta.m (ka0)} kaayupapanna.m jano disvaa evamaaha -- `naago vata, bho, naago'ti, udaahu a~n~nampi ka~nci {ki~nci (ka0)} mahanta.m brahanta.m kaayupapanna.m ^a^T3.0386^ea^ jano disvaa evamaaha -- `naago vata, bho, naago'''ti? ``hatthimpi kho, udaayi, mahanta.m brahanta.m kaayupapanna.m jano disvaa evamaaha -- `naago vata, bho, naago'ti! assampi kho, udaayi, mahanta.m brahanta.m...pe0... go.nampi kho, udaayi ^a^V2.0060^ea^, mahanta.m brahanta.m...pe0... uragampi {naagampi (ka0)} kho, udaayi, mahanta.m brahanta.m...pe0... rukkhampi kho, udaayi ^a^P3.0346^ea^, mahanta.m brahanta.m...pe0... manussampi kho, udaayi, mahanta.m brahanta.m kaayupapanna.m jano disvaa evamaaha -- `naago vata, bho, naago'ti! api ca, udaayi, yo sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya aagu.m na karoti kaayena vaacaaya manasaa, tamaha.m `naago'ti bruumii''ti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m, bhante, bhagavataa -- api ca, udaayi, yo sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya aagu.m na karoti kaayena vaacaaya manasaa, tamaha.m `naago'ti bruumii''ti. ida~nca panaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa subhaasita.m imaahi gaathaahi anumodaami --
[21] ``manussabhuuta.m sambuddha.m, attadanta.m samaahita.m.

[21] ``sabbasa.myojanaatiita.m, vanaa nibbana {nibbaana (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} maagata.m.
[22] kaamehi nekkhammarata.m {nekkhamme rata.m (ka0 sii0)}, mutta.m selaava ka~ncana.m..

[22] saddhaahattho mahaanaago, upekkhaasetadantavaa..

[22] dhammakucchisamaatapo, viveko tassa vaaladhi..

[22] yena yeneva gacchati, anapekkhova gacchati..
[21] ``yathaapi udake jaata.m, pu.n.dariika.m pava.d.dhati.
[22] nupalippati {na upalippati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), nupalimpati (ka0)} toyena, sucigandha.m manorama.m..

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena migasaalaaya upaasikaaya nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho migasaalaa {migasaa.naa (ka0) a0 ni0 10.75} upaasikaa yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho migasaalaa upaasikaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca --

[03] ``katha.m katha.m naamaaya.m, bhante aananda, bhagavataa dhammo desito a~n~neyyo, yatra hi naama brahmacaarii ca abrahmacaarii ca ubho samasamagatikaa bhavissanti abhisamparaaya.m ^a^P3.0348^ea^? pitaa me, bhante, puraa.no brahmacaarii ahosi aaraacaarii virato methunaa gaamadhammaa. so kaala"nkato bhagavataa byaakato sakadaagaamisatto {sakadaagaamipatto (ka0 syaa0 pii0)} tusita.m kaaya.m upapannoti. petteyyopi {pettayyo piyo (sii0 pii0 ka0), pitu piyo (syaa0 ka.m0)} me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacaarii ahosi sadaarasantu.t.tho. sopi kaala"nkato bhagavataa byaakato sakadaagaamipatto tusita.m kaaya.m upapannoti. katha.m katha.m naamaaya.m, bhante aananda, bhagavataa dhammo desito a~n~neyyo, yatra hi naama brahmacaarii ca abrahmacaarii ca ^a^T3.0389^ea^ ubho samasamagatikaa bhavissanti abhisamparaaya''nti? ``eva.m kho paneta.m, bhagini, bhagavataa byaakata''nti.

[03] atha ^a^M2.0306^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando migasaalaaya upaasikaaya nivesane pi.n.dapaata.m gahetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho aayasmaa aanando pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaaha.m, bhante, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena migasaalaaya upaasikaaya nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi.m. atha kho, bhante, migasaalaa upaasikaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^V2.0063^ea^ nisinnaa kho, bhante, migasaalaa upaasikaa ma.m etadavoca -- `katha.m katha.m naamaaya.m, bhante aananda, bhagavataa dhammo desito a~n~neyyo, yatra hi naama brahmacaarii ca abrahmacaarii ca ubho samasamagatikaa bhavissanti abhisamparaaya.m. pitaa me, bhante, puraa.no brahmacaarii ahosi aaraacaarii virato methunaa gaamadhammaa. so kaala"nkato bhagavataa byaakato sakadaagaamipatto tusita.m kaaya.m upapannoti. petteyyopi me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacaarii ahosi sadaarasantu.t.tho. sopi kaala"nkato bhagavataa byaakato sakadaagaamipatto ^a^P3.0349^ea^ tusita.m kaaya.m upapannoti. katha.m katha.m naamaaya.m, bhante aananda, bhagavataa dhammo desito a~n~neyyo, yatra hi naama brahmacaarii ca abrahmacaarii ^a^T3.0390^ea^ ca ubho samasamagatikaa bhavissanti abhisamparaaya'nti? eva.m vutte aha.m, bhante, migasaala.m upaasika.m etadavoca.m -- `eva.m kho paneta.m, bhagini, bhagavataa byaakata'''nti.

[03] ``kaa caananda, migasaalaa upaasikaa baalaa abyattaa ammakaa ammakasa~n~naa {ambakaa ambakapa~n~naa (sii0 pii0), ambakaa ambakasa~n~naa (syaa0 ka.m0) a0 ni0 10.75 passitabba.m}, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariya~naa.ne? chayime, aananda, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.

[03] ``katame cha? idhaananda, ekacco puggalo sorato hoti sukhasa.mvaaso, abhinandanti sabrahmacaarii ekattavaasena. tassa savanenapi akata.m hoti, baahusaccenapi akata.m hoti, di.t.thiyaapi appa.tividdha.m hoti, saamaayikampi vimutti.m na labhati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m ^a^M2.0307^ea^ mara.naa haanaaya pareti no visesaaya, haanagaamiiyeva hoti no visesagaamii.

[03] ``idha panaananda, ekacco puggalo sorato hoti sukhasa.mvaaso, abhinandanti sabrahmacaarii ekattavaasena. tassa savanenapi kata.m hoti, baahusaccenapi kata.m hoti, di.t.thiyaapi pa.tividdha.m hoti, saamaayikampi vimutti.m labhati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa visesaaya pareti no haanaaya, visesagaamiiyeva hoti no haanagaamii.
[03] ``tatraananda, pamaa.nikaa pami.nanti -- `imassapi teva dhammaa aparassapi teva dhammaa, kasmaa tesa.m eko hiino eko pa.niito'ti! ta~nhi tesa.m, aananda, hoti diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya.

[03] ``tatraananda ^a^V2.0064^ea^, yvaaya.m puggalo sorato hoti sukhasa.mvaaso, abhinandanti sabrahmacaarii ekattavaasena, tassa savanenapi kata.m hoti, baahusaccenapi kata.m hoti, di.t.thiyaapi pa.tividdha.m hoti, saamaayikampi vimutti.m labhati. aya.m ^a^T3.0391^ea^, aananda ^a^P3.0350^ea^, puggalo amunaa purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. ta.m kissa hetu? ima.m haananda, puggala.m dhammasoto nibbahati, tadantara.m ko jaaneyya a~n~natra tathaagatena! tasmaatihaananda, maa puggalesu pamaa.nikaa ahuvattha; maa puggalesu pamaa.na.m ga.nhittha. kha~n~nati haananda, puggalesu pamaa.na.m ga.nhanto. aha.m vaa, aananda, puggalesu pamaa.na.m ga.nheyya.m, yo vaa panassa maadiso.
