[03] ``idha panaananda, ekaccassa puggalassa kodhamaano adhigato hoti, samayena samaya~ncassa vaciisa"nkhaaraa uppajjanti. tassa savanenapi kata.m ^a^T3.0392^ea^ hoti, baahusaccenapi kata.m hoti, di.t.thiyaapi pa.tividdha.m hoti, saamaayikampi vimutti.m labhati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa visesaaya ^a^P3.0351^ea^ pareti no haanaaya, visesagaamiiyeva hoti no haanagaamii.

[03] ``tatraananda ^a^V2.0065^ea^, pamaa.nikaa pami.nanti -- `imassapi teva dhammaa, aparassapi teva dhammaa. kasmaa tesa.m eko hiino, eko pa.niito'ti? ta~nhi tesa.m, aananda, hoti diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya.

[03] ``tatraananda, yassa puggalassa kodhamaano adhigato hoti, samayena samaya~ncassa vaciisa"nkhaaraa uppajjanti, tassa savanenapi kata.m hoti, baahusaccenapi kata.m hoti, di.t.thiyaapi pa.tividdha.m hoti, saamaayikampi vimutti.m labhati. aya.m, aananda, puggalo amunaa purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. ta.m kissa hetu? ima.m haananda, puggala.m dhammasoto nibbahati. tadantara.m ko jaaneyya a~n~natra tathaagatena! tasmaatihaananda, maa puggalesu pamaa.nikaa ahuvattha; maa puggalesu pamaa.na.m ga.nhittha. kha~n~nati haananda, puggalesu pamaa.na.m ga.nhanto. aha.m vaa, aananda, puggalesu pamaa.na.m ga.nheyya.m, yo vaa panassa maadiso.
[03] ``kaa caananda, migasaalaa upaasikaa baalaa abyattaa ammakaa ammakasa~n~naa, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariya~naa.ne! ime kho, aananda, cha puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.

[03] ``yathaaruupena, aananda, siilena puraa.no samannaagato ahosi, tathaaruupena siilena isidatto samannaagato abhavissa. nayidha puraa.no isidattassa gatimpi a~n~nassa. yathaaruupaaya ca, aananda, pa~n~naaya ^a^T3.0393^ea^ isidatto samannaagato ahosi, tathaaruupaaya pa~n~naaya puraa.no samannaagato ^a^M2.0309^ea^ abhavissa. nayidha isidatto puraa.nassa gatimpi a~n~nassa. iti kho, aananda, ime puggalaa ubho eka"ngahiinaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ``daaliddiya.m {daa.liddiya.m (sii0)}, bhikkhave, dukkha.m lokasmi.m kaamabhogino''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``yampi, bhikkhave, daliddo {da.liddo (sii0)} assako ^a^P3.0352^ea^ anaa.lhiko {anaddhiko (syaa0 ka.m0)} i.na.m aadiyati, i.naadaanampi, bhikkhave, dukkha.m lokasmi.m kaamabhogino''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``yampi, bhikkhave, daliddo assako anaa.lhiko i.na.m aadiyitvaa va.d.dhi.m pa.tissu.naati, va.d.dhipi, bhikkhave, dukkhaa lokasmi.m kaamabhogino''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``yampi, bhikkhave, daliddo assako anaa.lhiko va.d.dhi.m pa.tissu.nitvaa ^a^V2.0066^ea^ kaalaabhata.m {kaalagata.m (ka0)} va.d.dhi.m na deti, codentipi na.m; codanaapi, bhikkhave, dukkhaa lokasmi.m kaamabhogino''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``yampi, bhikkhave, daliddo assako anaa.lhiko codiyamaano na deti, anucarantipi na.m; anucariyaapi, bhikkhave, dukkhaa lokasmi.m kaamabhogino''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``yampi, bhikkhave, daliddo assako anaa.lhiko anucariyamaano na deti, bandhantipi na.m; bandhanampi, bhikkhave, dukkha.m lokasmi.m kaamabhogino''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, daaliddiyampi dukkha.m lokasmi.m kaamabhogino, i.naadaanampi dukkha.m lokasmi.m kaamabhogino, va.d.dhipi dukkhaa lokasmi.m kaamabhogino, codanaapi dukkhaa lokasmi.m kaamabhogino, anucariyaapi dukkhaa lokasmi.m kaamabhogino, bandhanampi dukkha.m lokasmi.m kaamabhogino; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0394^ea^, yassa kassaci saddhaa natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirii natthi kusalesu dhammesu, ottappa.m natthi kusalesu dhammesu, viiriya.m natthi kusalesu dhammesu, pa~n~naa natthi kusalesu dhammesu -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye daliddo assako anaa.lhiko.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, daliddo assako anaa.lhiko saddhaaya asati kusalesu dhammesu, hiriyaa asati kusalesu dhammesu, ottappe asati kusalesu dhammesu, viiriye asati kusalesu dhammesu, pa~n~naaya asati ^a^M2.0310^ea^ kusalesu dhammesu, kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. idamassa i.naadaanasmi.m vadaami.

[03] ``so tassa kaayaduccaritassa pa.ticchaadanahetu paapika.m iccha.m pa.nidahati {padahati (ka0)}. `maa ma.m ja~n~nuu'ti icchati, `maa ma.m ja~n~nuu'ti sa"nkappati ^a^P3.0353^ea^, `maa ma.m ja~n~nuu'ti vaaca.m bhaasati, `maa ma.m ja~n~nuu'ti kaayena parakkamati. so tassa vaciiduccaritassa pa.ticchaadanahetu...pe0... so tassa manoduccaritassa pa.ticchaadanahetu...pe0... `maa ma.m ja~n~nuu'ti kaayena parakkamati. idamassa va.d.dhiyaa vadaami.
[03] ``tamena.m pesalaa sabrahmacaarii evamaaha.msu -- `aya~nca so aayasmaa eva.mkaarii eva.msamaacaaro'ti. idamassa codanaaya vadaami.

[03] ``tamena.m ^a^V2.0067^ea^ ara~n~nagata.m vaa rukkhamuulagata.m vaa su~n~naagaaragata.m vaa vippa.tisaarasahagataa paapakaa akusalavitakkaa samudaacaranti. idamassa anucariyaaya ^a^T3.0395^ea^ vadaami.

[03] ``sa kho so, bhikkhave, daliddo assako anaa.lhiko kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa nirayabandhane vaa bajjhati tiracchaanayonibandhane vaa. naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekabandhanampi samanupassaami eva.mdaaru.na.m eva.mka.tuka.m {eva.mdukkha.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} eva.mantaraayakara.m anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya, yathayida.m, bhikkhave, nirayabandhana.m vaa tiracchaanayonibandhana.m vaa''ti.
[21] ``daaliddiya.m dukkha.m loke, i.naadaana~nca vuccati.
[22] daliddo i.namaadaaya, bhu~njamaano viha~n~nati..
[21] ``tato anucaranti na.m, bandhanampi nigacchati.
[22] eta~nhi bandhana.m dukkha.m, kaamalaabhaabhijappina.m..
[21] ``tatheva ariyavinaye, saddhaa yassa na vijjati.
[22] ahiriiko ^a^P3.0354^ea^ anottappii, paapakammavinibbayo..
[21] ``kaayaduccarita.m katvaa, vaciiduccaritaani ca.
[22] manoduccarita.m katvaa, `maa ma.m ja~n~nuu'ti icchati..
[21] ``so ^a^M2.0311^ea^ sa.msappati {sa"nkappati (ka0)} kaayena, vaacaaya uda cetasaa.
[22] paapakamma.m pava.d.dhento, tattha tattha punappuna.m..
[21] ``so paapakammo dummedho, jaana.m dukka.tamattano.
[22] daliddo i.namaadaaya, bhu~njamaano viha~n~nati..
[21] ``tato ^a^V2.0068^ea^ anucaranti na.m, sa"nkappaa maanasaa dukhaa.
[22] gaame ^a^T3.0396^ea^ vaa yadi vaara~n~ne, yassa vippa.tisaarajaa..
[21] ``so paapakammo dummedho, jaana.m dukka.tamattano.
[22] yonima~n~natara.m gantvaa, niraye vaapi bajjhati..
[21] ``eta~nhi bandhana.m dukkha.m, yamhaa dhiiro pamuccati.
[22] dhammaladdhehi bhogehi, dada.m citta.m pasaadaya.m..
[21] ``ubhayattha ka.taggaaho, saddhassa gharamesino.
[27] di.t.thadhammahitatthaaya, samparaayasukhaaya ca.
[22] evameta.m gaha.t.thaana.m, caago pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati..
[21] ``tatheva ariyavinaye, saddhaa yassa pati.t.thitaa.
[22] hiriimano ca ottappii, pa~n~navaa siilasa.mvuto..
[21] ``eso kho ariyavinaye, `sukhajiivii'ti vuccati.
[22] niraamisa.m sukha.m laddhaa, upekkha.m adhiti.t.thati..
[21] ``pa~nca niivara.ne hitvaa, nicca.m aaraddhaviiriyo.
[22] jhaanaani upasampajja, ekodi nipako sato..
[21] ``eva.m ~natvaa yathaabhuuta.m, sabbasa.myojanakkhaye.
[22] sabbaso anupaadaaya, sammaa citta.m vimuccati..
[21] ``tassa sammaa vimuttassa, ~naa.na.m ce hoti taadino.
[22] `akuppaa me vimuttii'ti, bhavasa.myojanakkhaye..
[21] ``eta.m kho parama.m ~naa.na.m, eta.m sukhamanuttara.m.
[22] asoka.m viraja.m khema.m, eta.m aana.nyamuttama''nti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0397^ea^ ^a^M2.0312^ea^ ^a^P3.0355^ea^ ^a^V2.0069^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa mahaacundo cetiisu viharati saya.mjaatiya.m {sahajaatiya.m (sii0 pii0), sa~njaatiya.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}. tatra kho aayasmaa mahaacundo bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaacundassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa mahaacundo etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaavuso, dhammayogaa bhikkhuu jhaayii bhikkhuu apasaadenti -- `ime pana jhaayinomhaa, jhaayinomhaati jhaayanti pajjhaayanti nijjhaayanti avajjhaayanti {apajjhaayanti (ma0 ni0 1.508)}. kimime {ki.m hime (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} jhaayanti, kintime jhaayanti, katha.m ime jhaayantii'ti? tattha dhammayogaa ca bhikkhuu nappasiidanti, jhaayii ca bhikkhuu nappasiidanti, na ca bahujanahitaaya pa.tipannaa honti bahujanasukhaaya bahuno janassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] ``idha panaavuso, jhaayii bhikkhuu dhammayoge bhikkhuu apasaadenti -- `ime pana dhammayogamhaa, dhammayogamhaati uddhataa unna.laa capalaa mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa mu.t.thassatii asampajaanaa asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa paakatindriyaa. kimime dhammayogaa, kintime dhammayogaa, katha.m ime dhammayogaa'ti? tattha jhaayii ca bhikkhuu nappasiidanti, dhammayogaa ca bhikkhuu nappasiidanti, na ca bahujanahitaaya pa.tipannaa honti bahujanasukhaaya bahuno janassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] ``idha panaavuso, dhammayogaa bhikkhuu dhammayogaana~n~neva bhikkhuuna.m va.n.na.m bhaasanti, no jhaayiina.m bhikkhuuna.m va.n.na.m bhaasanti. tattha dhammayogaa ca bhikkhuu ^a^P3.0356^ea^ nappasiidanti, jhaayii ca bhikkhuu nappasiidanti, na ca bahujanahitaaya pa.tipannaa honti bahujanasukhaaya bahuno janassa atthaaya hitaaya ^a^T3.0398^ea^ sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] ``idha panaavuso, jhaayii bhikkhuu jhaayiina~n~neva bhikkhuuna.m va.n.na.m bhaasanti, no dhammayogaana.m bhikkhuuna.m va.n.na.m bhaasanti. tattha jhaayii ca bhikkhuu nappasiidanti, dhammayogaa ca bhikkhuu nappasiidanti, na ca bahujanahitaaya pa.tipannaa honti bahujanasukhaaya ^a^M2.0313^ea^ bahuno janassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] ``tasmaatihaavuso ^a^V2.0070^ea^, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `dhammayogaa samaanaa jhaayiina.m bhikkhuuna.m va.n.na.m bhaasissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, aavuso, sikkhitabba.m. ta.m kissa hetu? acchariyaa hete, aavuso, puggalaa dullabhaa lokasmi.m, ye amata.m dhaatu.m kaayena phusitvaa viharanti. tasmaatihaavuso, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `jhaayii samaanaa dhammayogaana.m bhikkhuuna.m va.n.na.m bhaasissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, aavuso, sikkhitabba.m. ta.m kissa hetu? acchariyaa hete, aavuso, puggalaa dullabhaa lokasmi.m ye gambhiira.m atthapada.m pa~n~naaya ativijjha passantii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ atha kho mo.liyasiivako {moliyasiivako (sii0 pii0), mo.lisiivako (ka0)} paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mo.liyasiivako paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```sandi.t.thiko dhammo, sandi.t.thiko dhammo'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, sandi.t.thiko dhammo hoti akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii''ti?

[03] ``tena ^a^P3.0357^ea^ hi, siivaka, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchaami. yathaa te khameyya ^a^T3.0399^ea^ tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, siivaka, santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m lobha.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m lobho'ti pajaanaasi, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m lobha.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m lobho'ti pajaanaasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``ya.m kho tva.m, siivaka, santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m lobha.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m lobho'ti pajaanaasi, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m lobha.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m lobho'ti pajaanaasi -- evampi kho, siivaka, sandi.t.thiko dhammo hoti...pe0....

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, siivaka, santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m dosa.m...pe0... santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m moha.m...pe0... santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m lobhadhamma.m...pe0... santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m dosadhamma.m...pe0... santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m mohadhamma.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m mohadhammo'ti pajaanaasi, asanta.m ^a^M2.0314^ea^ vaa ajjhatta.m mohadhamma.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m mohadhammo'ti pajaanaasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``ya.m kho tva.m, siivaka, santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m mohadhamma.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m mohadhammo'ti pajaanaasi, asanta.m ^a^V2.0071^ea^ vaa ajjhatta.m mohadhamma.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m mohadhammo'ti pajaanaasi -- eva.m kho, siivaka, sandi.t.thiko dhammo hoti akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii''ti.
[03] ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ^a^T3.0400^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```sandi.t.thiko dhammo, sandi.t.thiko dhammo'ti, bho gotama, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bho gotama, sandi.t.thiko ^a^P3.0358^ea^ dhammo hoti akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii''ti?

[03] ``tena hi, braahma.na, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami. yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m raaga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m raago'ti pajaanaasi, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m raaga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m raago'ti pajaanaasii''ti? ``eva.m, bho''. ``ya.m kho tva.m, braahma.na, santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m raaga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m raago'ti pajaanaasi, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m raaga.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m raago'ti pajaanaasi -- evampi kho, braahma.na, sandi.t.thiko dhammo hoti...pe0....

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m dosa.m...pe0... santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m moha.m...pe0... santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m kaayasandosa.m...pe0... santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m vaciisandosa.m...pe0... santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m manosandosa.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m manosandoso'ti pajaanaasi, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m manosandosa.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m manosandoso'ti pajaanaasii''ti? ``eva.m, bho''. ``ya.m kho tva.m, braahma.na, santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m manosandosa.m `atthi ^a^V2.0072^ea^ me ajjhatta.m manosandoso'ti pajaanaasi, asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m manosandosa.m `natthi me ajjhatta.m manosandoso'ti ^a^M2.0315^ea^ pajaanaasi -- eva.m kho, braahma.na, sandi.t.thiko dhammo hoti akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii''ti.
[03] ``abhikkanta.m ^a^T3.0401^ea^, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ca khemo aayasmaa ca sumano saavatthiya.m viharanti ^a^P3.0359^ea^ andhavanasmi.m. atha kho aayasmaa ca khemo aayasmaa ca sumano yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa khemo bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``yo so, bhante, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto tassa na eva.m hoti -- `atthi me seyyoti vaa atthi me sadisoti vaa atthi me hiinoti vaa'''ti. idamavocaayasmaa khemo. samanu~n~no satthaa ahosi. atha kho aayasmaa khemo ``samanu~n~no me satthaa''ti u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa sumano acirapakkante aayasmante kheme bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yo so, bhante, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto tassa na eva.m hoti -- `natthi me seyyoti vaa natthi me sadisoti vaa natthi me hiinoti vaa'''ti. idamavocaayasmaa sumano. samanu~n~no satthaa ^a^T3.0402^ea^ ahosi. atha ^a^V2.0073^ea^ kho aayasmaa sumano ``samanu~n~no me satthaa''ti u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkantesu aayasmante ca kheme aayasmante ca sumane bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``eva.m kho, bhikkhave, kulaputtaa a~n~na.m byaakaronti ^a^M2.0316^ea^. attho ca vutto attaa ca anupaniito. atha ca pana idhekacce moghapurisaa hasamaanakaa {hasamaanaka.m (ka0) mahaava0 245} ma~n~ne a~n~na.m byaakaronti. te pacchaa vighaata.m aapajjantii''ti.
[21] ``na ussesu na omesu, samatte nopaniiyare {nopaniyyare (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}.
[22] khii.naa jaati vusita.m brahmacariya.m, caranti sa.myojanavippamuttaa''ti.. sattama.m.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 5.24, 168; 2.7.65} ``indriyasa.mvare ^a^P3.0360^ea^, bhikkhave, asati indriyasa.mvaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti siila.m; siile asati siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasavipanno. tassa papa.tikaapi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, pheggupi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, saaropi na paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, indriyasa.mvare asati indriyasa.mvaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti siila.m...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.

[03] ``indriyasa.mvare ^a^T3.0403^ea^, bhikkhave, sati indriyasa.mvarasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti siila.m; siile sati siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi sati sammaasamaadhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage sati nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasasampanno. tassa papa.tikaapi paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi paaripuuri.m gacchati, pheggupi paaripuuri.m gacchati, saaropi paaripuuri.m gacchati ^a^M2.0317^ea^. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, indriyasa.mvare sati indriyasa.mvarasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti siila.m...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0074^ea^ ^a^P3.0361^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhu assuta~nceva dhamma.m su.naati, sutaa cassa dhammaa na sammosa.m gacchanti, ye cassa dhammaa pubbe cetasaa samphu.t.thapubbaa te ca samudaacaranti, avi~n~naata~nca vijaanaatii''ti? ``aayasmaa kho aanando bahussuto. pa.tibhaatu aayasmanta.myeva aananda''nti. ``tenahaavuso saariputta, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti ^a^T3.0404^ea^. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmato aanandassa paccassosi. aayasmaa aanando etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaavuso saariputta, bhikkhu dhamma.m pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaatha.m udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m. so yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti, yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m vaaceti, yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karoti, yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati. yasmi.m aavaase theraa bhikkhuu viharanti bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa tasmi.m aavaase vassa.m upeti. te kaalena kaala.m upasa"nkamitvaa paripucchati paripa~nhati -- `ida.m, bhante, katha.m; imassa kvattho'ti? te tassa aayasmato aviva.ta~nceva vivaranti, anuttaaniikata~nca uttaaniikaronti, anekavihitesu ca ka"nkhaa.thaaniyesu dhammesu ka"nkha.m pa.tivinodenti. ettaavataa kho, aavuso ^a^P3.0362^ea^ saariputta, bhikkhu assuta~nceva dhamma.m su.naati, sutaa cassa dhammaa na sammosa.m gacchanti, ye cassa dhammaa pubbe cetasaa samphu.t.thapubbaa te ca samudaacaranti, avi~n~naata~nca vijaanaatii''ti.

[03] ``acchariya.m ^a^M2.0318^ea^, aavuso, abbhuta.m, aavuso, yaava subhaasita.m cida.m aayasmataa aanandena. imehi ca maya.m chahi dhammehi samannaagata.m aayasmanta.m aananda.m dhaarema. aayasmaa hi aanando dhamma.m pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaatha.m udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m ^a^V2.0075^ea^. aayasmaa aanando yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m ^a^T3.0405^ea^ dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti, aayasmaa aanando yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m vaaceti, aayasmaa aanando yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karoti, aayasmaa aanando yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati. aayasmaa aanando yasmi.m aavaase theraa bhikkhuu viharanti bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa tasmi.m aavaase vassa.m upeti. te aayasmaa aanando kaalena kaala.m upasa"nkamitvaa paripucchati paripa~nhati -- `ida.m, bhante, katha.m; imassa kvattho'ti? te aayasmato aanandassa aviva.ta~nceva vivaranti, anuttaaniikata~nca uttaaniikaronti, anekavihitesu ca ka"nkhaa.thaaniyesu dhammesu ka"nkha.m pa.tivinodentii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ atha kho jaa.nusso.ni {jaa.nuso.ni (ka0)} braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``khattiyaa ^a^P3.0363^ea^, bho gotama, ki.madhippaayaa, ki.mupavicaaraa, ki.madhi.t.thaanaa, ki.mabhinivesaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa''ti? ``khattiyaa kho, braahma.na, bhogaadhippaayaa pa~n~nuupavicaaraa balaadhi.t.thaanaa pathaviibhinivesaa issariyapariyosaanaa''ti.

[03] ``braahma.naa pana, bho gotama, ki.madhippaayaa, ki.mupavicaaraa, ki.madhi.t.thaanaa, ki.mabhinivesaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa''ti? ``braahma.naa kho, braahma.na, bhogaadhippaayaa ^a^T3.0406^ea^ pa~n~nuupavicaaraa mantaadhi.t.thaanaa ya~n~naabhinivesaa brahmalokapariyosaanaa''ti.

[03] ``gahapatikaa ^a^M2.0319^ea^ pana, bho gotama, ki.madhippaayaa, ki.mupavicaaraa, ki.madhi.t.thaanaa, ki.mabhinivesaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa''ti? ``gahapatikaa kho, braahma.na, bhogaadhippaayaa pa~n~nuupavicaaraa sippaadhi.t.thaanaa kammantaabhinivesaa ni.t.thitakammantapariyosaanaa''ti.

[03] ``itthii ^a^V2.0076^ea^ pana, bho gotama, ki.madhippaayaa, ki.mupavicaaraa, ki.madhi.t.thaanaa, ki.mabhinivesaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa''ti? ``itthii kho, braahma.na, purisaadhippaayaa ala"nkaaruupavicaaraa puttaadhi.t.thaanaa asapatiibhinivesaa issariyapariyosaanaa''ti.

[03] ``coraa pana, bho gotama, ki.madhippaayaa, ki.mupavicaaraa, ki.madhi.t.thaanaa, ki.mabhinivesaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa''ti? ``coraa kho, braahma.na, aadaanaadhippaayaa gahanuupavicaaraa satthaadhi.t.thaanaa andhakaaraabhinivesaa adassanapariyosaanaa''ti.

[03] ``sama.naa pana, bho gotama, ki.madhippaayaa, ki.mupavicaaraa, ki.madhi.t.thaanaa, ki.mabhinivesaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa''ti? ``sama.naa kho, braahma.na, khantisoraccaadhippaayaa pa~n~nuupavicaaraa siilaadhi.t.thaanaa aaki~nca~n~naabhinivesaa {aki~ncanaabhinivesaa (syaa0 ka0)} nibbaanapariyosaanaa''ti.

[01] ``acchariya.m, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! khattiyaanampi bhava.m gotamo jaanaati adhippaaya~nca upavicaara~nca adhi.t.thaana~nca abhinivesa~nca pariyosaana~nca. braahma.naanampi bhava.m gotamo jaanaati...pe0... ^a^T3.0407^ea^ gahapatiinampi bhava.m gotamo jaanaati... itthiinampi bhava.m gotamo jaanaati... coraanampi bhava.m gotamo jaanaati ^a^P3.0364^ea^... sama.naanampi bhava.m gotamo jaanaati adhippaaya~nca upavicaara~nca adhi.t.thaana~nca abhinivesa~nca pariyosaana~nca. abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. dasama.m.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m ^a^M2.0320^ea^ viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``atthi nu kho, bho gotama, eko dhammo bhaavito bahuliikato yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m, yo ca attho samparaayiko''ti? ``atthi kho, braahma.na ^a^V2.0077^ea^, eko dhammo bhaavito bahuliikato yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m, yo ca attho samparaayiko''ti.

[03] ``katamo pana, bho gotama, eko dhammo bhaavito bahuliikato yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m, yo ca attho samparaayiko''ti? ``appamaado kho, braahma.na, eko dhammo bhaavito bahuliikato ubho atthe samadhiggayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m, yo ca attho samparaayiko''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, yaani kaanici ja"ngalaana.m {ja"ngamaana.m (sii0 pii0) a0 ni0 10.15; ma0 ni0 1.300} paa.naana.m padajaataani, sabbaani taani hatthipade samodhaana.m gacchanti; hatthipada.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m mahantattena. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, appamaado eko dhammo bhaavito bahuliikato ubho ^a^T3.0408^ea^ atthe samadhiggayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m, yo ca attho samparaayiko.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, kuu.taagaarassa yaa kaaci gopaanasiyo sabbaa taa kuu.ta"ngamaa kuu.taninnaa kuu.tasamosara.naa, kuu.ta.m taasa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva.m kho, braahma.na ^a^P3.0365^ea^...pe0....
[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, pabbajalaayako pabbaja.m {babbajalaayako babbaja.m (sii0 pii0)} laayitvaa agge gahetvaa odhunaati nidhunaati nicchaadeti; evameva.m kho, braahma.na...pe0....
[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, ambapi.n.diyaa va.n.tacchinnaaya yaani kaanici ambaani va.n.tuupanibandhanaani sabbaani taani tadanvayaani bhavanti; evameva.m kho, braahma.na...pe0....

[03] ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, ye keci khuddaraajaano {ku.d.daraajaano (sii0 syaa0 a.t.tha0), kuddaraajaano (pii0) a0 ni0 10.15} sabbete ra~n~no cakkavattissa anuyantaa {anuyuttaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhavanti, raajaa tesa.m cakkavattii aggamakkhaayati; evameva.m kho, braahma.na...pe0....

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M2.0321^ea^, braahma.na, yaa kaaci taarakaruupaana.m pabhaa sabbaa taa candassa pabhaaya kala.m naagghanti so.lasi.m, candappabhaa taasa.m aggamakkhaayati. evameva.m kho, braahma.na, appamaado eko ^a^V2.0078^ea^ dhammo bhaavito bahuliikato ubho atthe samadhiggayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m yo ca attho samparaayiko.
[03] ``aya.m kho, braahma.na, eko dhammo bhaavito bahuliikato ubho atthe samadhiggayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m, yo ca attho samparaayiko''ti.
[03] ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T3.0409^ea^ ^a^P3.0366^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa dhammiko jaatibhuumiya.m aavaasiko hoti sabbaso jaatibhuumiya.m sattasu aavaasesu. tatra suda.m aayasmaa dhammiko aagantuke bhikkhuu akkosati paribhaasati vihi.msati vitudati roseti vaacaaya. te ca aagantukaa bhikkhuu aayasmataa dhammikena akkosiyamaanaa paribhaasiyamaanaa vihesiyamaanaa vitudiyamaanaa rosiyamaanaa vaacaaya pakkamanti, na sa.n.thanti {na sa.n.thahanti (sii0)}, ri~ncanti aavaasa.m.

[03] atha kho jaatibhuumakaana.m {jaatibhuumikaana.m (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} upaasakaana.m etadahosi -- ``maya.m kho bhikkhusa"ngha.m paccupa.t.thitaa ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena. atha ca pana aagantukaa bhikkhuu pakkamanti, na sa.n.thanti, ri~ncanti aavaasa.m. ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yena aagantukaa bhikkhuu pakkamanti, na sa.n.thanti, ri~ncanti aavaasa''nti? atha kho jaatibhuumakaana.m upaasakaana.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa dhammiko aagantuke bhikkhuu akkosati paribhaasati vihi.msati vitudati roseti vaacaaya. te ca aagantukaa bhikkhuu aayasmataa dhammikena akkosiyamaanaa paribhaasiyamaanaa vihesiyamaanaa vitudiyamaanaa rosiyamaanaa vaacaaya pakkamanti ^a^M2.0322^ea^, na sa.n.thanti, ri~ncanti aavaasa.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m aayasmanta.m dhammika.m pabbaajeyyaamaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V2.0079^ea^ kho jaatibhuumakaa upaasakaa yena aayasmaa dhammiko tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m dhammika.m etadavocu.m -- ``pakkamatu, bhante, aayasmaa dhammiko imamhaa aavaasaa; ala.m te idha vaasenaa''ti. atha ^a^T3.0410^ea^ kho aayasmaa dhammiko tamhaa aavaasaa a~n~na.m aavaasa.m agamaasi. tatrapi suda.m aayasmaa dhammiko aagantuke bhikkhuu akkosati paribhaasati vihi.msati vitudati roseti vaacaaya. te ca aagantukaa bhikkhuu aayasmataa dhammikena akkosiyamaanaa paribhaasiyamaanaa vihesiyamaanaa vitudiyamaanaa rosiyamaanaa vaacaaya pakkamanti, na sa.n.thanti, ri~ncanti ^a^P3.0367^ea^ aavaasa.m.

[03] atha kho jaatibhuumakaana.m upaasakaana.m etadahosi -- ``maya.m kho bhikkhusa"ngha.m paccupa.t.thitaa ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena. atha ca pana aagantukaa bhikkhuu pakkamanti, na sa.n.thanti, ri~ncanti aavaasa.m. ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yena aagantukaa bhikkhuu pakkamanti, na sa.n.thanti, ri~ncanti aavaasa''nti? atha kho jaatibhuumakaana.m upaasakaana.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa dhammiko aagantuke bhikkhuu akkosati paribhaasati vihi.msati vitudati roseti vaacaaya. te ca aagantukaa bhikkhuu aayasmataa dhammikena akkosiyamaanaa paribhaasiyamaanaa vihesiyamaanaa vitudiyamaanaa rosiyamaanaa vaacaaya pakkamanti, na sa.n.thanti, ri~ncanti aavaasa.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m aayasmanta.m dhammika.m pabbaajeyyaamaa''ti.

[03] atha kho jaatibhuumakaa upaasakaa yenaayasmaa dhammiko tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m dhammika.m etadavocu.m -- ``pakkamatu, bhante, aayasmaa dhammiko imamhaapi aavaasaa; ala.m te idha vaasenaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa dhammiko tamhaapi aavaasaa a~n~na.m aavaasa.m agamaasi ^a^T3.0411^ea^. tatrapi suda.m aayasmaa dhammiko aagantuke bhikkhuu akkosati paribhaasati vihi.msati vitudati roseti vaacaaya. te ca aagantukaa bhikkhuu aayasmataa dhammikena akkosiyamaanaa paribhaasiyamaanaa vihesiyamaanaa vitudiyamaanaa rosiyamaanaa vaacaaya pakkamanti, na sa.n.thanti, ri~ncanti aavaasa.m.

[03] atha ^a^M2.0323^ea^ kho jaatibhuumakaana.m upaasakaana.m etadahosi -- ``maya.m kho bhikkhusa"ngha.m paccupa.t.thitaa ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena. atha ca pana aagantukaa bhikkhuu pakkamanti ^a^V2.0080^ea^, na sa.n.thanti, ri~ncanti aavaasa.m. ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yena aagantukaa bhikkhuu pakkamanti, na sa.n.thanti, ri~ncanti aavaasa''nti? atha kho jaatibhuumakaana.m upaasakaana.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa dhammiko aagantuke bhikkhuu akkosati...pe0... ^a^P3.0368^ea^. ya.mnuuna maya.m aayasmanta.m dhammika.m pabbaajeyyaama sabbaso jaatibhuumiya.m sattahi aavaasehii''ti. atha kho jaatibhuumakaa upaasakaa yenaayasmaa dhammiko tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m dhammika.m etadavocu.m -- ``pakkamatu, bhante, aayasmaa dhammiko sabbaso jaatibhuumiya.m sattahi aavaasehii''ti. atha kho aayasmato dhammikassa etadahosi -- ``pabbaajito khomhi jaatibhuumakehi upaasakehi sabbaso jaatibhuumiya.m sattahi aavaasehi. kaha.m nu kho daani gacchaamii''ti? atha kho aayasmato dhammikassa etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkameyya''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa dhammiko pattaciivaramaadaaya yena raajagaha.m tena pakkaami. anupubbena yena raajagaha.m gijjhakuu.to pabbato yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T3.0412^ea^ bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m dhammika.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``handa kuto nu tva.m, braahma.na dhammika, aagacchasii''ti? ``pabbaajito aha.m, bhante, jaatibhuumakehi upaasakehi sabbaso jaatibhuumiya.m sattahi aavaasehii''ti. ``ala.m, braahma.na dhammika, ki.m te iminaa, ya.m ta.m tato tato pabbaajenti, so tva.m tato tato pabbaajito mameva santike aagacchasi''.

[01] ``bhuutapubba.m, braahma.na dhammika, saamuddikaa vaa.nijaa tiiradassi.m saku.na.m gahetvaa naavaaya samudda.m ajjhogaahanti. te atiiradakkhi.niyaa {atiiradassaniyaa (syaa0), atiiradassiyaa (ka0)} naavaaya tiiradassi.m saku.na.m mu~ncanti. so gacchateva puratthima.m disa.m, gacchati pacchima.m disa.m, gacchati uttara.m disa.m, gacchati dakkhi.na.m disa.m, gacchati uddha.m, gacchati anudisa.m. sace so samantaa tiira.m passati, tathaagatakova {tathaagato (ka0) dii0 ni0 1.497 passitabba.m} hoti. sace pana so samantaa ^a^M2.0324^ea^ tiira.m na passati tameva naava.m paccaagacchati. evameva.m kho, braahma.na dhammika, ya.m ta.m tato tato pabbaajenti so tva.m tato tato pabbaajito mameva santike aagacchasi.

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^P3.0369^ea^, braahma.na dhammika, ra~n~no korabyassa suppati.t.tho naama nigrodharaajaa ahosi pa~ncasaakho siitacchaayo manoramo. suppati.t.thassa kho pana, braahma.na dhammika, nigrodharaajassa dvaadasayojanaani ^a^V2.0081^ea^ abhiniveso ahosi, pa~nca yojanaani muulasantaanakaana.m. suppati.t.thassa kho pana ^a^T3.0413^ea^, braahma.na dhammika, nigrodharaajassa taava mahantaani phalaani ahesu.m; seyyathaapi naama aa.lhakathaalikaa. evamassa saaduuni phalaani ahesu.m; seyyathaapi naama khudda.m madhu.m anelaka.m. suppati.t.thassa kho pana, braahma.na dhammika, nigrodharaajassa eka.m khandha.m raajaa paribhu~njati saddhi.m itthaagaarena, eka.m khandha.m balakaayo paribhu~njati, eka.m khandha.m negamajaanapadaa paribhu~njanti, eka.m khandha.m sama.nabraahma.naa paribhu~njanti, eka.m khandha.m migaa {migapakkhino (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} paribhu~njanti. suppati.t.thassa kho pana, braahma.na dhammika, nigrodharaajassa na koci phalaani rakkhati, na ca suda.m {na ca puna (ka0)} a~n~nama~n~nassa phalaani hi.msanti.

[03] ``atha kho, braahma.na dhammika, a~n~nataro puriso suppati.t.thassa nigrodharaajassa yaavadattha.m phalaani bhakkhitvaa saakha.m bha~njitvaa pakkaami. atha kho, braahma.na dhammika, suppati.t.the nigrodharaaje adhivatthaaya devataaya etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! yaava paapo manusso {yaava paapamanusso (syaa0), yaavataa paapamanusso (ka0)}, yatra hi naama suppati.t.thassa nigrodharaajassa yaavadattha.m phalaani bhakkhitvaa saakha.m bha~njitvaa pakkamissati, ya.mnuuna suppati.t.tho nigrodharaajaa aayati.m phala.m na dadeyyaa'ti. atha kho, braahma.na dhammika, suppati.t.tho nigrodharaajaa aayati.m phala.m na adaasi.

[03] ``atha kho, braahma.na dhammika, raajaa ^a^P3.0370^ea^ korabyo yena sakko devaanamindo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca -- `yagghe, maarisa, jaaneyyaasi suppati.t.tho nigrodharaajaa phala.m na detii'ti? atha kho, braahma.na ^a^T3.0414^ea^ dhammika, sakko devaanamindo tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhaasi {abhisa"nkhaaresi (syaa0 ka0)}, yathaa bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi aagantvaa suppati.t.tha.m nigrodharaaja.m pavattesi ^a^M2.0325^ea^ {paatesi (sii0 pii0)} ummuulamakaasi. atha kho, braahma.na dhammika, suppati.t.the nigrodharaaje adhivatthaa devataa dukkhii dummanaa assumukhii rudamaanaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.

[01] ``atha kho, braahma.na dhammika, sakko devaanamindo yena suppati.t.the nigrodharaaje adhivatthaa devataa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa suppati.t.the nigrodharaaje adhivattha.m devata.m etadavoca -- `ki.m nu tva.m, devate, dukkhii dummanaa assumukhii rudamaanaa ekamanta.m .thitaa'ti? `tathaa hi pana me, maarisa, bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi aagantvaa bhavana.m pavattesi ummuulamakaasii'ti. `api nu tva.m, devate, rukkhadhamme .thitaaya bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi aagantvaa bhavana.m pavattesi ummuulamakaasii'ti? `katha.m pana, maarisa ^a^V2.0082^ea^, rukkho rukkhadhamme .thito hotii'ti? `idha, devate, rukkhassa muula.m muulatthikaa haranti, taca.m tacatthikaa haranti, patta.m pattatthikaa haranti, puppha.m pupphatthikaa haranti, phala.m phalatthikaa haranti. na ca tena devataaya anattamanataa vaa anabhinandi {anabhiraddhi (sii0)} vaa kara.niiyaa. eva.m kho, devate, rukkho rukkhadhamme .thito hotii'ti. `a.t.thitaayeva kho me, maarisa, rukkhadhamme bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi aagantvaa bhavana.m pavattesi ummuulamakaasii'ti. `sace kho tva.m, devate, rukkhadhamme ti.t.theyyaasi, siyaa {siyaapi (sii0 pii0)} te bhavana.m yathaapure'ti? `.thassaamaha.m, {ti.t.theyyaamaha.m (syaa0)} maarisa ^a^P3.0371^ea^, rukkhadhamme, hotu me bhavana.m ^a^T3.0415^ea^ yathaapure'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, braahma.na dhammika, sakko devaanamindo tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhaasi {abhisa"nkhaari (syaa0 ka0)}, yathaa bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi aagantvaa suppati.t.tha.m nigrodharaaja.m ussaapesi, sacchaviini muulaani ahesu.m. evameva.m kho, braahma.na dhammika, api nu ta.m sama.nadhamme .thita.m jaatibhuumakaa upaasakaa pabbaajesu.m sabbaso jaatibhuumiya.m sattahi aavaasehii''ti? ``katha.m pana, bhante, sama.no sama.nadhamme .thito hotii''ti? ``idha, braahma.na dhammika, sama.no akkosanta.m na paccakkosati, rosanta.m na pa.tirosati, bha.n.danta.m na pa.tibha.n.dati. eva.m kho, braahma.na dhammika, sama.no sama.nadhamme .thito hotii''ti. ``a.t.thita.myeva ma.m, bhante, sama.nadhamme jaatibhuumakaa upaasakaa pabbaajesu.m sabbaso jaatibhuumiya.m sattahi aavaasehii''ti.

[03] {a0 ni0 7.66; 7.73} ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^M2.0326^ea^, braahma.na dhammika, sunetto naama satthaa ahosi titthakaro kaamesu viitaraago. sunettassa kho pana, braahma.na dhammika, satthuno anekaani saavakasataani ahesu.m. sunetto satthaa saavakaana.m brahmalokasahabyataaya dhamma.m desesi. ye kho pana, braahma.na dhammika, sunettassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyataaya dhamma.m desentassa cittaani na pasaadesu.m te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajji.msu. ye kho pana, braahma.na dhammika, sunettassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyataaya dhamma.m desentassa cittaani pasaadesu.m ^a^T3.0416^ea^ te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajji.msu.

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, braahma.na dhammika, muugapakkho naama satthaa ahosi...pe0... aranemi naama satthaa ahosi... kuddaalako naama satthaa ahosi... hatthipaalo naama satthaa ahosi... jotipaalo ^a^P3.0372^ea^ naama satthaa ahosi titthakaro kaamesu viitaraago. jotipaalassa kho pana, braahma.na dhammika, satthuno anekaani saavakasataani ahesu.m. jotipaalo satthaa saavakaana.m brahmalokasahabyataaya ^a^V2.0083^ea^ dhamma.m desesi. ye kho pana, braahma.na dhammika, jotipaalassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyataaya dhamma.m desentassa cittaani na pasaadesu.m te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajji.msu. ye kho pana, braahma.na dhammika, jotipaalassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyataaya dhamma.m desentassa cittaani pasaadesu.m te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajji.msu.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na dhammika, yo ime cha satthaare titthakare kaamesu viitaraage, anekasataparivaare sasaavakasa"nghe padu.t.thacitto akkoseyya paribhaaseyya, bahu.m so apu~n~na.m pasaveyyaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``yo kho, braahma.na dhammika, ime cha satthaare titthakare kaamesu viitaraage anekasataparivaare sasaavakasa"nghe padu.t.thacitto akkoseyya paribhaaseyya, bahu.m so apu~n~na.m pasaveyya. yo eka.m di.t.thisampanna.m puggala.m padu.t.thacitto akkosati paribhaasati, aya.m tato bahutara.m ^a^T3.0417^ea^ apu~n~na.m pasavati. ta.m kissa hetu? naaha.m, braahma.na dhammika, ito bahiddhaa evaruupi.m khanti.m {evaruupa.m khanta.m (syaa0)} vadaami, yathaama.m sabrahmacaariisu. tasmaatiha, braahma.na dhammika ^a^M2.0327^ea^, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na no samasabrahmacaariisu {na no aamasabrahmacaariisu (syaa0), na no sabrahmacaariisu (sii0 pii0)} cittaani padu.t.thaani bhavissantii'''ti. eva~nhi te, braahma.na dhammika, sikkhitabbanti.
[21] ``sunetto ^a^P3.0373^ea^ muugapakkho ca, aranemi ca braahma.no.
[22] kuddaalako ahu satthaa, hatthipaalo ca maa.navo..
[21] ``jotipaalo ca govindo, ahu sattapurohito.
[22] ahi.msakaa {abhisekaa (syaa0)} atiita.mse, cha satthaaro yasassino..
[21] ``niraamagandhaa karu.nedhimuttaa {vimuttaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, kaamasa.myojanaatigaa {kaamasa.myojanaatitaa (syaa0)}.
[22] kaamaraaga.m viraajetvaa, brahmalokuupagaa ahu.m {ahu (bahuusu), ahuu (ka0 sii0)}..
[21] ``ahesu.m saavakaa tesa.m, anekaani sataanipi.
[27] niraamagandhaa karu.nedhimuttaa, kaamasa.myojanaatigaa.
[22] kaamaraaga.m viraajetvaa, brahmalokuupagaa ahu.m {ahu (bahuusu), ahuu (ka0 sii0)}..
[21] ``yete ^a^V2.0084^ea^ isii baahirake, viitaraage samaahite.
[27] padu.t.thamanasa"nkappo, yo naro paribhaasati.
[22] bahu~nca so pasavati, apu~n~na.m taadiso naro..
[21] ``yo ceka.m di.t.thisampanna.m, bhikkhu.m buddhassa saavaka.m.
[27] padu.t.thamanasa"nkappo ^a^T3.0418^ea^, yo naro paribhaasati.
[22] aya.m tato bahutara.m, apu~n~na.m pasave naro..
[21] ``na saadhuruupa.m aasiide, di.t.thi.t.thaanappahaayina.m.
[22] sattamo puggalo eso, ariyasa"nghassa vuccati..
[21] ``aviitaraago kaamesu, yassa pa~ncindriyaa muduu.
[22] saddhaa sati ca viiriya.m, samatho ca vipassanaa..
[21] ``taadisa.m bhikkhumaasajja, pubbeva upaha~n~nati.
[22] attaana.m upahantvaana, pacchaa a~n~na.m vihi.msati..
[21] ``yo ^a^M2.0328^ea^ ca rakkhati attaana.m, rakkhito tassa baahiro.
[22] tasmaa rakkheyya attaana.m, akkhato pa.n.dito sadaa''ti.. dvaadasama.m.
[06] dhammikavaggo ^a^P3.0374^ea^ pa~ncamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] naagamigasaalaa i.na.m, cunda.m dve sandi.t.thikaa duve.
[22] khemaindriya aananda, khattiyaa appamaadena dhammikoti..
