[03] 55^b^.^eb^ {mahaava0 243 aagata.m} eva.m ^a^T3.0419^ea^, ^a^M2.0329^ea^ ^a^V2.0085^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa so.no raajagahe viharati siitavanasmi.m. atha kho aayasmato so.nassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``ye kho keci bhagavato saavakaa aaraddhaviiriyaa viharanti, aha.m tesa.m a~n~nataro. atha ca pana me na anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccati, sa.mvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogaa, sakkaa bhogaa ca bhu~njitu.m pu~n~naani ca kaatu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njeyya.m pu~n~naani ca kareyya''nti.

[01] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmato so.nassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sammi~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sammi~njeyya, evameva.m kho -- gijjhakuu.te pabbate antarahito siitavane aayasmato so.nassa sammukhe paaturahosi. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. aayasmaapi kho so.no bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m so.na.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``nanu ^a^P3.0375^ea^ te, so.na, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `ye kho keci bhagavato saavakaa aaraddhaviiriyaa viharanti, aha.m tesa.m a~n~nataro. atha ^a^T3.0420^ea^ ca pana me na anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccati, sa.mvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogaa, sakkaa bhogaa {bhoge (mahaava0 243)} ca bhu~njitu.m pu~n~naani ca kaatu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njeyya.m pu~n~naani ca kareyya'''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^M2.0330^ea^ ^a^V2.0086^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, so.na, kusalo tva.m pubbe agaariyabhuuto {aagaarikabhuuto (syaa0), agaarikabhuuto (mahaava0 243)} vii.naaya tantissare''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, so.na, yadaa te vii.naaya tantiyo accaayataa honti, api nu te vii.naa tasmi.m samaye saravatii vaa hoti kamma~n~naa vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, so.na, yadaa te vii.naaya tantiyo atisithilaa honti, api nu te vii.naa tasmi.m samaye saravatii vaa hoti kamma~n~naa vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``yadaa pana te, so.na, vii.naaya tantiyo na accaayataa honti naatisithilaa same gu.ne pati.t.thitaa, api nu te vii.naa tasmi.m samaye saravatii vaa hoti kamma~n~naa vaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, so.na, accaaraddhaviiriya.m uddhaccaaya sa.mvattati, atisithilaviiriya.m kosajjaaya sa.mvattati. tasmaatiha tva.m, so.na, viiriyasamatha.m adhi.t.thaha.m, indriyaana~nca samata.m pa.tivijjha, tattha ca nimitta.m ga.nhaahii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa so.no bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m so.na.m iminaa ovaadena ovaditvaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva.m kho -- siitavane antarahito gijjhakuu.te ^a^T3.0421^ea^ pabbate paaturahosi.

[03] atha ^a^P3.0376^ea^ kho aayasmaa so.no aparena samayena viiriyasamatha.m adhi.t.thaasi, indriyaana~nca samata.m pa.tivijjhi, tattha ca nimitta.m aggahesi. atha kho aayasmaa so.no eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anaagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa so.no arahata.m ahosi.

[03] atha kho aayasmato so.nassa arahattappattassa etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkameyya.m; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato santike a~n~na.m byaakareyya''nti. atha kho aayasmaa so.no ^a^V2.0087^ea^ yena bhagavaa ^a^M2.0331^ea^ tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa so.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``yo so, bhante, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naavimutto, so cha .thaanaani adhimutto hoti -- nekkhammaadhimutto hoti, pavivekaadhimutto hoti, abyaapajjaadhimutto {abyaapajjhaadhimutto (ka0) mahaava0 244 passitabba.m} hoti, ta.nhaakkhayaadhimutto hoti, upaadaanakkhayaadhimutto hoti, asammohaadhimutto hoti.

[03] ``siyaa kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa aayasmato evamassa -- `kevala.msaddhaamattaka.m nuuna ayamaayasmaa nissaaya nekkhammaadhimutto'ti ^a^T3.0422^ea^. na kho paneta.m, bhante, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. khii.naasavo, bhante, bhikkhu vusitavaa katakara.niiyo kara.niiya.m attano asamanupassanto katassa vaa pa.ticaya.m khayaa raagassa viitaraagattaa nekkhammaadhimutto hoti, khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa nekkhammaadhimutto hoti, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa nekkhammaadhimutto hoti.

[03] ``siyaa ^a^P3.0377^ea^ kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa aayasmato evamassa -- `laabhasakkaarasiloka.m nuuna ayamaayasmaa nikaamayamaano pavivekaadhimutto'ti. na kho paneta.m, bhante, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. khii.naasavo, bhante, bhikkhu vusitavaa katakara.niiyo kara.niiya.m attano asamanupassanto katassa vaa pa.ticaya.m khayaa raagassa viitaraagattaa pavivekaadhimutto hoti, khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa pavivekaadhimutto hoti, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa pavivekaadhimutto hoti.

[03] ``siyaa kho pana, bhante, idhekaccassa aayasmato evamassa -- `siilabbataparaamaasa.m nuuna ayamaayasmaa saarato paccaagacchanto abyaapajjaadhimutto'ti. na kho paneta.m, bhante, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. khii.naasavo, bhante, bhikkhu vusitavaa katakara.niiyo kara.niiya.m attano asamanupassanto katassa vaa pa.ticaya.m khayaa raagassa viitaraagattaa abyaapajjaadhimutto hoti, khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa abyaapajjaadhimutto hoti, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa abyaapajjaadhimutto hoti.

[03] ``khayaa ^a^M2.0332^ea^ ^a^V2.0088^ea^ raagassa viitaraagattaa ta.nhaakkhayaadhimutto hoti, khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa ta.nhaakkhayaadhimutto hoti, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa ta.nhaakkhayaadhimutto hoti.
[03] ``khayaa raagassa viitaraagattaa upaadaanakkhayaadhimutto hoti, khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa upaadaanakkhayaadhimutto hoti, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa upaadaanakkhayaadhimutto hoti.
[03] ``khayaa raagassa viitaraagattaa ^a^T3.0423^ea^ asammohaadhimutto hoti, khayaa dosassa viitadosattaa asammohaadhimutto hoti, khayaa mohassa viitamohattaa asammohaadhimutto hoti.

[03] ``eva.m sammaa vimuttacittassa, bhante, bhikkhuno bhusaa cepi cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa cakkhussa aapaatha.m {aapaata.m (ka0)} aagacchanti, nevassa citta.m pariyaadiyanti. amissiikatamevassa citta.m hoti .thita.m aane~njappatta.m vaya~ncassaanupassati ^a^P3.0378^ea^. bhusaa cepi sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa... manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa manassa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, nevassa citta.m pariyaadiyanti. amissiikatamevassa citta.m hoti .thita.m aane~njappatta.m vaya~ncassaanupassati. seyyathaapi, bhante, selo pabbato acchiddo asusiro ekagghano. atha puratthimaaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi neva na.m sa"nkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampavedheyya, atha pacchimaaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi...pe0... atha uttaraaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi... atha dakkhi.naaya cepi disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi neva na.m sa"nkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampavedheyya; evameva.m kho, bhante, eva.m sammaavimuttacittassa bhikkhuno bhusaa cepi cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa cakkhussa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, nevassa citta.m pariyaadiyanti. amissiikatamevassa citta.m ^a^T3.0424^ea^ hoti .thita.m aane~njappatta.m vaya~ncassaanupassati. bhusaa cepi sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa... manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa manassa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, nevassa citta.m pariyaadiyanti. amissiikatamevassa citta.m hoti .thita.m aane~njappatta.m vaya~ncassaanupassatii''ti.
[21] ``nekkhamma.m ^a^M2.0333^ea^ adhimuttassa, paviveka~nca cetaso.
[22] abyaapajjaadhimuttassa, upaadaanakkhayassa ca..
[21] ``ta.nhaakkhayaadhimuttassa ^a^V2.0089^ea^, asammoha~nca cetaso.
[22] disvaa aayatanuppaada.m, sammaa citta.m vimuccati..
[21] ``tassa sammaa vimuttassa, santacittassa bhikkhuno.
[22] katassa pa.ticayo natthi, kara.niiya.m na vijjati..
[21] ``selo ^a^P3.0379^ea^ yathaa ekagghano, vaatena na samiirati.
[22] eva.m ruupaa rasaa saddaa, gandhaa phassaa ca kevalaa..
[21] ``i.t.thaa dhammaa ani.t.thaa ca, nappavedhenti taadino.
[22] .thita.m citta.m vippamutta.m {vimuta~nca (ka0) mahaava0 244; kathaa0 266}, vaya~ncassaanupassatii''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa phagguno {phegguno (ka0), phaggu.no (sii0 syaa0)} aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmaa, bhante, phagguno aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. saadhu, bhante ^a^T3.0425^ea^, bhagavaa yenaayasmaa phagguno tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa phagguno tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho aayasmaa phagguno bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana ma~ncake samadhosi {sama~ncopi (sii0 syaa0 pii0), sa.m + dhuu + ii = samadhosi}. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m phagguna.m etadavoca -- ``ala.m, phagguna, maa tva.m ma~ncake samadhosi. santimaani aasanaani parehi pa~n~nattaani, tatthaaha.m nisiidissaamii''ti. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m phagguna.m etadavoca --

[03] ``kacci te, phagguna, khamaniiya.m kacci yaapaniiya.m? kacci te dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no abhikkamo''ti? ``na me ^a^V2.0090^ea^, bhante ^a^M2.0334^ea^, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, balavaa puriso ti.nhena sikharena muddhani {muddhaana.m (sii0 pii0)} abhimattheyya {abhima.t.theyya (syaa0)}; evameva.m kho me, bhante, adhimattaa vaataa muddhani {hananti (sii0 pii0), ohananti (syaa0)} ^a^P3.0380^ea^ uuhananti. na me, bhante, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m ^a^T3.0426^ea^ pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, balavaa puriso da.lhena varattakkha.n.dena siisave.thana.m dadeyya; evameva.m kho me, bhante, adhimattaa siise siisavedanaa. na me, bhante, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa ti.nhena govikantanena kucchi.m parikanteyya; evameva.m kho me, bhante, adhimattaa vaataa kucchi.m parikantanti. na me, bhante, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, dve balavanto purisaa dubbalatara.m purisa.m naanaabaahaasu gahetvaa a"ngaarakaasuyaa santaapeyyu.m samparitaapeyyu.m; evameva.m kho me, bhante, adhimatto kaayasmi.m .daaho. na me, bhante, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti; abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo''ti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m phagguna.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa phagguno acirapakkantassa bhagavato kaalamakaasi. tamhi cassa samaye mara.nakaale indriyaani vippasiidi.msu. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa ^a^P3.0381^ea^ tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa ^a^V2.0091^ea^ aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmaa, bhante, phagguno acirapakkantassa bhagavato ^a^M2.0335^ea^ kaalamakaasi. tamhi cassa samaye mara.nakaale indriyaani vippasiidi.msuu''ti.

[03] ``ki.m haananda, phaggunassa {pheggunassa aananda (ka0)} bhikkhuno indriyaani na vippasiidissanti! phaggunassa, aananda, bhikkhuno pa~ncahi orambhaagiyehi ^a^T3.0427^ea^ sa.myojanehi citta.m avimutta.m ahosi. tassa ta.m dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa~ncahi orambhaagiyehi sa.myojanehi citta.m vimutta.m.

[03] ``chayime, aananda, aanisa.msaa kaalena dhammassavane {dhammasava.ne (sii0)} kaalena atthupaparikkhaaya. katame cha? idhaananda, bhikkhuno pa~ncahi orambhaagiyehi sa.myojanehi citta.m avimutta.m hoti. so tamhi samaye mara.nakaale labhati tathaagata.m dassanaaya. tassa tathaagato dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. tassa ta.m dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa~ncahi orambhaagiyehi sa.myojanehi citta.m vimuccati. aya.m, aananda, pa.thamo aanisa.mso kaalena dhammassavane.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhuno pa~ncahi orambhaagiyehi sa.myojanehi citta.m avimutta.m hoti. so tamhi samaye mara.nakaale na heva kho {no ca kho (ka0)} labhati tathaagata.m dassanaaya, api ca kho tathaagatasaavaka.m labhati dassanaaya. tassa tathaagatasaavako dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. tassa ta.m dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa~ncahi orambhaagiyehi sa.myojanehi citta.m vimuccati. aya.m, aananda, dutiyo aanisa.mso kaalena dhammassavane.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhuno pa~ncahi orambhaagiyehi ^a^P3.0382^ea^ sa.myojanehi citta.m avimutta.m hoti. so tamhi samaye mara.nakaale na heva kho labhati tathaagata.m dassanaaya, napi tathaagatasaavaka.m labhati dassanaaya; api ca kho yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi ^a^T3.0428^ea^ anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati. tassa yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m ^a^M2.0336^ea^ dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakkayato anuvicaarayato manasaanupekkhato pa~ncahi orambhaagiyehi sa.myojanehi citta.m vimuccati. aya.m, aananda, tatiyo aanisa.mso kaalena atthupaparikkhaaya.

[03] ``idhaananda ^a^V2.0092^ea^, bhikkhuno pa~ncahi orambhaagiyehi sa.myojanehi citta.m vimutta.m hoti, anuttare ca kho upadhisa"nkhaye citta.m avimutta.m hoti. so tamhi samaye mara.nakaale labhati tathaagata.m dassanaaya. tassa tathaagato dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m...pe0... brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. tassa ta.m dhammadesana.m sutvaa anuttare upadhisa"nkhaye citta.m vimuccati. aya.m, aananda, catuttho aanisa.mso kaalena dhammassavane.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhuno pa~ncahi orambhaagiyehi sa.myojanehi citta.m vimutta.m hoti, anuttare ca kho upadhisa"nkhaye citta.m avimutta.m hoti. so tamhi samaye mara.nakaale na heva kho labhati tathaagata.m dassanaaya, api ca kho tathaagatasaavaka.m labhati dassanaaya. tassa tathaagatasaavako dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m...pe0... parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. tassa ta.m dhammadesana.m sutvaa anuttare upadhisa"nkhaye citta.m vimuccati. aya.m, aananda, pa~ncamo aanisa.mso kaalena dhammassavane.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhuno pa~ncahi orambhaagiyehi sa.myojanehi citta.m vimutta.m hoti, anuttare ^a^P3.0383^ea^ ca kho upadhisa"nkhaye citta.m avimutta.m hoti. so tamhi samaye mara.nakaale na heva kho labhati tathaagata.m dassanaaya, napi tathaagatasaavaka.m labhati dassanaaya; api ca kho ^a^T3.0429^ea^ yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati. tassa yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakkayato anuvicaarayato manasaanupekkhato anuttare upadhisa"nkhaye citta.m vimuccati. aya.m, aananda, cha.t.tho aanisa.mso kaalena atthupaparikkhaaya. ime kho, aananda, cha aanisa.msaa kaalena dhammassavane kaalena atthupaparikkhaayaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^M2.0337^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``puura.nena, bhante, kassapena cha.labhijaatiyo pa~n~nattaa -- ka.nhaabhijaati pa~n~nattaa, niilaabhijaati pa~n~nattaa, lohitaabhijaati pa~n~nattaa, haliddaabhijaati pa~n~nattaa, sukkaabhijaati pa~n~nattaa, paramasukkaabhijaati pa~n~nattaa.

[03] ``tatrida.m ^a^V2.0093^ea^, bhante, puura.nena kassapena ka.nhaabhijaati pa~n~nattaa, orabbhikaa suukarikaa saaku.nikaa maagavikaa luddaa macchaghaatakaa coraa coraghaatakaa bandhanaagaarikaa ye vaa pana~n~nepi keci kuruurakammantaa.
[03] ``tatrida.m, bhante, puura.nena kassapena niilaabhijaati pa~n~nattaa, bhikkhuu ka.n.takavuttikaa ye vaa pana~n~nepi keci kammavaadaa kriyavaadaa.
[03] ``tatrida.m, bhante, puura.nena kassapena lohitaabhijaati pa~n~nattaa, niga.n.thaa ekasaa.takaa ^a^P3.0384^ea^.
[03] ``tatrida.m, bhante, puura.nena kassapena haliddaabhijaati pa~n~nattaa, gihii odaatavasanaa acelakasaavakaa ^a^T3.0430^ea^.
[03] ``tatrida.m, bhante, puura.nena kassapena sukkaabhijaati pa~n~nattaa, aajiivakaa aajiivakiniyo.
[03] ``tatrida.m, bhante, puura.nena kassapena paramasukkaabhijaati pa~n~nattaa, nando vaccho kiso sa.mkicco makkhali gosaalo. puura.nena, bhante, kassapena imaa cha.labhijaatiyo pa~n~nattaa''ti.

[03] ``ki.m panaananda, puura.nassa kassapassa sabbo loko etadabbhanujaanaati imaa cha.labhijaatiyo pa~n~naapetu''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``seyyathaapi, aananda, puriso daliddo assako anaa.lhiko, tassa akaamakassa bila.m olaggeyyu.m -- `ida.m te, ambho purisa, ma.msa~nca khaaditabba.m, muula~nca anuppadaatabba'nti. evameva.m kho, aananda, puura.nena kassapena appa.ti~n~naaya etesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m imaa cha.labhijaatiyo pa~n~nattaa, yathaa ta.m baalena abyattena akhetta~n~nunaa akusalena.

[03] ``aha.m kho panaananda, cha.labhijaatiyo pa~n~naapemi. ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``katamaa caananda, cha.labhijaatiyo ^a^M2.0338^ea^? idhaananda, ekacco ka.nhaabhijaatiyo samaano ^a^V2.0094^ea^ ka.nha.m dhamma.m abhijaayati. idha panaananda, ekacco ka.nhaabhijaatiyo samaano sukka.m ^a^T3.0431^ea^ dhamma.m abhijaayati. idha panaananda, ekacco ka.nhaabhijaatiyo samaano aka.nha.m asukka.m nibbaana.m abhijaayati. idha panaananda, ekacco sukkaabhijaatiyo ^a^P3.0385^ea^ samaano ka.nha.m dhamma.m abhijaayati. idha panaananda, ekacco sukkaabhijaatiyo samaano sukka.m dhamma.m abhijaayati. idha panaananda, ekacco sukkaabhijaatiyo samaano aka.nha.m asukka.m nibbaana.m abhijaayati.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda, ka.nhaabhijaatiyo samaano ka.nha.m dhamma.m abhijaayati? idhaananda, ekacco niice kule paccaajaato hoti -- ca.n.daalakule vaa nesaadakule vaa venakule {ve.nakule (sabbattha)} vaa rathakaarakule vaa pukkusakule vaa, dalidde appannapaanabhojane kasiravuttike, yattha kasirena ghaasacchaado labbhati. so ca hoti dubba.n.no duddasiko oko.timako bavhaabaadho kaa.no vaa ku.nii vaa kha~njo vaa pakkhahato vaa, na laabhii annassa paanassa vatthassa yaanassa maalaagandhavilepanassa seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa. so kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. eva.m kho, aananda, ka.nhaabhijaatiyo samaano ka.nha.m dhamma.m abhijaayati.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda, ka.nhaabhijaatiyo samaano sukka.m dhamma.m abhijaayati? idhaananda, ekacco niice kule paccaajaato hoti -- ca.n.daalakule vaa...pe0... seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa. so kaayena sucarita.m carati, vaacaaya sucarita.m carati, manasaa sucarita.m carati. so kaayena sucarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya sucarita.m caritvaa, manasaa sucarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. eva.m kho, aananda, ka.nhaabhijaatiyo samaano sukka.m dhamma.m abhijaayati.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda, ka.nhaabhijaatiyo samaano aka.nha.m asukka.m nibbaana.m ^a^T3.0432^ea^ abhijaayati? idhaananda, ekacco niice kule paccaajaato hoti -- ca.n.daalakule ^a^M2.0339^ea^ vaa...pe0... so ca hoti dubba.n.no duddasiko oko.timako ^a^P3.0386^ea^. so kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. so eva.m pabbajito samaano pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne, catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacitto, saaa bojjha"nge ^a^V2.0095^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m bhaavetvaa aka.nha.m asukka.m nibbaana.m abhijaayati. eva.m kho, aananda, ka.nhaabhijaatiyo samaano aka.nha.m asukka.m nibbaana.m abhijaayati.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda, sukkaabhijaatiyo samaano ka.nha.m dhamma.m abhijaayati? idhaananda, ekacco ucce kule paccaajaato hoti -- khattiyamahaasaalakule vaa braahma.namahaasaalakule vaa gahapatimahaasaalakule vaa, a.d.dhe mahaddhane mahaabhoge pahuutajaataruuparajate pahuutavittuupakara.ne pahuutadhanadha~n~ne. so ca hoti abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato, laabhii annassa paanassa vatthassa yaanassa maalaagandhavilepanassa seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa. so kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. eva.m kho, aananda, sukkaabhijaatiyo samaano ka.nha.m dhamma.m abhijaayati.

[03] ``katha~ncaananda, sukkaabhijaatiyo samaano sukka.m dhamma.m abhijaayati? idhaananda, ekacco ucce kule paccaajaato hoti -- khattiyamahaasaalakule ^a^T3.0433^ea^ vaa...pe0... seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa. so kaayena sucarita.m carati, vaacaaya sucarita.m carati, manasaa sucarita.m carati. so kaayena sucarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya sucarita.m caritvaa, manasaa sucarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. eva.m kho, aananda, sukkaabhijaatiyo samaano sukka.m dhamma.m abhijaayati.

[01] ``katha~ncaananda, sukkaabhijaatiyo samaano aka.nha.m asukka.m nibbaana.m abhijaayati? idhaananda ^a^P3.0387^ea^, ekacco ucce kule paccaajaato hoti -- khattiyamahaasaalakule ^a^M2.0340^ea^ vaa braahma.namahaasaalakule vaa gahapatimahaasaalakule vaa, a.d.dhe mahaddhane mahaabhoge pahuutajaataruuparajate pahuutavittuupakara.ne pahuutadhanadha~n~ne. so ca hoti abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato, laabhii annassa paanassa vatthassa yaanassa maalaagandhavilepanassa seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa ^a^V2.0096^ea^. so kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. so eva.m pabbajito samaano pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne, catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacitto, satta bojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m bhaavetvaa aka.nha.m asukka.m nibbaana.m abhijaayati. eva.m kho, aananda, sukkaabhijaatiyo samaano aka.nha.m asukka.m nibbaana.m abhijaayati. imaa kho, aananda, cha.labhijaatiyo''ti. tatiya.m.
[03] 58^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti ^a^T3.0434^ea^ paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa.

[03] katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ye aasavaa sa.mvaraa pahaatabbaa te sa.mvarena pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa pa.tisevanaa pahaatabbaa te pa.tisevanaaya pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa adhivaasanaa pahaatabbaa te adhivaasanaaya pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa parivajjanaa pahaatabbaa te parivajjanaaya pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa vinodanaa pahaatabbaa te vinodanaaya pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa bhaavanaa pahaatabbaa te bhaavanaaya pahiinaa honti.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa sa.mvaraa pahaatabbaa ye sa.mvarena pahiinaa honti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso cakkhundriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati. ya.m hissa, bhikkhave, cakkhundriyasa.mvara.m asa.mvutassa viharato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa ^a^P3.0388^ea^ vighaatapari.laahaa, cakkhundriyasa.mvara.m sa.mvutassa viharato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso sotindriya...pe0... ghaanindriya... jivhindriya... kaayindriya... manindriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto ^a^M2.0341^ea^ viharati. ya.m hissa, bhikkhave, manindriyasa.mvara.m asa.mvutassa viharato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, manindriyasa.mvara.m sa.mvutassa viharato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa sa.mvaraa pahaatabbaa ye sa.mvarena pahiinaa honti.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa pa.tisevanaa pahaatabbaa ye pa.tisevanaaya ^a^T3.0435^ea^ pahiinaa honti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso ciivara.m pa.tisevati -- `yaavadeva siitassa pa.tighaataaya ^a^V2.0097^ea^, u.nhassa pa.tighaataaya, .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassaana.m {.da.msa... siri.msapasamphassaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii) ma0 ni0 1.23} pa.tighaataaya, yaavadeva hirikopiinapa.ticchaadanattha.m'. pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso pi.n.dapaata.m pa.tisevati -- `neva davaaya na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya, vihi.msuuparatiyaa brahmacariyaanuggahaaya, iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami, nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro ca' {phaasuvihaaro caati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso senaasana.m pa.tisevati -- `yaavadeva siitassa pa.tighaataaya, u.nhassa pa.tighaataaya, .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassaana.m pa.tighaataaya, yaavadeva utuparissayavinodanapa.tisallaanaaraamattha.m'. pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m pa.tisevati -- `yaavadeva uppannaana.m veyyaabaadhikaana.m vedanaana.m pa.tighaataaya, abyaabajjhaparamataayaa'ti. ya.m ^a^P3.0389^ea^ hissa, bhikkhave, appa.tisevato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, pa.tisevato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa pa.tisevanaa pahaatabbaa ye pa.tisevanaaya pahiinaa honti.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa adhivaasanaa pahaatabbaa ye adhivaasanaaya pahiinaa honti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso khamo hoti siitassa u.nhassa, jighacchaaya, pipaasaaya, .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassaana.m, duruttaana.m duraagataana.m vacanapathaana.m, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m adhivaasakajaatiko ^a^T3.0436^ea^ hoti. ya.m hissa, bhikkhave ^a^M2.0342^ea^, anadhivaasato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, adhivaasato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa adhivaasanaa pahaatabbaa ye adhivaasanaaya pahiinaa honti.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa parivajjanaa pahaatabbaa ye parivajjanaaya pahiinaa honti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso ca.n.da.m hatthi.m parivajjeti, ca.n.da.m assa.m parivajjeti, ca.n.da.m go.na.m parivajjeti, ca.n.da.m kukkura.m parivajjeti, ahi.m khaa.nu.m ka.n.taka.t.thaana.m sobbha.m papaata.m candanika.m o.ligalla.m, yathaaruupe anaasane nisinna.m, yathaaruupe agocare caranta.m, yathaaruupe paapake mitte bhajanta.m vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii paapakesu .thaanesu okappeyyu.m, so ta~nca anaasana.m ta~nca agocara.m te ca paapake mitte pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso parivajjeti. ya.m hissa, bhikkhave, aparivajjayato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, parivajjayato eva.msa te aasavaa ^a^V2.0098^ea^ vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime ^a^P3.0390^ea^ vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa parivajjanaa pahaatabbaa ye parivajjanaaya pahiinaa honti.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa vinodanaa pahaatabbaa ye vinodanaaya pahiinaa honti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso uppanna.m kaamavitakka.m naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti, pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso uppanna.m byaapaadavitakka.m...pe0... uppanna.m vihi.msaavitakka.m... uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti. ya.m hissa, bhikkhave, avinodayato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa ^a^T3.0437^ea^, vinodayato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa vinodanaa pahaatabbaa ye vinodanaaya pahiinaa honti.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa bhaavanaa pahaatabbaa ye bhaavanaaya pahiinaa honti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m, pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... viiriyasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... piitisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... passaddhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... samaadhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. ya.m hissa, bhikkhave, abhaavayato ^a^M2.0343^ea^ uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, bhaavayato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa bhaavanaa pahaatabbaa ye bhaavanaaya pahiinaa honti.
[03] ``imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P3.0391^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naatike viharati gi~njakaavasathe. atha kho daarukammiko gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho daarukammika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``api nu ^a^V2.0099^ea^ te, gahapati, kule daana.m diiyatii''ti? ``diiyati me, bhante, kule daana.m. ta~nca kho ye te bhikkhuu aara~n~nikaa pi.n.dapaatikaa pa.msukuulikaa arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa, tathaaruupesu ^a^T3.0438^ea^ me, bhante, bhikkhuusu daana.m diiyatii''ti.

[03] ``dujjaana.m kho eta.m, gahapati, tayaa gihinaa kaamabhoginaa puttasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavasantena, kaasikacandana.m paccanubhontena, maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaarayantena, jaataruuparajata.m saadiyantena ime vaa arahanto ime vaa arahattamagga.m samaapannaati.

[03] ``aara~n~niko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato unna.lo capalo mukharo viki.n.navaaco mu.t.thassati asampajaano asamaahito vibbhantacitto paakatindriyo. eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho. aara~n~niko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato anunna.lo acapalo amukharo aviki.n.navaaco upa.t.thitassati sampajaano samaahito ekaggacitto sa.mvutindriyo. eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso.
[03] ``gaamantavihaarii cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato...pe0... eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho. gaamantavihaarii cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato...pe0... eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso.

[03] ``pi.n.dapaatiko ^a^M2.0344^ea^ cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato...pe0... eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho. pi.n.dapaatiko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato...pe0... ^a^P3.0392^ea^ eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso.
[03] ``nemantaniko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato...pe0... eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho. nemantaniko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato...pe0... eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso.

[03] ``pa.msukuuliko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti uddhato...pe0... eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho ^a^V2.0100^ea^. pa.msukuuliko cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato...pe0... eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso.

[03] ``gahapaticiivaradharo cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu ^a^T3.0439^ea^ hoti uddhato unna.lo capalo mukharo viki.n.navaaco mu.t.thassati asampajaano asamaahito vibbhantacitto paakatindriyo. eva.m so tena"ngena gaarayho. gahapaticiivaradharo cepi, gahapati, bhikkhu hoti anuddhato anunna.lo acapalo amukharo aviki.n.navaaco upa.t.thitassati sampajaano samaahito ekaggacitto sa.mvutindriyo. eva.m so tena"ngena paasa.mso.

[03] ``i"ngha tva.m, gahapati, sa"nghe daana.m {daanaani (ka0)} dehi. sa"nghe te daana.m dadato citta.m pasiidissati. so tva.m pasannacitto kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjissasii''ti. ``esaaha.m, bhante, ajjatagge sa"nghe daana.m dassaamii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa ma.n.dalamaa.le sannisinnaa sannipatitaa abhidhammakatha.m kathenti. tatra suda.m aayasmaa citto hatthisaariputto theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m abhidhammakatha.m kathentaana.m antarantaraa katha.m opaateti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko aayasmanta.m citta.m hatthisaariputta.m etadavoca -- ``maayasmaa citto hatthisaariputto theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m abhidhammakatha.m ^a^M2.0345^ea^ kathentaana.m antarantaraa katha.m ^a^P3.0393^ea^ opaatesi, yaava kathaapariyosaana.m aayasmaa citto aagametuu''ti. eva.m vutte aayasmato cittassa hatthisaariputtassa sahaayakaa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m mahaako.t.thika.m etadavocu.m -- ``maayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko aayasmanta.m ^a^T3.0440^ea^ citta.m hatthisaariputta.m apasaadesi, pa.n.dito aayasmaa citto hatthisaariputto. pahoti caayasmaa citto hatthisaariputto theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m abhidhammakatha.m kathetu''nti.

[03] ``dujjaana.m kho eta.m, aavuso, parassa cetopariyaaya.m ajaanantehi. idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo taavadeva soratasorato hoti, nivaatanivaato hoti, upasantupasanto hoti, yaava satthaara.m ^a^V2.0101^ea^ upanissaaya viharati a~n~natara.m vaa garu.t.thaaniya.m sabrahmacaari.m. yato ca kho so vapakassateva satthaaraa, vapakassati garu.t.thaaniyehi sabrahmacaariihi, so sa.msa.t.tho viharati bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniihi upaasakehi upaasikaahi ra~n~naa raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi. tassa sa.msa.t.thassa vissatthassa paakatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. so raagaanuddha.msitena cittena sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, go.no ki.t.thaado daamena vaa baddho {aaraame vaa bandho (ka0)} vaje vaa oruddho. yo nu kho, aavuso, eva.m vadeyya -- `na daanaaya.m go.no ki.t.thaado punadeva ki.t.tha.m otarissatii'ti, sammaa nu kho so, aavuso, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, aavuso''. ``.thaana~nheta.m, aavuso, vijjati, ya.m so go.no ki.t.thaado daama.m vaa chetvaa vaja.m vaa bhinditvaa, atha punadeva ki.t.tha.m otareyyaati. evameva.m kho, aavuso, idhekacco puggalo ^a^P3.0394^ea^ taavadeva soratasorato hoti, nivaatanivaato hoti, upasantupasanto hoti yaava satthaara.m upanissaaya viharati a~n~natara.m vaa garu.t.thaaniya.m sabrahmacaari.m. yato ca kho so vapakassateva satthaaraa, vapakassati ^a^T3.0441^ea^ garu.t.thaaniyehi sabrahmacaariihi, so sa.msa.t.tho viharati bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniihi upaasakehi upaasikaahi ra~n~naa raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi. tassa sa.msa.t.thassa vissatthassa paakatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato raago citta.m anuddha.mseti ^a^M2.0346^ea^. so raagaanuddha.msitena cittena sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati.

[03] ``idha panaavuso, ekacco puggalo vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so `laabhimhi pa.thamassa jhaanassaa'ti sa.msa.t.tho viharati bhikkhuuhi...pe0... sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. seyyathaapi, aavuso, caatumahaapathe thullaphusitako devo vassanto {thullaphusitake deve vassante (ka0)} raja.m antaradhaapeyya, cikkhalla.m paatukareyya. yo nu kho, aavuso, eva.m vadeyya -- `na daani amusmi.m {amukasmi.m (ka0)} caatumahaapathe punadeva rajo paatubhavissatii'ti, sammaa nu kho so, aavuso, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, aavuso''. ``.thaana~nheta.m, aavuso, vijjati, ya.m amusmi.m caatumahaapathe manussaa vaa atikkameyyu.m, gopasuu vaa atikkameyyu.m, vaataatapo vaa snehagata.m pariyaadiyeyya, atha punadeva rajo paatubhaveyyaati. evameva.m kho, aavuso, idhekacco puggalo vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^V2.0102^ea^ viharati. so `laabhimhi pa.thamassa jhaanassaa'ti sa.msa.t.tho viharati bhikkhuuhi...pe0... sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati.

[03] ``idha ^a^P3.0395^ea^ panaavuso, ekacco puggalo vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so `laabhimhi dutiyassa jhaanassaa'ti sa.msa.t.tho viharati bhikkhuuhi...pe0... sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. seyyathaapi 3.0442, aavuso, gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa aviduure mahanta.m ta.laaka.m. tattha thullaphusitako devo vu.t.tho sippisambukampi sakkharaka.thalampi antaradhaapeyya. yo nu kho, aavuso, eva.m vadeyya -- `na daani amusmi.m ta.laake punadeva sippisambukaa vaa sakkharaka.thalaa vaa paatubhavissantii'ti, sammaa nu kho so, aavuso, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, aavuso''. ``.thaana~nheta.m, aavuso, vijjati, ya.m amusmi.m ta.laake manussaa vaa piveyyu.m, gopasuu vaa piveyyu.m, vaataatapo vaa snehagata.m pariyaadiyeyya, atha punadeva sippisambukaapi sakkharaka.thalaapi paatubhaveyyunti. evameva.m kho, aavuso, idhekacco puggalo vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so `laabhimhi dutiyassa jhaanassaa'ti sa.msa.t.tho viharati bhikkhuuhi...pe0... sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati.

[03] ``idha ^a^M2.0347^ea^ panaavuso, ekacco puggalo piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so `laabhimhi tatiyassa jhaanassaa'ti sa.msa.t.tho viharati bhikkhuuhi...pe0... sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. seyyathaapi, aavuso, purisa.m pa.niitabhojana.m bhuttaavi.m aabhidosika.m ^a^P3.0396^ea^ bhojana.m nacchaadeyya. yo nu kho, aavuso, eva.m vadeyya -- `na daani amu.m purisa.m punadeva bhojana.m chaadessatii'ti, sammaa nu kho so, aavuso, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, aavuso''. ``.thaana~nheta.m, aavuso, vijjati, amu.m purisa.m pa.niitabhojana.m bhuttaavi.m yaavassa saa ojaa kaaye .thassati taava na a~n~na.m bhojana.m chaadessati. yato ca khvassa ^a^T3.0443^ea^ saa ojaa antaradhaayissati, atha punadeva ta.m bhojana.m chaadeyyaati. evameva.m kho, aavuso, idhekacco puggalo piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so `laabhimhi tatiyassa jhaanassaa'ti sa.msa.t.tho viharati bhikkhuuhi...pe0... sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati.

[03] ``idha ^a^V2.0103^ea^, panaavuso, ekacco puggalo sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so `laabhimhi catutthassa jhaanassaa'ti sa.msa.t.tho viharati bhikkhuuhi...pe0... sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. seyyathaapi, aavuso, pabbatasa"nkhepe udakarahado nivaato vigatauumiko. yo nu kho, aavuso, eva.m vadeyya -- `na daani amusmi.m udakarahade punadeva uumi paatubhavissatii'ti, sammaa nu kho so, aavuso, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, aavuso''. ``.thaana~nheta.m, aavuso, vijjati, yaa puratthimaaya disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa ^a^P3.0397^ea^ vaatavu.t.thi. saa tasmi.m udakarahade uumi.m janeyya. yaa pacchimaaya disaaya aagaccheyya...pe0... yaa uttaraaya disaaya aagaccheyya... yaa dakkhi.naaya disaaya aagaccheyya bhusaa vaatavu.t.thi. saa tasmi.m udakarahade uumi.m janeyyaati. evameva.m kho, aavuso, idhekacco puggalo sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so `laabhimhi catutthassa jhaanassaa'ti sa.msa.t.tho viharati bhikkhuuhi...pe0... sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati.

[03] ``idha, panaavuso, ekacco puggalo sabbanimittaana.m amanasikaaraa animitta.m cetosamaadhi.m upasampajja viharati. so `laabhimhi animittassa cetosamaadhissaa'ti sa.msa.t.tho viharati bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniihi upaasakehi ^a^T3.0444^ea^ upaasikaahi ra~n~naa raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi ^a^M2.0348^ea^. tassa sa.msa.t.thassa vissatthassa paakatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. so raagaanuddha.msitena cittena sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. seyyathaapi, aavuso, raajaa vaa raajamahaamatto vaa catura"nginiyaa senaaya addhaanamaggappa.tipanno a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de ekaratti.m vaasa.m upagaccheyya. tatra {tattha (sii0 pii0)} hatthisaddena assasaddena rathasaddena pattisaddena bheripa.navasa"nkhati.navaninnaadasaddena ciirikasaddo {ciri.likaasaddo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} antaradhaayeyya {antaradhaapeyya (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}. yo nu kho, aavuso, eva.m vadeyya -- `na daani amusmi.m vanasa.n.de punadeva ciirikasaddo paatubhavissatii'ti, sammaa nu kho so ^a^P3.0398^ea^, aavuso, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, aavuso''. ``.thaana~nheta.m, aavuso, vijjati, ya.m so raajaa vaa raajamahaamatto vaa tamhaa vanasa.n.daa pakkameyya, atha punadeva ciirikasaddo paatubhaveyyaati. evameva.m kho, aavuso, idhekacco puggalo sabbanimittaana.m amanasikaaraa animitta.m cetosamaadhi.m upasampajja viharati. so `laabhimhi animittassa cetosamaadhissaa'ti sa.msa.t.tho viharati bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniihi upaasakehi upaasikaahi ^a^V2.0104^ea^ ra~n~naa raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi. tassa sa.msa.t.thassa vissatthassa paakatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. so raagaanuddha.msitena cittena sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattatii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa citto hatthisaariputto aparena samayena sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. atha kho cittassa hatthisaariputtassa sahaayakaa ^a^T3.0445^ea^ bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaako.t.thika.m etadavocu.m -- ``ki.m nu kho aayasmataa mahaako.t.thikena citto hatthisaariputto cetasaa ceto paricca vidito -- `imaasa~nca imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m citto hatthisaariputto laabhii, atha ca pana sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissatii'ti; udaahu devataa etamattha.m aarocesu.m -- `citto, bhante, hatthisaariputto imaasa~nca imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m laabhii, atha ca pana sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissatii'''ti? ``cetasaa ceto paricca vidito me, aavuso -- `citto hatthisaariputto imaasa~nca imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m laabhii, atha ca pana sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissatii'ti. devataapi me etamattha.m ^a^M2.0349^ea^ aarocesu.m -- `citto, bhante, hatthisaariputto imaasa~nca imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m laabhii, atha ca pana sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissatii''ti.

[03] atha kho cittassa hatthisaariputtassa sahaayakaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m ^a^P3.0399^ea^ nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``citto, bhante, hatthisaariputto imaasa~nca imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m laabhii, atha ca pana sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattatii''ti. ``na, bhikkhave, citto cira.m sarissati {padissati (ka0)} nekkhammassaa''ti.

[03] atha kho citto hatthisaariputto nacirasseva kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbaji. atha kho ^a^T3.0446^ea^ aayasmaa citto hatthisaariputto eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti ^a^V2.0105^ea^ abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa citto hatthisaariputto arahata.m ahosiiti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaana.m theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaana.m ma.n.dalamaa.le sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- ``vuttamida.m, aavuso, bhagavataa paaraayane metteyyapa~nhe --
[21] {cuu.lani0 tissamitteyyamaa.navapucchaa 67} ``yo ubhonte viditvaana, majjhe mantaa na lippati {na limpati (ka0)}.
[22] ta.m bruumi mahaapurisoti, sodha sibbini {sibbani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} maccagaa''ti..

[03] ``katamo nu kho, aavuso, eko anto, katamo dutiyo anto, ki.m majjhe, kaa sibbinii''ti? eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu there bhikkhuu ^a^M2.0350^ea^ etadavoca -- ``phasso kho, aavuso, eko anto, phassasamudayo dutiyo anto ^a^P3.0400^ea^, phassanirodho majjhe, ta.nhaa sibbinii; ta.nhaa hi na.m sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyaa. ettaavataa kho, aavuso, bhikkhu abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaanaati, pari~n~neyya.m parijaanaati, abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaananto {abhijaanitvaa (ka0)} pari~n~neyya.m parijaananto {parijaanitvaa (ka0)} di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``atiita.m kho, aavuso, eko anto, anaagata.m dutiyo anto, paccuppanna.m majjhe, ta.nhaa sibbinii; ta.nhaa hi na.m sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa ^a^T3.0447^ea^ abhinibbattiyaa. ettaavataa kho, aavuso, bhikkhu abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaanaati, pari~n~neyya.m parijaanaati, abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaananto, pari~n~neyya.m parijaananto di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``sukhaa, aavuso, vedanaa eko anto, dukkhaa vedanaa dutiyo anto, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa majjhe, ta.nhaa sibbinii; ta.nhaa hi na.m ^a^V2.0106^ea^ sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyaa. ettaavataa kho, aavuso, bhikkhu abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaanaati, pari~n~neyya.m parijaanaati, abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaananto, pari~n~neyya.m parijaananto di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``naama.m kho, aavuso, eko anto, ruupa.m dutiyo anto, vi~n~naa.na.m majjhe, ta.nhaa sibbinii; ta.nhaa hi na.m sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyaa. ettaavataa kho, aavuso, bhikkhu abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaanaati, pari~n~neyya.m parijaanaati, abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaananto pari~n~neyya.m parijaananto di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``cha kho, aavuso, ajjhattikaani aayatanaani eko anto, cha baahiraani aayatanaani dutiyo anto, vi~n~naa.na.m majjhe, ta.nhaa sibbinii; ta.nhaa hi na.m sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyaa. ettaavataa kho aavuso ^a^M2.0351^ea^, bhikkhu abhi~n~neyya.m ^a^P3.0401^ea^ abhijaanaati, pari~n~neyya.m ^a^T3.0448^ea^ parijaanaati, abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaananto pari~n~neyya.m parijaananto di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``sakkaayo kho, aavuso, eko anto, sakkaayasamudayo dutiyo anto, sakkaayanirodho majjhe, ta.nhaa sibbinii; ta.nhaa hi na.m sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyaa. ettaavataa kho, aavuso, bhikkhu abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaanaati, pari~n~neyya.m parijaanaati, abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaananto pari~n~neyya.m parijaananto {sabbatthapi evameva dissati} di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. aayaamaavuso, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocessaama. yathaa no bhagavaa byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti ^a^T3.0449^ea^ kho theraa bhikkhuu tassa bhikkhuno paccassosu.m. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu ^a^V2.0107^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho theraa bhikkhuu yaavatako ahosi sabbeheva saddhi.m kathaasallaapo, ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesu.m. ``kassa nu kho, bhante, subhaasita''nti? ``sabbesa.m vo, bhikkhave, subhaasita.m pariyaayena, api ca ya.m mayaa sandhaaya bhaasita.m paaraayane metteyyapa~nhe --
[21] ``yo ubhonte viditvaana, majjhe mantaa na lippati.
[22] ta.m bruumi mahaapurisoti, sodha sibbinimaccagaa''ti..

[03] ``ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho theraa bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``phasso kho, bhikkhave, eko anto ^a^P3.0402^ea^, phassasamudayo dutiyo anto, phassanirodho majjhe, ta.nhaa sibbinii; ta.nhaa hi na.m sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyaa. ettaavataa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaanaati, pari~n~neyya.m parijaanaati, abhi~n~neyya.m abhijaananto ^a^M2.0352^ea^ pari~n~neyya.m parijaananto di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena da.n.dakappaka.m naama kosalaana.m nigamo tadavasari. atha kho bhagavaa maggaa okkamma a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. te ca bhikkhuu da.n.dakappaka.m pavisi.msu aavasatha.m pariyesitu.m.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m yena aciravatii nadii tenupasa"nkami gattaani parisi~ncitu.m. aciravatiyaa nadiyaa gattaani parisi~ncitvaa paccuttaritvaa ekaciivaro a.t.thaasi gattaani pubbaapayamaano. atha ^a^T3.0450^ea^ kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso aananda, sabba.m cetaso samannaaharitvaa nu kho devadatto bhagavataa byaakato -- `aapaayiko devadatto nerayiko ^a^V2.0108^ea^ kappa.t.tho atekiccho'ti {cuu.lava0 348; a0 ni0 8.7 passitabba.m}, udaahu kenacideva pariyaayenaa'ti? ``eva.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, bhagavataa byaakata''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, bhante, sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m yena aciravatii nadii tenupasa"nkami.m gattaani parisi~ncitu.m. aciravatiyaa nadiyaa gattaani parisi~ncitvaa paccuttaritvaa ekaciivaro a.t.thaasi.m gattaani pubbaapayamaano ^a^P3.0403^ea^. atha kho, bhante, a~n~nataro bhikkhu yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m etadavoca -- `ki.m nu kho, aavuso, aananda sabba.m cetaso samannaaharitvaa nu ^a^T3.0451^ea^ kho devadatto bhagavataa byaakato -- aapaayiko devadatto nerayiko kappa.t.tho atekicchoti, udaahu kenacideva pariyaayenaa'ti? eva.m vutte aha.m, bhante, ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca.m -- `eva.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, bhagavataa byaakata'''nti.

[03] ``so ^a^M2.0353^ea^ vaa {so ca (syaa0)} kho, aananda, bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito, thero vaa pana baalo abyatto. katha~nhi naama ya.m mayaa eka.msena byaakata.m tattha dvejjha.m aapajjissati! naaha.m, aananda, a~n~na.m ekapuggalampi samanupassaami, yo eva.m mayaa sabba.m cetaso samannaaharitvaa byaakato, yathayida.m devadatto. yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m, aananda, devadattassa vaalaggako.tinittudanamattampi sukkadhamma.m addasa.m; neva taavaaha.m devadatta.m byaakaasi.m -- `aapaayiko devadatto nerayiko kappa.t.tho atekiccho'ti. yato ca kho aha.m, aananda, devadattassa vaalaggako.tinittudanamattampi sukkadhamma.m na addasa.m; athaaha.m devadatta.m byaakaasi.m -- `aapaayiko devadatto nerayiko kappa.t.tho atekiccho'ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aananda, guuthakuupo saadhikaporiso puuro guuthassa samatittiko. tatra puriso sasiisako nimuggo assa. tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya atthakaamo hitakaamo yogakkhemakaamo tamhaa guuthakuupaa uddharitukaamo. so ta.m guuthakuupa.m samantaanuparigacchanto neva passeyya tassa purisassa vaalaggako.tinittudanamattampi guuthena amakkhita.m, yattha ta.m ^a^P3.0404^ea^ gahetvaa uddhareyya. evameva.m kho aha.m, aananda, yato devadattassa vaalaggako.tinittudanamattampi sukkadhamma.m na addasa.m; athaaha.m devadatta.m ^a^T3.0452^ea^ byaakaasi.m -- `aapaayiko devadatto nerayiko kappa.t.tho atekiccho'ti ^a^V2.0109^ea^. sace tumhe, aananda, su.neyyaatha tathaagatassa purisindriya~naa.naani vibhajissaamii''ti {vibhajantassaati (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}?

[03] ``etassa, bhagavaa, kaalo; etassa, sugata, kaalo ya.m bhagavaa purisindriya~naa.naani vibhajeyya. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tenahaananda, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaaha.m, aananda, ekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- `imassa kho puggalassa vijjamaanaa kusalaapi dhammaa akusalaapi dhammaa'ti. tamena.m aparena samayena eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- `imassa kho puggalassa kusalaa dhammaa antarahitaa, akusalaa dhammaa sammukhiibhuutaa ^a^M2.0354^ea^. atthi ca khvassa kusalamuula.m asamucchinna.m, tamhaa tassa kusalaa kusala.m paatubhavissati. evamaya.m puggalo aayati.m aparihaanadhammo bhavissatii'ti. seyyathaapi, aananda, biijaani akha.n.daani apuutiini avaataatapahataani saaradaani sukhasayitaani sukhette suparikammakataaya bhuumiyaa nikkhittaani. jaaneyyaasi tva.m, aananda, imaani biijaani vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissantii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``evameva.m kho aha.m, aananda, idhekacca.m puggala.m eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- `imassa kho puggalassa vijjamaanaa kusalaapi dhammaa ^a^P3.0405^ea^ akusalaapi dhammaa'ti. tamena.m aparena samayena eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- `imassa kho puggalassa kusalaa dhammaa antarahitaa, akusalaa dhammaa ^a^T3.0453^ea^ sammukhiibhuutaa. atthi ca khvassa kusalamuula.m asamucchinna.m, tamhaa tassa kusalaa kusala.m paatubhavissati. evamaya.m puggalo aayati.m aparihaanadhammo bhavissatii'ti. evampi kho, aananda, tathaagatassa purisapuggalo cetasaa ceto paricca vidito hoti. evampi kho, aananda, tathaagatassa purisindriya~naa.na.m cetasaa ceto paricca vidita.m hoti. evampi kho, aananda, tathaagatassa aayati.m dhammasamuppaado cetasaa ceto paricca vidito hoti.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sa~n~naana.m vemattataa? a~n~naa, bhikkhave, sa~n~naa ruupesu, a~n~naa ^a^V2.0117^ea^ sa~n~naa saddesu {a~n~naa bhikkhave ruupesu sa~n~naa a~n~naa saddesu sa~n~naa (ka0) eva.m sesesupi}, a~n~naa sa~n~naa gandhesu, a~n~naa sa~n~naa rasesu, a~n~naa sa~n~naa pho.t.thabbesu, a~n~naa sa~n~naa dhammesu ^a^T3.0463^ea^. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sa~n~naana.m vemattataa.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sa~n~naana.m vipaako? vohaaravepakka.m {vohaaravepakkaaha.m (syaa0 pii0), vohaarapakkaaha.m (sii0)}, bhikkhave, sa~n~na.m {sa~n~naa (syaa0 pii0)} vadaami. yathaa yathaa na.m sa~njaanaati tathaa tathaa voharati, eva.m sa~n~nii ahosinti {ahosiiti (ka0)}. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sa~n~naana.m vipaako.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sa~n~naanirodho? phassanirodho, {phassanirodhaa (syaa0 ka0)} bhikkhave, sa~n~naanirodho. ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sa~n~naanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.

[03] ``yato ^a^M2.0362^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako eva.m sa~n~na.m pajaanaati, eva.m sa~n~naana.m nidaanasambhava.m pajaanaati, eva.m sa~n~naana.m vemattata.m ^a^P3.0414^ea^ pajaanaati, eva.m sa~n~naana.m vipaaka.m pajaanaati, eva.m sa~n~naanirodha.m pajaanaati, eva.m sa~n~naanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaanaati, so ima.m nibbedhika.m brahmacariya.m pajaanaati sa~n~naanirodha.m. sa~n~naa, bhikkhave, veditabbaa...pe0... sa~n~naanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa veditabbaati. iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``aasavaa, bhikkhave, veditabbaa...pe0... aasavanirodhagaaminii {sabbatthapi evameva dissati} pa.tipadaa veditabbaati, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tayome, bhikkhave, aasavaa -- kaamaasavo, bhavaasavo, avijjaasavo.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, aasavaana.m nidaanasambhavo? avijjaa, bhikkhave, aasavaana.m nidaanasambhavo.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, aasavaana.m vemattataa? atthi, bhikkhave, aasavaa nirayagamaniiyaa {nirayagaaminiyaa (sii0 ka0)}, atthi aasavaa tiracchaanayonigamaniiyaa, atthi aasavaa pettivisayagamaniiyaa, atthi aasavaa manussalokagamaniiyaa, atthi aasavaa ^a^T3.0464^ea^ devalokagamaniiyaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, aasavaana.m vemattataa.

[03] ``katamo ^a^V2.0118^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, aasavaana.m vipaako? ya.m kho, bhikkhave, avijjaagato tajja.m tajja.m attabhaava.m abhinibbatteti pu~n~nabhaagiya.m vaa apu~n~nabhaagiya.m vaa, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, aasavaana.m vipaako.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, aasavanirodho? avijjaanirodho, bhikkhave, aasavanirodho. ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo aasavanirodhagaaminii {sabbatthapi evameva dissati} pa.tipadaa, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.

[03] ``yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako eva.m aasave pajaanaati, eva.m aasavaana.m nidaanasambhava.m pajaanaati, eva.m aasavaana.m vemattata.m pajaanaati, eva.m aasavaana.m vipaaka.m pajaanaati, eva.m aasavaana.m nirodha.m pajaanaati, eva.m aasavaana.m nirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaanaati, so ima.m nibbedhika.m brahmacariya.m pajaanaati aasavanirodha.m. aasavaa ^a^P3.0415^ea^, bhikkhave, veditabbaa...pe0... aasavanirodhagaaminii ^a^M2.0363^ea^ {sabbatthapi evameva dissati} pa.tipadaa veditabbaati. iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``kamma.m, bhikkhave, veditabba.m...pe0... kammanirodhagaaminii {sabbatthapi evameva dissati} pa.tipadaa veditabbaati, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? {kathaa0 539} cetanaaha.m, bhikkhave, kamma.m vadaami. cetayitvaa kamma.m karoti -- kaayena vaacaaya manasaa.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, kammaana.m nidaanasambhavo? phasso, bhikkhave, kammaana.m nidaanasambhavo.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, kammaana.m vemattataa? atthi, bhikkhave, kamma.m nirayavedaniiya.m, atthi kamma.m tiracchaanayonivedaniiya.m, atthi kamma.m pettivisayavedaniiya.m, atthi kamma.m manussalokavedaniiya.m, atthi kamma.m devalokavedaniiya.m ^a^T3.0465^ea^. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, kammaana.m vemattataa.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, kammaana.m vipaako? tividhaaha.m {imaaha.m (ka0)}, bhikkhave, kammaana.m vipaaka.m vadaami ^a^V2.0119^ea^ -- di.t.theva {di.t.the vaa (sii0)} dhamme, upapajje vaa {upapajja.m vaa (ka0 sii0, a0 ni0 10.217), upapajja vaa (?), ma0 ni0 3.303 paa.liyaa tadatthava.n.nanaaya ca sa.msaddetabba.m}, apare vaa pariyaaye. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, kammaana.m vipaako.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, kammanirodho? phassanirodho, {phassanirodhaa (ka0 sii0 syaa0 ka0)} bhikkhave, kammanirodho. ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo kammanirodhagaaminii {sabbatthapi evameva dissati} pa.tipadaa, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.

[03] ``yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako eva.m kamma.m pajaanaati, eva.m kammaana.m nidaanasambhava.m pajaanaati, eva.m kammaana.m vemattata.m pajaanaati, eva.m kammaana.m vipaaka.m pajaanaati, eva.m kammanirodha.m pajaanaati, eva.m kammanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaanaati, so ima.m nibbedhika.m brahmacariya.m pajaanaati kammanirodha.m. kamma.m, bhikkhave, veditabba.m...pe0... kammanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ^a^P3.0416^ea^ veditabbaati, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``dukkha.m, bhikkhave, veditabba.m, dukkhassa nidaanasambhavo veditabbo, dukkhassa vemattataa veditabbaa, dukkhassa vipaako veditabbo, dukkhanirodho veditabbo, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa veditabbaati. iti kho paneta.m vutta.m ^a^M2.0364^ea^, ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? jaatipi dukkhaa, jaraapi dukkhaa, byaadhipi dukkho {byaadhipi dukkhaa (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}, mara.nampi dukkha.m, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaapi dukkhaa, yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m, sa.mkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa {pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaapi (ka0)} dukkhaa.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, dukkhassa nidaanasambhavo? ta.nhaa, bhikkhave, dukkhassa nidaanasambhavo ^a^T3.0466^ea^.
[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, dukkhassa vemattataa? atthi, bhikkhave, dukkha.m adhimatta.m, atthi paritta.m, atthi dandhaviraagi, atthi khippaviraagi. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhassa vemattataa.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, dukkhassa vipaako? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco yena dukkhena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto {pariyaadi.n.nacitto (ka0)} socati kilamati paridevati, urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati ^a^V2.0120^ea^, yena vaa pana dukkhena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto bahiddhaa pariye.t.thi.m aapajjati -- `ko {so na (ka0)} ekapada.m dvipada.m jaanaati {pajaanaati (ka0)} imassa dukkhassa nirodhaayaa'ti? sammohavepakka.m vaaha.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m vadaami pariye.t.thivepakka.m vaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhassa vipaako.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodho? ta.nhaanirodho, {ta.nhaanirodhaa (ka0 sii0 syaa0 ka0)} bhikkhave, dukkhanirodho. ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo dukkhassa nirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.

[03] ``yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako eva.m dukkha.m pajaanaati, eva.m ^a^P3.0417^ea^ dukkhassa nidaanasambhava.m pajaanaati, eva.m dukkhassa vemattata.m pajaanaati, eva.m dukkhassa vipaaka.m pajaanaati, eva.m dukkhanirodha.m pajaanaati, eva.m dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m pajaanaati, so ima.m nibbedhika.m brahmacariya.m pajaanaati dukkhanirodha.m. dukkha.m, bhikkhave, veditabba.m, dukkhassa nidaanasambhavo veditabbo, dukkhassa vemattataa veditabbaa, dukkhassa vipaako veditabbo, dukkhanirodho veditabbo, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa veditabbaati. iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.
[03] ``aya.m kho so, bhikkhave, nibbedhikapariyaayo dhammapariyaayo''ti. navama.m.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ {ma0 ni0 1.148; vibha0 760; a0 ni0 10.21; pa.ti0 ma0 2.44} ``chayimaani ^a^T3.0467^ea^ ^a^M2.0365^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabalaani, yehi balehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti. katamaani cha? idha, bhikkhave, tathaagato .thaana~nca .thaanato a.t.thaana~nca a.t.thaanato yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato .thaana~nca .thaanato a.t.thaana~nca a.t.thaanato yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, idampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti, ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0121^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m .thaanaso hetuso vipaaka.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m .thaanaso hetuso vipaaka.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, idampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti, ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato jhaanavimokkhasamaadhisamaapattiina.m ^a^P3.0418^ea^ sa.mkilesa.m vodaana.m vu.t.thaana.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato...pe0... idampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti, ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m ^a^T3.0468^ea^ -- ekampi jaati.m, dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m, dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. idampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti, ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati. yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato ^a^M2.0366^ea^ dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati, idampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti, ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati, idampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti, ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m ^a^T3.0469^ea^ pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti. imaani ^a^P3.0419^ea^ kho, bhikkhave ^a^V2.0122^ea^, cha tathaagatassa tathaagatabalaani, yehi balehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.

[03] ``tatra ce, bhikkhave, pare tathaagata.m .thaana~nca .thaanato a.t.thaana~nca a.t.thaanato yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nena upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchanti. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa .thaana~nca .thaanato a.t.thaana~nca a.t.thaanato yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m vidita.m tathaa tathaa tesa.m tathaagato .thaana~nca .thaanato a.t.thaana~nca a.t.thaanato yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nena pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaroti.

[03] ``tatra ce, bhikkhave, pare tathaagata.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m .thaanaso hetuso vipaaka.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nena upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchanti. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m .thaanaso hetuso vipaaka.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m vidita.m tathaa tathaa tesa.m tathaagato atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m .thaanaso hetuso vipaaka.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nena pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaroti.

[03] ``tatra ce, bhikkhave, pare tathaagata.m jhaanavimokkhasamaadhisamaapattiina.m sa.mkilesa.m vodaana.m vu.t.thaana.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nena upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchanti. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa jhaanavimokkhasamaadhisamaapattiina.m sa.mkilesa.m vodaana.m vu.t.thaana.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m vidita.m, tathaa tathaa tesa.m tathaagato jhaanavimokkhasamaadhisamaapattiina.m sa.mkilesa.m vodaana.m vu.t.thaana.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nena pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaroti.

[03] ``tatra ^a^M2.0367^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, pare tathaagata.m pubbenivaasaanussati.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nena upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchanti. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa pubbenivaasaanussati.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m vidita.m, tathaa ^a^T3.0470^ea^ tathaa tesa.m ^a^P3.0420^ea^ tathaagato pubbenivaasaanussati.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nena pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaroti.

[03] ``tatra ce, bhikkhave, pare tathaagata.m sattaana.m cutuupapaata.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nena upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchanti. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa sattaana.m cutuupapaata.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m vidita.m, tathaa tathaa tesa.m tathaagato sattaana.m cutuupapaata.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nena pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaroti.

[03] ``tatra ^a^V2.0123^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, pare tathaagata.m aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nena upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchanti. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m vidita.m, tathaa tathaa tesa.m tathaagato aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.nena pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaroti.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yampida.m {yamida.m (sii0 pii0), yadida.m (ka0)} .thaana~nca .thaanato a.t.thaana~nca a.t.thaanato yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m tampi samaahitassa vadaami no asamaahitassa. yampida.m {yadida.m (ka0)} atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m .thaanaso hetuso vipaaka.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m tampi samaahitassa vadaami no asamaahitassa. yampida.m {yadida.m (ka0)} jhaanavimokkhasamaadhisamaapattiina.m sa.mkilesa.m vodaana.m vu.t.thaana.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m tampi samaahitassa vadaami no asamaahitassa. yampida.m {yadida.m (ka0)} pubbenivaasaanussati.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m tampi samaahitassa vadaami no asamaahitassa. yampida.m {yadida.m (ka0)} sattaana.m cutuupapaata.m yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m tampi samaahitassa vadaami no asamaahitassa. yampida.m {yadida.m (ka0)} aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... yathaabhuuta.m ~naa.na.m tampi samaahitassa vadaami no asamaahitassa. iti kho ^a^T3.0471^ea^, bhikkhave, samaadhi maggo, asamaadhi kummaggo''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ ```so ^a^T3.0472^ea^ vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paapamitto paapasahaayo paapasampava"nko, paapamitte {paapake mitte (ka0)} sevamaano bhajamaano payirupaasamaano, tesa~nca di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjamaano aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m ^a^V2.0125^ea^ paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m ^a^M2.0369^ea^ aparipuuretvaa sekha.m dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `sekha.m dhamma.m aparipuuretvaa siilaani paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `siilaani aparipuuretvaa kaamaraaga.m vaa ruuparaaga.m vaa aruuparaaga.m vaa pajahissatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ```so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko, kalyaa.namitte sevamaano bhajamaano payirupaasamaano, tesa~nca di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjamaano aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `aabhisamaacaarika.m dhamma.m paripuuretvaa sekha.m dhamma.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `sekha.m dhamma.m paripuuretvaa siilaani paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `siilaani paripuuretvaa kaamaraaga.m vaa ruuparaaga.m vaa aruuparaaga.m vaa pajahissatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ ```so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa"nga.nikaaraamo sa"nga.nikarato sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m anuyutto, ga.naaraamo ga.narato ga.naaraamata.m anuyutto, eko paviveke abhiramissatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `eko paviveke anabhiramanto cittassa ^a^P3.0423^ea^ nimitta.m gahessatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `cittassa nimitta.m aga.nhanto sammaadi.t.thi.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `sammaadi.t.thi.m aparipuuretvaa sammaasamaadhi.m paripuuressatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `sammaasamaadhi.m aparipuuretvaa sa.myojanaani ^a^T3.0473^ea^ pajahissatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `sa.myojanaani appahaaya nibbaana.m sacchikarissatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ```so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na sa"nga.nikaaraamo na sa"nga.nikarato na sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m anuyutto, na ga.naaraamo na ga.narato na ga.naaraamata.m anuyutto, eko paviveke abhiramissatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `eko paviveke abhiramanto cittassa nimitta.m gahessatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `cittassa nimitta.m ga.nhanto sammaadi.t.thi.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `sammaadi.t.thi.m paripuuretvaa sammaasamaadhi.m paripuuressatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `sammaasamaadhi.m ^a^V2.0126^ea^ paripuuretvaa sa.myojanaani pajahissatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `sa.myojanaani pahaaya nibbaana.m sacchikarissatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0370^ea^ kho a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``chayime, bhante, dhammaa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cha? satthugaaravataa, dhammagaaravataa, sa"nghagaaravataa, sikkhaagaaravataa, sovacassataa, kalyaa.namittataa -- ime kho, bhante, cha dhammaa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. idamavoca saa devataa. samanu~n~no satthaa ahosi. atha kho saa devataa ``samanu~n~no me satthaa''ti bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.

[03] atha ^a^P3.0424^ea^ kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ima.m ^a^T3.0474^ea^, bhikkhave, ratti.m a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho, bhikkhave, saa devataa ma.m etadavoca -- `chayime, bhante, dhammaa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cha? satthugaaravataa, dhammagaaravataa, sa"nghagaaravataa, sikkhaagaaravataa, sovacassataa, kalyaa.namittataa -- ime kho, bhante, cha dhammaa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii'ti. idamavoca, bhikkhave, saa devataa. ida.m vatvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa etadavoca -- ``imassa kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. idha, bhante, bhikkhu attanaa ca satthugaaravo hoti satthugaaravataaya ca va.n.navaadii. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu na satthugaaravaa te ca satthugaaravataaya samaadapeti. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu satthugaaravaa tesa~nca va.n.na.m bha.nati bhuuta.m taccha.m kaalena. attanaa ca dhammagaaravo hoti...pe0... sa"nghagaaravo hoti... sikkhaagaaravo hoti ^a^V2.0127^ea^ ... suvaco hoti... kalyaa.namitto hoti kalyaa.namittataaya ca va.n.navaadii. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu na kalyaa.namittaa te ca kalyaa.namittataaya samaadapeti. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu kalyaa.namittaa tesa~nca va.n.na.m bha.nati bhuuta.m taccha.m kaalena ^a^M2.0371^ea^. imassa kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa ^a^T3.0475^ea^ sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaamii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! saadhu kho tva.m, saariputta, imassa mayaa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaasi. idha, saariputta, bhikkhu attanaa ca satthugaaravo hoti ^a^P3.0425^ea^ satthugaaravataaya ca va.n.navaadii. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu na satthugaaravaa te ca satthugaaravataaya samaadapeti. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu satthugaaravaa tesa~nca va.n.na.m bha.nati bhuuta.m taccha.m kaalena. attanaa ca dhammagaaravo hoti...pe0... sa"nghagaaravo hoti... sikkhaagaaravo hoti... suvaco hoti... kalyaa.namitto hoti kalyaa.namittataaya ca va.n.navaadii. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu na kalyaa.namittaa te ca kalyaa.namittataaya samaadapeti. ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu kalyaa.namittaa tesa~nca va.n.na.m bha.nati bhuuta.m taccha.m kaalena. imassa kho, saariputta, mayaa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attho da.t.thabbo''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ ```so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na santena samaadhinaa na pa.niitena na pa.tippassaddhiladdhena {na pa.tippassaddhaladdhena (sii0)} na ekodibhaavaadhigatena anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhavissati -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa bhavissati, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko bhavissati...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattessatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.nissati -- dibbe ca maanuse ca ye duure santike caa'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanissati -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti pajaanissati ^a^T3.0476^ea^ ...pe0... vimutta.m vaa citta.m vimutta.m cittanti pajaanissatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarissati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m, dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m ^a^P3.0426^ea^ pubbenivaasa.m anussarissatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passissati...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanissatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati ^a^V2.0128^ea^. `aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ```so ^a^M2.0372^ea^ vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santena samaadhinaa pa.niitena pa.tippassaddhiladdhena ekodibhaavaadhigatena anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhavissati...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattessatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.nissati -- dibbe ca maanuse ca ye duure santike caa'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanissati -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti pajaanissati...pe0... vimutta.m vaa citta.m vimutta.m cittanti pajaanissatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarissati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m, dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarissatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passissati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanissatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati ^a^T3.0477^ea^. `aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.nitu.m sati sati aayatane. katamehi chahi? idha ^a^P3.0427^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ime haanabhaagiyaa dhammaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, `ime .thitibhaagiyaa dhammaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, `ime visesabhaagiyaa dhammaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, `ime nibbedhabhaagiyaa dhammaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, asakkaccakaarii ca hoti, asappaayakaarii ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.nitu.m sati sati aayatane.

[01] ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.nitu.m sati sati aayatane. katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ime haanabhaagiyaa dhammaa'ti ^a^V2.0129^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `ime .thitibhaagiyaa dhammaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `ime visesabhaagiyaa dhammaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `ime nibbedhabhaagiyaa dhammaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, sakkaccakaarii ca hoti, sappaayakaarii ca. imehi ^a^M2.0373^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.nitu.m sati sati aayatane''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo samaadhismi.m {samaadhimhi (ka0)} balata.m paapu.nitu.m. katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ^a^T3.0478^ea^ samaadhissa samaapattikusalo hoti, na samaadhissa .thitikusalo hoti, na samaadhissa {na samaadhimhaa (ka0) uparisattakanipaate devataavagge pana sabbatthapi ``samaadhissa''itveva dissati} vu.t.thaanakusalo hoti, asakkaccakaarii ca hoti, asaataccakaarii ca, asappaayakaarii ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo samaadhismi.m balata.m paapu.nitu.m.

[03] ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo samaadhismi.m balata.m paapu.nitu.m. katamehi chahi? idha ^a^P3.0428^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samaadhissa samaapattikusalo hoti, samaadhissa .thitikusalo hoti, samaadhissa vu.t.thaanakusalo hoti, sakkaccakaarii ca hoti, saataccakaarii ca, sappaayakaarii ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo samaadhismi.m balata.m paapu.nitu''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ ``cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharitu.m. katame cha? kaamacchanda.m, byaapaada.m, thinamiddha.m, uddhaccakukkucca.m, vicikiccha.m. kaamesu kho panassa aadiinavo na yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tho hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahaaya abhabbo pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharitu.m.

[03] ``cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaaya bhabbo pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharitu.m. katame cha? kaamacchanda.m, byaapaada.m, thinamiddha.m, uddhaccakukkucca.m, vicikiccha.m, kaamesu kho panassa aadiinavo ^a^V2.0130^ea^ na yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tho hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaaya bhabbo pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharitu''nti. navama.m.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ ``cha ^a^T3.0479^ea^ ^a^M2.0374^ea^, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharitu.m. katame cha? kaamavitakka.m, byaapaadavitakka.m, vihi.msaavitakka.m, kaamasa~n~na.m, byaapaadasa~n~na.m, vihi.msaasa~n~na.m -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahaaya abhabbo pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharitu.m.

[03] ``cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaaya bhabbo pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharitu.m. katame cha? kaamavitakka.m, byaapaadavitakka.m, vihi.msaavitakka.m, kaamasa~n~na.m, byaapaadasa~n~na.m, vihi.msaasa~n~na.m -- ime ^a^P3.0429^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaaya bhabbo pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharitu''nti. dasama.m.
[06] devataavaggo sattamo. {dutiyo (syaa0 ka0)}
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] anaagaami araha.m mittaa, sa"nga.nikaaraamadevataa.
