[03] 75^b^.^eb^ ``chahi ^a^V2.0131^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme dukkha.m viharati savighaata.m saupaayaasa.m sapari.laaha.m, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa. katamehi chahi? kaamavitakkena, byaapaadavitakkena, vihi.msaavitakkena, kaamasa~n~naaya, byaapaadasa~n~naaya, vihi.msaasa~n~naaya -- imehi, kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme dukkha.m viharati savighaata.m saupaayaasa.m sapari.laaha.m, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa.

[03] ``chahi ^a^T3.0480^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme sukha.m viharati avighaata.m anupaayaasa.m apari.laaha.m, kaayassa bhedaa para.m ^a^M2.0375^ea^ mara.naa sugati paa.tika"nkhaa. katamehi chahi? nekkhammavitakkena, abyaapaadavitakkena, avihi.msaavitakkena, nekkhammasa~n~naaya, abyaapaadasa~n~naaya, avihi.msaasa~n~naaya -- imehi, kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme sukha.m viharati avighaata.m anupaayaasa.m apari.laaha.m, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati paa.tika"nkhaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ ``cha ^a^P3.0430^ea^, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo arahatta.m sacchikaatu.m. katame cha? maana.m, omaana.m, atimaana.m, adhimaana.m, thambha.m, atinipaata.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahaaya abhabbo arahatta.m sacchikaatu.m.

[03] ``cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaaya bhabbo arahatta.m sacchikaatu.m. katame cha? maana.m, omaana.m ^a^V2.0132^ea^, atimaana.m, adhimaana.m, thambha.m, atinipaata.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaaya bhabbo arahatta.m sacchikaatu''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ ``cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo uttarimanussadhamma.m alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikaatu.m. katame cha? mu.t.thassacca.m, asampaja~n~na.m, indriyesu aguttadvaarata.m, bhojane amatta~n~nuta.m, kuhana.m, lapana.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahaaya abhabbo uttarimanussadhamma.m alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikaatu.m.

[03] ``cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaaya bhabbo uttarimanussadhamma.m alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m ^a^T3.0481^ea^ sacchikaatu.m. katame cha? mu.t.thassacca.m, asampaja~n~na.m, indriyesu aguttadvaarata.m, bhojane amatta~n~nuta.m, kuhana.m, lapana.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaaya bhabbo uttarimanussadhamma.m alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikaatu''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ ``chahi ^a^P3.0431^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa aaraddhaa hoti aasavaana.m khayaaya. katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaaraamo hoti, bhaavanaaraamo hoti, pahaanaaraamo hoti, pavivekaaraamo hoti ^a^M2.0376^ea^, abyaapajjhaaraamo hoti, nippapa~ncaaraamo hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa aaraddhaa hoti aasavaana.m khayaayaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo anadhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m phaati.m kaatu.m {phaatikattu.m (sii0), phaatikaatu.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^V2.0133^ea^ na aayakusalo ca hoti, na apaayakusalo ca hoti, na upaayakusalo ca hoti, anadhigataana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m adhigamaaya na chanda.m janeti, adhigate kusale dhamme na aarakkhati {saarakkhati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii)}, saataccakiriyaaya na sampaadeti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo anadhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m phaati.m kaatu.m.

[03] ``chahi ^a^T3.0482^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo anadhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m phaati.m kaatu.m. katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aayakusalo ca hoti, apaayakusalo ca hoti, upaayakusalo ca hoti, anadhigataana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m ^a^P3.0432^ea^ adhigamaaya chanda.m janeti, adhigate kusale dhamme aarakkhati, saataccakiriyaaya sampaadeti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo anadhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m phaati.m kaatu''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahantatta.m {mahatta.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} vepullatta.m paapu.naati dhammesu. katamehi chahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aalokabahulo ca hoti yogabahulo ca vedabahulo ca asantu.t.thibahulo ca anikkhittadhuro ca kusalesu dhammesu uttari ca pataareti {pakaroti (ka0)}. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahantatta.m vepullatta.m paapu.naati dhammesuu''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ``chahi ^a^M2.0377^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi chahi? paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, musaavaadii hoti, paapiccho ca, micchaadi.t.thi ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m. katamehi chahi ^a^M2.0380^ea^? kammaavara.nataaya ^a^P3.0436^ea^ samannaagato hoti, kilesaavara.nataaya samannaagato hoti, vipaakaavara.nataaya samannaagato hoti, assaddho ca hoti, acchandiko ca, duppa~n~no ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m. katamehi chahi? maataa ^a^T3.0487^ea^ jiivitaa voropitaa hoti, pitaa jiivitaa voropito hoti, araha.m {arahaa (syaa0 ka.m0), arahanto (ka0)} jiivitaa voropito hoti, tathaagatassa du.t.thena cittena lohita.m uppaadita.m hoti, sa"ngho bhinno hoti, duppa~n~no hoti ja.lo e.lamuugo. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m.

[03] ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nanto saddhamma.m bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m. katamehi chahi? na ^a^P3.0437^ea^ maataa jiivitaa voropitaa hoti, na pitaa jiivitaa voropito hoti, na araha.m jiivitaa voropito hoti, na tathaagatassa du.t.thena cittena lohita.m uppaadita.m hoti, na sa"ngho bhinno hoti, pa~n~navaa hoti aja.lo ane.lamuugo. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato ^a^M2.0381^ea^ su.nanto saddhamma.m bhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m. katamehi chahi? tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamaane na sussuusati, na sota.m odahati, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thaapeti {upa.t.thapeti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, anattha.m ga.nhaati, attha.m ri~ncati, ananulomikaaya khantiyaa samannaagato hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi ^a^V2.0138^ea^ samannaagato su.nantopi saddhamma.m abhabbo niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ ```so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ka~nci sa"nkhaara.m niccato samanupassanto anulomikaaya khantiyaa samannaagato bhavissatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `anulomikaaya khantiyaa asamannaagato sammattaniyaama.m okkamissatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `sammattaniyaama.m anokkamamaano sotaapattiphala.m vaa sakadaagaamiphala.m vaa anaagaamiphala.m vaa arahatta.m {arahattaphala.m (ka0) pa.ti0 ma0 3.36} vaa sacchikarissatii'ti neta.m ^a^T3.0492^ea^ .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ```so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nibbaana.m sukhato samanupassanto anulomikaaya khantiyaa samannaagato bhavissatii'ti ^a^P3.0443^ea^ .thaanameta.m vijjati. `anulomikaaya khantiyaa samannaagato sammattaniyaama.m okkamissatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati. `sammattaniyaama.m ^a^T3.0493^ea^ okkamamaano sotaapattiphala.m vaa sakadaagaamiphala.m vaa anaagaamiphala.m vaa arahatta.m vaa sacchikarissatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ ``cha ^a^V2.0143^ea^, bhikkhave, aanisa.mse sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa sabbasa"nkhaaresu anodhi.m karitvaa aniccasa~n~na.m upa.t.thaapetu.m. katame cha? `sabbasa"nkhaaraa ca me anavatthitaa {anava.t.thitato (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} khaayissanti, sabbaloke ca me mano naabhiramissati ^a^M2.0386^ea^ {na ramissati (ka0)}, sabbalokaa ca me mano vu.t.thahissati, nibbaanapo.na~nca me maanasa.m bhavissati, sa.myojanaa ca me pahaana.m gacchissanti {gacchanti (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}, paramena ca saama~n~nena samannaagato bhavissaamii'ti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha aanisa.mse sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa sabbasa"nkhaaresu anodhi.m karitvaa aniccasa~n~na.m upa.t.thaapetu''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ ``cha, bhikkhave, aanisa.mse sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa sabbasa"nkhaaresu anodhi.m karitvaa dukkhasa~n~na.m upa.t.thaapetu.m. katame cha? `sabbasa"nkhaaresu ca me nibbidasa~n~naa paccupa.t.thitaa bhavissati, seyyathaapi ukkhittaasike vadhake. sabbalokaa ca me mano vu.t.thahissati, nibbaane ca santadassaavii bhavissaami, anusayaa ca me samugghaata.m gacchissanti {gacchanti (pii0 ka0)}, kiccakaarii ca bhavissaami, satthaa ca me parici.n.no bhavissati mettaavataayaa'ti. ime ^a^P3.0444^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, cha aanisa.mse sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa sabbasa"nkhaaresu anodhi.m karitvaa dukkhasa~n~na.m upa.t.thaapetu''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ ``cha, bhikkhave, aanisa.mse sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa sabbadhammesu anodhi.m karitvaa anattasa~n~na.m upa.t.thaapetu.m. katame cha? sabbaloke ^a^T3.0494^ea^ ca atammayo bhavissaami, aha"nkaaraa ca me uparujjhissanti, mama"nkaaraa ca me uparujjhissanti, asaadhaara.nena ca ~naa.nena samannaagato bhavissaami, hetu ca me sudi.t.tho bhavissati, hetusamuppannaa ca dhammaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha aanisa.mse sampassamaanena alameva bhikkhunaa sabbadhammesu anodhi.m karitvaa anattasa~n~na.m upa.t.thaapetu''nti. navama.m.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^V2.0144^ea^, bhikkhave, bhavaa pahaatabbaa, tiisu sikkhaasu sikkhitabba.m. katame tayo bhavaa pahaatabbaa? kaamabhavo, ruupabhavo, aruupabhavo ^a^M2.0387^ea^ -- ime tayo bhavaa pahaatabbaa. katamaasu tiisu sikkhaasu sikkhitabba.m? adhisiilasikkhaaya, adhicittasikkhaaya, adhipa~n~naasikkhaaya -- imaasu tiisu sikkhaasu sikkhitabba.m. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ime tayo bhavaa pahiinaa honti, imaasu ca tiisu sikkhaasu sikkhitasikkho hoti -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu acchecchi ta.nha.m, vivattayi sa.myojana.m, sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassaa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ ``tisso ^a^P3.0445^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, ta.nhaa pahaatabbaa, tayo ca maanaa. katamaa tisso ta.nhaa pahaatabbaa? kaamata.nhaa, bhavata.nhaa, vibhavata.nhaa -- imaa tisso ta.nhaa pahaatabbaa. katame tayo maanaa pahaatabbaa? maano, omaano, atimaano -- ime tayo maanaa pahaatabbaa. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno imaa tisso ta.nhaa pahiinaa honti, ime ca tayo maanaa; aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu acchecchi ta.nha.m, vivattayi sa.myojana.m, sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassaa''ti. ekaadasama.m.
[06] aanisa.msavaggo dasamo. {pa~ncamo (syaa0 ka0)}
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] paatubhaavo ^a^T3.0495^ea^ aanisa.mso, aniccadukkhaanattato.
[27] nibbaana.m anavatthi, ukkhittaasi atammayo.
[22] bhavaa ta.nhaayekaa dasaati..
[06] dutiyapa.n.naasaka.m samatta.m.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^T3.0496^ea^ ^a^M2.0388^ea^ ^a^V2.0145^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa. katame tayo? raago, doso, moho. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame tayo? raagass ^a^P3.0446^ea^ pahaanaaya asubhaa bhaavetabbaa, dosassa pahaanaaya mettaa bhaavetabbaa, mohassa pahaanaaya pa~n~naa bhaavetabbaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya ime tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammaa. katame tayo? kaayaduccarita.m, vaciiduccarita.m, manoduccarita.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame tayo? kaayaduccaritassa pahaanaaya kaayasucarita.m bhaavetabba.m, vaciiduccaritassa pahaanaaya vaciisucarita.m bhaavetabba.m, manoduccaritassa pahaanaaya manosucarita.m bhaavetabba.m. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya ime tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammaa. katame tayo? kaamavitakko, byaapaadavitakko, vihi.msaavitakko. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame tayo? kaamavitakkassa pahaanaaya nekkhammavitakko bhaavetabbo, byaapaadavitakkassa ^a^T3.0497^ea^ pahaanaaya abyaapaadavitakko bhaavetabbo, vihi.msaavitakkassa pahaanaaya ^a^V2.0146^ea^ avihi.msaavitakko bhaavetabbo. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya ime tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^M2.0389^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa. katame tayo? kaamasa~n~naa, byaapaadasa~n~naa, vihi.msaasa~n~naa. ime ^a^P3.0447^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame tayo? kaamasa~n~naaya pahaanaaya nekkhammasa~n~naa bhaavetabbaa, byaapaadasa~n~naaya pahaanaaya abyaapaadasa~n~naa bhaavetabbaa, vihi.msaasa~n~naaya pahaanaaya avihi.msaasa~n~naa bhaavetabbaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya ime tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammaa. katame tayo? kaamadhaatu, byaapaadadhaatu, vihi.msaadhaatu. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame tayo? kaamadhaatuyaa pahaanaaya nekkhammadhaatu bhaavetabbaa, byaapaadadhaatuyaa pahaanaaya abyaapaadadhaatu bhaavetabbaa, vihi.msaadhaatuyaa pahaanaaya avihi.msaadhaatu bhaavetabbaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya ime tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammaa. katame tayo? assaadadi.t.thi, attaanudi.t.thi, micchaadi.t.thi. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa. imesa.m kho ^a^T3.0498^ea^, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame tayo? assaadadi.t.thiyaa pahaanaaya aniccasa~n~naa bhaavetabbaa, attaanudi.t.thiyaa pahaanaaya anattasa~n~naa bhaavetabbaa, micchaadi.t.thiyaa pahaanaaya sammaadi.t.thi bhaavetabbaa ^a^V2.0147^ea^. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya ime tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^P3.0448^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa. katame tayo? arati, vihi.msaa {vihesaa (ka0)}, adhammacariyaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m ^a^M2.0390^ea^ dhammaana.m pahaanaaya tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame tayo? aratiyaa pahaanaaya muditaa bhaavetabbaa, vihi.msaaya pahaanaaya avihi.msaa bhaavetabbaa, adhammacariyaaya pahaanaaya dhammacariyaa bhaavetabbaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya ime tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammaa. katame tayo? asantu.t.thitaa, asampaja~n~na.m, mahicchataa. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame tayo? asantu.t.thitaaya pahaanaaya santu.t.thitaa bhaavetabbaa, asampaja~n~nassa pahaanaaya sampaja~n~na.m bhaavetabba.m, mahicchataaya pahaanaaya appicchataa bhaavetabbaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya ime tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammaa. katame tayo? dovacassataa, paapamittataa, cetaso vikkhepo. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa. imesa.m ^a^T3.0499^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame tayo? dovacassataaya ^a^P3.0449^ea^ pahaanaaya sovacassataa bhaavetabbaa, paapamittataaya pahaanaaya kalyaa.namittataa bhaavetabbaa, cetaso vikkhepassa pahaanaaya aanaapaanassati bhaavetabbaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya ime tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^V2.0148^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa. katame tayo? uddhacca.m, asa.mvaro, pamaado. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame tayo? uddhaccassa pahaanaaya samatho bhaavetabbo, asa.mvarassa pahaanaaya sa.mvaro bhaavetabbo, pamaadassa pahaanaaya appamaado bhaavetabbo. imesa.m ^a^M2.0391^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya ime tayo dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. dasama.m.
[06] tikavaggo ekaadasamo. {pa.thamo (syaa0)}
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] raagaduccaritavitakka, sa~n~naa dhaatuuti vuccati.
[22] assaadaaratitu.t.thi, duve ca uddhaccena vaggoti..

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ``cha ^a^T3.0500^ea^ ^a^V2.0149^ea^, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo kaaye kaayaanupassii viharitu.m. katame cha? kammaaraamata.m, bhassaaraamata.m, niddaaraamata.m, sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m, indriyesu aguttadvaarata.m, bhojane amatta~n~nuta.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahaaya abhabbo kaaye kaayaanupassii viharitu.m.

[03] ``cha ^a^P3.0450^ea^, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaaya bhabbo kaaye kaayaanupassii viharitu.m. katame cha? kammaaraamata.m, bhassaaraamata.m, niddaaraamata.m, sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m, indriyesu aguttadvaarata.m, bhojane amatta~n~nuta.m -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaaya bhabbo kaaye kaayaanupassii viharitu''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ ``cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo ajjhatta.m kaaye...pe0... bahiddhaa kaaye...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhaa kaaye...pe0... ajjhatta.m vedanaasu...pe0... bahiddhaa vedanaasu...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhaa vedanaasu...pe0... ajjhatta.m citte...pe0... bahiddhaa citte...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhaa citte...pe0... ajjhatta.m dhammesu...pe0... bahiddhaa dhammesu...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhaa ^a^T3.0501^ea^ dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharitu.m. katame cha? kammaaraamata.m, bhassaaraamata.m, niddaaraamata.m, sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m, indriyesu aguttadvaarata.m ^a^M2.0392^ea^, bhojane amatta~n~nuta.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaaya bhabbo ajjhattabahiddhaa dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharitu''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ ``chahi ^a^V2.0150^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato tapusso {tapasso (pii0) a0 ni0 1.248} gahapati tathaagate ni.t.tha"ngato amataddaso amata.m sacchikatvaa iriyati. katamehi chahi? buddhe ^a^P3.0451^ea^ aveccappasaadena, dhamme aveccappasaadena, sa"nghe aveccappasaadena, ariyena siilena, ariyena ~naa.nena, ariyaaya vimuttiyaa. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato tapusso gahapati tathaagate ni.t.tha"ngato amataddaso amata.m sacchikatvaa iriyatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 120-139^b^.^eb^ ``chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhalliko gahapati...pe0... sudatto gahapati anaathapi.n.diko... citto gahapati macchikaasa.n.diko... hatthako aa.lavako... mahaanaamo sakko... uggo gahapati vesaaliko... uggato gahapati... suuramba.t.tho {suuro amba.t.tho (ka0)} ... jiivako komaarabhacco... nakulapitaa gahapati... tavaka.n.niko gahapati... puura.no gahapati... isidatto gahapati... sandhaano {santaano (ka0)} gahapati... vicayo {vijayo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} gahapati... vijayamaahiko {vajjiyamahito (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} gahapati... me.n.dako gahapati ^a^T3.0502^ea^... vaase.t.tho upaasako... ari.t.tho upaasako... saaraggo {saadatto (syaa0)} upaasako tathaagate ni.t.tha"ngato amataddaso amata.m sacchikatvaa iriyati. katamehi chahi? buddhe aveccappasaadena, dhamme aveccappasaadena, sa"nghe aveccappasaadena, ariyena siilena, ariyena ~naa.nena, ariyaaya vimuttiyaa. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannaagato saaraggo upaasako tathaagate ni.t.tha"ngato amataddaso amata.m sacchikatvaa iriyatii''ti. teviisatima.m.
[06] saama~n~navaggo dvaadasamo.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa ^a^M2.0393^ea^ ^a^V2.0151^ea^, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya cha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame cha? dassanaanuttariya.m ^a^P3.0452^ea^, savanaanuttariya.m, laabhaanuttariya.m, sikkhaanuttariya.m, paaricariyaanuttariya.m, anussataanuttariya.m. raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya ime cha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya cha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame cha? buddhaanussati, dhammaanussati, sa"nghaanussati, siilaanussati, caagaanussati, devataanussati. raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya ime cha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya cha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame cha? aniccasa~n~naa, anicce dukkhasa~n~naa, dukkhe anattasa~n~naa, pahaanasa~n~naa, viraagasa~n~naa, nirodhasa~n~naa. raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya ime cha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti.

[03] 143-169^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa, bhikkhave, pari~n~naaya...pe0... parikkhayaaya... pahaanaaya... khayaaya... vayaaya... viraagaaya... nirodhaaya... caagaaya... pa.tinissaggaaya cha dhammaa ^a^T3.0503^ea^ bhaavetabbaa''.

[03] 170-649^b^.^eb^ ``dosassa...pe0... mohassa... kodhassa... upanaahassa... makkhassa... pa.laasassa... issaaya... macchariyassa... maayaaya... saa.theyyassa... thambhassa... saarambhassa... maanassa... atimaanassa... madassa... pamaadassa abhi~n~naaya...pe0... pari~n~naaya... parikkhayaaya... pahanaaya... khayaaya... vayaaya... viraagaaya... nirodhaaya... caagaaya... pa.tinissaggaaya ime cha dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] raagapeyyaala.m ni.t.thita.m.
